name: Beast Quest
summary:
An evil wizard has enchanted the magical Beasts of Avantia - only a true hero can free the Beasts and stop them from destroying the land. Are you the hero Avantia has been waiting for?

Embark on an epic action-adventure in a huge open world. Battle hordes of dangerous enemies and take on giant Beasts in huge boss battles. Explore snowy peaks and sandy beaches, seeking out ancient artifacts and lost treasures.
Get ready for action-packed combat against multiple foes at once, timing your attacks, blocks and dodges to defeat your enemies. Complete quests to upgrade your equipment and give you the edge.

name: Beventlaed
summary: Beventlaed is a singleplayer Touhou puzzle fangame in which you have to connect strings of three identically colored UFOs. Red colored UFOs extend your life meter, blue UFOs increase you score multiplie and the green ones intrease your Bomb meter, which helps you get rid of glass UFOs (which normally can only be gotten rid of by connecting adjacent UFOs).

name: Beat Legend: Avicii
summary: Soar through vocal melodies, sweep each fade and attack every beat in 15 of Avicii’s biggest hits, in this enthralling futuristic rhythm-action experience. From the developers of the acclaimed Avicii Invector, Beat Legend: AVICII brings the frenetic rhythm-action experience to mobile, and features mega-hits like Without You, Wake Me Up and Levels.

name: Beat Me! Puppetonia Tournament
summary: Beat Me! - Puppetonia Tournament is a 2-6 player online and local-multiplayer party game. Discover Puppetonia - the kingdom of puppets and join to puppets tournament.

name: Beat Saber: Tokyo Machine - "Play"
summary: Get the track 'PLAY' by Tokyo Machine, slash the beats, and show the world how you rock! This track is part of Rocket League x Monstercat Music Pack, brought to you by Monstercat & Psyonix.

name: BeforeDisaster
summary: 《BeforeDisaster》 is a 2D action-adventure game. In the borderland, the plan of a certain cult organization gradually surfaces. The protagonist is ordered to defeat the cult leader to stop the plan. All this must be done before the disaster...

name: Beasties of Greenhollow
summary: Beasties of Greenhollow is a strategic turn based team building game that features a collection of cute creatures based of Scottish mythology. Explore a mysterious realm of fairies, elves, magic, and creatures while fighting to the center of this hidden realm at the request of a mysterious masked figure. What are Shellycoat’s true intentions?

name: Beasts Shall Rise
summary: The 4th Horseman of the apocolapse has unleashed hell on earth. It's down to you to clean up the mess. Beasts Shall Rise is an action packed VR looter shooter roguelike horror with full freedom of movement and immersive AAA quality visuals.

name: Beyond Dreams
summary: Here is the work of a UE4 individual independent game developer. In this pixel game with simple plot, you will face 21 carefully designed bosses (two of them are plot characters), 16 magical treasures, difficult battles and challenge modes that bring new experience!!!

name: Bewitching Gears
summary: ★ Bewitching Gears ★ is an adventure platformer about a witch-engineer and her friends. Explore the world full of mechanisms, use magic and artifacts, and ride broomsticks. Solve the Merchant mystery!

name: Bearly Baking
summary: Bearly Baking is a cooking and relationship-building game where you play as a bear running an inn to feed animals for hibernation. You cook bread and muffins in small mini-games, and based on the quality, you build better relationships with your patrons and learn more about their stories.

name: Belts of Iron
summary:
Belts of Iron is an open world, third-person, factory building game. As a solo developer your support and feedback is crucial to the continued development of the game.
Explore vast procedurally generated worlds where every playthrough offers something new. Venture off in search of rich resource deposits, uncover unique landscapes, and share your favorite world seeds with friends. But beware, exploration comes at a cost, native hostile creatures roam the planet so you'll need to be prepared!

Build sprawling factories that stretch across the terrain, connected with miles of conveyor belts. Merge and split belts of items to optimize production lines and keep your factory running at peak efficiency. From simple smelters to complex oil refineries, every machine pushes your automation further as you expand your industrial empire!

name: Belladonna
summary:
Belladonna is a gothic adventure game, twisted and dark. Take the role of a corpse girl rising from the dead in an abandoned laboratory, and unravel the mysteries concerning your own death and reanimation.

The game explores various themes, such as the role of villains and heroes, moral value systems and different kinds of horror. It’s a point-and-click adventure, and it will ask you to read longer texts which are inspired in style by Mary Shelley’s novel, Frankenstein or The Modern Prometheus. This game is not scary in the way in which a Hollywood horror flick is scary, but it is certainly no child’s play. The story goes into an eerie place beyond life and death, and puts you into the mind of the unliving creatures and their worldviews.

name: Beyond Babel
summary: Your village, Renesco, is not safe. The dangers of your post- apocalyptic world threaten its very existence. It is up to you to save it, or destroy it if you like.

name: Beach Games
summary: Your life is like a fairy tale... You worked hard on your internet startup for the last few years. The dating site you created turned out to be a spectacular success, and you became a millionaire youngster...

name: Ben's World
summary: This game takes you through many open worlds. Explore the worlds through stunning graphics and beautiful views. You have to explore what this game has to offer, this game will truly blow you away.

name: Beat Saber: Britney Spears - "Overprotected"
summary: Get the track ‘Overprotected’ by Britney Spears on Beat Saber now. This track is part of Britney Spears Music Pack.

name: Beyond the Doors
summary: Explore an office building hiding a sinister lab underneath. Question reality as the world is warped and distorted around you. Every door leads to a new nightmare. What is real deep down in the recesses of your mind? Some demons cannot be defeated - you can only keep running.

name: Beer Factory
summary: Beer Factory is a business simulation and management game. Take the challenge, manage your own beer factory, employees, production lines, import and export of the merchandise.

name: Beach de Reach!
summary: Beach de Reach! is a mahjong game developed by Natsu System and published by Mainichi Communications for the Sega Saturn.

name: Bella Wants Blood
summary: Entertain the god-like Bella’s thirst for blood in this absurd bite-sized roguelike terror defense game.

name: Ben 10: Omniverse
summary: In Ben 10: Omniverse, players can play as both Young and Teen Ben, switch forms between 13 playable alien heroes, including new aliens like Bloxx and Gravattack, and fight in an assortment of action-packed levels throughout the subterranean alien city of Undertown and other show-inspired locales.

name: Beanrise
summary: First-person Action, Puzzle-Solving game. Unfold the Mysteries of two interconnected timelines. Discover the truth of the present within the past!

name: Bells & Whistles
summary:
Detana!! TwinBee is a vertically scrolling shoot 'em up game following the same conventions established in the original TwinBee, where players assume the role of Light and Pastel taking control of TwinBee and WinBee across seven levels to defeat invading forces of the evil alien Iva and save planet Meru.

It was later re-released on PlayStation and Saturn as part of Detana TwinBee Yahho! Deluxe Pack, PlayStation Portable as part of TwinBee Portable, and Xbox 360 and PC through Game Room service.

name: Being Food
summary: Being Food is a third-person, Bird Game. In this puzzle-platformer, you play as a cute bird named Oolahla in what starts seemingly like a normal bird day. Something is different about today, though... Do you know what it takes to be a bird? Will you survive the bird day?

name: Bear, Vodka, Fall of Berlin!
summary: This time, Motherland sent you to fight against the Nazi forces to capture Berlin. Kill enemies to get the maximum chance of survival.

name: Beat Saber: Alan Walker - "Wake Up"
summary: Get the track ‘Wake Up’ by Alan Walker on Beat Saber now. This track is part of Monstercat Mixtape 2.

name: Beast of Reincarnation
summary: In post-apocalyptic Japan, humanity’s last hope may rest with Emma and her loyal canine companion, Koo. Explore what it means to be human in Beast of Reincarnation, an expansive one-person, one-dog action RPG built around demanding, technical combat. What awaits at journey’s end?

name: Berserk or Die
summary: This is an action game in which players attempt to survive by defeating a number of enemies which appear from the left and right sides of the screen. Use a unique keyboard-banging control scheme for maximum dopamine! Go Berserk, or Die!

name: Becalm
summary: Fancy a relaxing drift through magical waters? Enjoy this seafaring voyage in search of the sunset!

name: Beat Saber: Daft Punk - "One More Time"
summary: Get the track ‘One More Time’ by Daft Punk on Beat Saber now. This track is part of Daft Punk Music Pack.

name: Beyond The Tales
summary: A turn-based RPG about some friends that want to discover the meaning of their existence, but if they do, the world will end. This game will break the story to enter to a surreal aftergame experience.

name: Be My Princess
summary: Be My Princess is an otome game by Voltage Inc. You fall in love with a prince and establish an inter-class romance with royalty.

name: Become Barista!
summary: Become Barista is a charming café life-sim game. Run a café by stocking your shelves, preparing fresh ingredients, welcoming customers, expertly crafting coffee☕ and bread, upgrading your equipment and shop. Buy and decorate your dream house.

name: Bejeweled Twist
summary: Spin, match, explode... WOW! It's a brilliant new way to play Bejeweled! Get set for a vivid sensory rush as you spin and match explosive gems for shockwaves of fun. Rotate jewels freely to set up electrifying combos, outwit surprising obstacles like Locks and Bombs, and create high-voltage Flame and Lightning gems. When you need to dial up the intensity or fine-tune your skills, turn to Challenge mode or five-minute Blitz. And if relaxing is more your style, kick up your feet with stress-free Zen. No matter the mode, you'll discover new strategies, improve your moves, and find endless ways to win!

name: Below Benni's
summary: While urban exploring a long-forgotten bakery, the floor collapses beneath you and traps you underground. Now, you must find a way out — as it seems something has been trapped down here all this time. And it knows you’re here.

name: Be My Princess: Party
summary: A remaster of Be My Princess - the graphics are much more clean cut, icons were redesigned and new ones were also added.

name: Beside Myself
summary: You have to play as the historian-journalist Michael, plunge into the atmosphere of darkness of an abandoned hospital, where you will need to unravel the secrets of the past and try to get out in order to tell the whole world about those terrible events.

name: Benny Bash
summary: Survive this horror/puzzle adventure. Uncover the secrets of a cursed video game from the '80s while a malevolent entity hunts you. Solve escape room-style puzzles, navigate eerie labyrinths, and see how your actions in the game shape the real world. Stay sharp... and stay alive.

name: Beats Warrior: Nian
summary: Nian and Bao never miss the chance of adventure! They formed a team to go to the Rune Desert for a thrilling journey. Nian will use special beat combat techniques to defeat creatures and bosses in several worlds.

name: Bedtime: Turn Off the Life
summary: This is a third-person adventure game based on the traditional Chinese funeral custom of do Seven. Are there ghosts in this world? Nobody knows, let alone how to see a ghost. I heard that if you do Seven Destructions, you can see the dead paper figures. How about giving it a try? Then pass away!

name: Beatmania 4thMix: The Beat Goes On
summary:
beatmania 4thMIX is a rhythm game developed by Konami. It is the fourth numbered game in the beatmania series (but 5th beatmania arcade game) and is part of the BEMANI franchise.

The game is played with a controller with one turn table and 5 keys, three white and two black. On the screen you will see bars moving from the top to bottom in columns representing each of the keys and the turntable. When the bars reach the judgement line it is time to scratch.

beatmania 4thMIX is the first big redesign of the series, it features a brand new interface. Difficulty is now on a scale from 1 to 7. All songs have been given a single and double mode chart. Song list shows not only genre and title, but artist as well.

Although all previous beatmania songs have been removed. a brand-new set of 23 songs was added as a replacement. It is the first time that licensed songs makes an appearance in the series, as well as crossovers from other BEMANI games.

name: Beast's Bane
summary: In the shadowed depths of the cursed forest, a brave warrior bound to face the lurking monsters takes your place. Will you break the curse and restore peace, or succumb to the darkness? The fate of the realm lies in your hands!

name: Bear No Grudge
summary:
Take control of Bear and shoot, skate, race your way to justice across multiple locations in this action adventure game with a bite.

Bear no grudge is a grizzly action adventure game with bite.

In Bear No Grudge, players take control of a vengeful bear on a mission to take down the careless international delivery corporation, Forest Inc, that left his friend in a wheelchair. and destroying the planet This action-packed game features multiple locations, each with its own unique gameplay mechanics and challenges. Players will have to use their wits and quick reflexes to defeat enemies and bosses, while also navigating challenging environments on skateboards, hovercrafts and paws. As they progress, players can find hidden collectables to upgrade abilities to help them on their mission. With its diverse gameplay, Bear No Grudge offers a thrilling and satisfying gaming experience for anyone who enjoys fun. Set across 11 different levels you will pursue the evil CEO, Taking down hench men and a variety of baddies and leaving destruction in your path.

name: Below
summary: BELOW is a co-op horror game about scavenging and cleaning trashed, abandoned deep sea outposts and research sites to repay your debt to a shady corporation!

name: Bento Bugs
summary: Dispatching these simple beetles should be no problem at all! Protect your food from pesky pests! If you’re lucky, you might catch an illusive scarab. Winner of Ludum Dare game jam 56.

name: Beauty Jigsaw: Image Pack
summary: This DLC contains 120 beauty images from the game itself.

name: Beyond the Wizard
summary: This is a 2D action hardcore flatformer game. Get into the simple but difficult world of Beyond the Wizard! If you have enough patience, this game will not be difficult!

name: Beast OL
summary: Beast OL is a classic real-time turn based game. The game is set in a mythical era where the four major races of humans, immortals, demons, and ghosts coexist. There are eight advanced professions such as Vajra and Asura that interact and overcome each other.

name: Beat Saber: Monstercat Mixtape 2
summary:
This music pack includes these tracks:

- Accelerate
- DABADABADABADABA
- Dead Man Walking
- Endgame
- Final Boss
- Memory Bank
- Mercenary
- Pump
- RAD
- RIOT
- Thrones of Blood
- Wake Up

name: Beat the Clock
summary: Beat the Clock is a turn-based Rogue-like RPG in a fantasy world. Form your team amongst the twenty heroes available. Travel back in time, experience various random events and face the disaster that caused the end of Humanity. The clock is ticking... run, die and retry!

name: Beebo & Luna
summary: Start a healing journey with Beebo and Luna on your desktop! When you are with Beebo and Luna, the melody of time turns into the light of stars. Change outfits for Beebo and Luna, decorate the warm Dream Oracle House, meet mysterious travelers and start an incredible adventure.

name: Beihai 2010
summary: An emotional point-and-click adventure about youth, love, and growing up. Explore Namo's memories and uncover a touching story of friendship and first love in the city of Beihai.

name: Beat Fever: Music Planet
summary: Tap to the beat of the biggest songs from Nicki Minaj, Sia, Daddy Yankee, Marshmello, Lady Gaga, Beethoven and hundreds more! Beat Fever is the ultimate music game featuring top hits from pop, rock, EDM, classical, latin, hip-hop and more! Play the top hits in the world like Despacito, Super Bass, Uptown Funk, Poker Face, Happy and Beethoven’s 5th! Discover new music added EVERY MONTH from tomorrow’s biggest singers, bands, DJs, composers, and rappers.

name: Bed Dream, First Draft
summary: This piece contains aspects of body horror, self-harm, and other potentially triggering elements.

name: Benign Land
summary: A short, dreamlike experience where you drift through haunting scenes set in Ireland, from pagan times to recent historical events, revolving around the Troubles of Northern Ireland.

name: Beyond the Diorama: Caribou World
summary: In partnership with the Natural History Museum of Los Angeles County, USC students harnessed emerging technology to create immersive experiences to illustrate how the climate crisis is affecting habitats across the world.

name: Beardy the Digger
summary: You play as a gnome digger who wants to collect all the diamonds in order to return home. It will not be easy for him to do this, because at every step he is in danger - from red-hot lava to poisoned darts. Be careful and attentive, and you can help the dwarf collect all the diamonds!

name: Between Sky and Earth
summary: Germany, 1933, a hypnotist's performance fails, leading him to swap fates with an audience member. Realizing he has less than ten hours to live, he must solve riddles and harness his hypnosis and mind-reading abilities to restore things. Can he gain time in his battle against death?

name: Become Deity
summary: Ascending to Immortal "is a horizontal board combat adventure game with a cultivation theme. You are the last bloodline of a cultivation family. In this era of sparse spiritual energy, in this gradually recovering spiritual forest, it will be your last chance to embark on the path of immortality.

name: Beguile
summary: A completely command-based online PvP party game!! Successfully confess and you win! Fail and you lose! Enjoy a thrilling psychological battle as each person's feelings intersect!

name: Beatmania Append 3rdMix Mini
summary:
Beatmania Append 3rdMix Mini is a smaller version of the PlayStation game Beatmania Append 3rdMix, it contains the same features as the main version but only five songs: find out, life goes on, Queen's Jamaica, tribe groove, and wild I/O.

The game came bundled with the soundtrack for the bBeatmania 3rdMix arcade game, titled Beatmania 3rdMix complete.

Since this is an Append release, it needs another Beatmania title to act as a key disc to boot the game.

The game is played with a controller with one turn table and 5 keys, three white and two black. On the screen you will see bars moving from the top to bottom in columns representing each of the keys and the turntable. When the bars reach the judgement line it is time to scratch.

Unlike the arcade counterpart, the PlayStation version does not have a combo counter. Expert mode is also missing from this version of the game.

name: Better End
summary: Better End is a mod for Minecraft that adds improvements to the End dimension into Minecraft, including over 24 new biomes and structures. The mod even adds in new items, such as wood types and other alternatives to overworld materials.

name: Beyond Memories: Darkness of the Soul
summary: Don the cloak of a Grim Reaper and free tormented souls in a non-violent, spooky adventure with 11 haunting tales.

name: Better Than Wolves
summary:
Better Than Wolves is a modification for the sandbox survival game Minecraft, created by the developer FlowerChild.
It's know as a "Total Conversion" mod, introducing new survival challenges, a new hunger system, hostile monster behaviours, & environmental threats.
BetterThanWolves was initially created in protest to Minecraft updates at the time lacking in interesting content. Specifically with the introduction of wolves.
As of 2021, BetterThanWolves has ceased development, permanently.

name: Belle Boomerang
summary:
Face off against an army of ever-changing foes and turn their own powers against them in Belle Boomerang!
Play as Belle, the destined heroine, and master her legendary boomerang! Through the effects of a mysterious spell, the beloved monarchs have been transformed into hostile beasts! Defeat them in battle, lift their curse, and infiltrate the corrupted tower to raise the curtain on this evil scheme! But no boomerang alone can save this kingdom... Belle Boomerang will be tossing cherries, soaring through flame-filled skies, possessing ancient statues, and more!

name: Beat Saber: Skrillex - "First of the Year (Equinox)"
summary: Get the track 'First of the Year (Equinox)' by Skrillex and slash the beats! This track is part of Skrillex Music Pack, brought to you by OWSLA/Atlantic Records. Music Downloads Not Rated by the ESRB Music Downloads Not Rated by PEGI

name: Being Mindful
summary: In this awareness game you try to maintain awareness of aspects of your body for as long as you can. Body awareness is practiced sitting, standing, doing yoga, simple tai chi and other exercises.

name: Beyond Reach
summary:
Beyond Reach is a DLC sized mod that takes place in the east of High Rock, commonly known as The Reach. You will experience a story of intrigue, conspiracies sowed by both men and gods, and the struggles of those in the most squalid situations.

The reach, a land of grey skies with no respite beneath them. Where the soil is drenched with the tears of Kynareth and the love of Mara has little haven.

Where a pox ravages the lands to the west, and threatens to spill further to endanger the whole of Tamriel.

Take your adventures beyond Markarth to encounter a new spiteful realm, full with danger and the shelter you find isn't free from the horrors outside.

Is this despair caused by the people? Or by some force that lurks beyond the ether? Do the Witchmen act on their own behalf? Or are they the puppets of something much more sinister?

These questions will be found out as you trek your way across quagmires, cliff faces, dense valleys and the bitter cold.

Exploration is a key feature of this mod, with multiple shortcuts and unlikely routes making your trek across the region more exhilarating, yet more dangerous.

Quality voice acting and an engrossing Main Quest will have you immersed in the harrowing story of a downtrodden land and people.

name: Beat
summary: Basically, the purpose of this game is to pass a level, and listen to the music. Pass a level, and try a harder one. Just use your mouse to choose, and use your spacebar to play, EASY!!! Everyone can play the music. Now, there are 11 different songs in the game, and there will be more. You can also upload your own song in the game. For those music fans, if you want your self-composed music to appear in our game, you are welcome to email me. On the other hand, there is a BPM testing feature in our game. It might be useful for some of our player.

name: Bearly Brave
summary: Bearly Brave is a 2D roguelike deck-building game set in a deceptively charming toy shop, where the cutest teddy bears come to life each night to fight in a no-holds-barred tournament that determines their placement on the shelves, and thus their likeness to be taken to their forever home.

name: Below the Surface: Uncovering the Truth in the Sewers
Beat the Heat
summary: You have 10 years to make your territory sustainable or it won't survive the great heat of the future. Reap your harvest, solve typical problems of the zone and reinvest in the land in a strategic way to create conscience in your people about the necessary changes for their survival.

name: Beyond Enemy Lines: Covert Operations
summary: Think your way in, observe the enemies and sneak into their base and complete your objective. You have the total freedom to choose your path - guns blazing or silent assassin - it's your choice! Beyond Enemy Lines is an unforgiving, intense experience where skill and tactical decisions matter! Beyond Enemy Lines: Covert Operations is taking the unique Beyond Enemy Lines gameplay to the Nintendo Switch. And is one of the first hardcore tactical FPS for Nintendos console. Beyond Enemy Lines: Covert Operations is a port of the 8 mission long story campaign of Beyond Enemy Lines from 2017. It contains the full experience of it's PCs bigger brother. While running on an entirly new game core directly adapted for the use on Nintendo Switch.

name: Beat Saber: BTS - "Dionysus"
summary: Get the track ‘Dionysus’ by BTS on Beat Saber now. This track is part of BTS Music Pack.

name: Bermuda
summary: Trapped in an alien submarine, Edward's faith will be tested in a tale of trust and deceit. Bermuda is a visual novel mixed with open ended stealth puzzles.

name: Beat Saber: Imagine Dragons - "Believer"
summary: Get the track 'Believer' by Imagine Dragons and slash the beats! This track is part of the Imagine Dragons Music Pack, brought to you by Universal Music.

name: Beauty Contest
summary: Clara wants to take first place in a Beauty Contest but meets her long-time rival Sherly and childhood friend Olivia. Will Clara be able to win, or will other feelings awaken in her?

name: Beyblade Burst: Battle Zero
summary:
From being a sought-after manga, to being physically played by countless fans, Beyblade is spinning its way to Nintendo Switch this 2018. Beyblade Burst: Battle Zero makes the toy-spinning mania fully realized. But, the game will be available for Japan only--as of press time.

If you're an avid fan and collector, Beyblade Burst: Battle Zero will kill two birds with one stone. Apart from special edition that fans will get, it will also feature a game-exclusive Beyblade with every copy. Spin your Switch to something exciting with Beyblade Burst: Battle Zero!

name: Be Rich
summary: Take charge of Be Rich Inc. where you are CEO to the hottest new real estate firm in the country. Build housing for undeveloped zones, provide your tenants with shopping and maintenance services, decorate greenways, builds stadiums, it's all at your fingertips. If you can raise capital, you can turn the neighborhood of your dreams into a reality. Act now before your profit margin slips away!

name: Better With A Friend
summary: Better With A Friend is a collection of hand drawn mini-games that you can only play with somebody else on a Steam Deck.

name: Ben 10
summary: Ben, Gwen, and Grandpa Max once again have their cross-country road trip in the Rust Bucket cut short by super villains and their evil, world-threatening plans. As Ben Tennyson, it’s up to you to save the world. Take on some of Ben’s most infamous enemies, including Zombozo, Queen Bee, and the Weatherheads. Unlock and transform into all ten of Ben’s incredible alien forms. Use each alien’s powerful combat moves to lay the beat-down on enemies with devastating combos, and solve puzzles with each alien’s unique abilities as you unravel exciting new stories in three all-new playable episodes.

name: Beautiful Light
summary: Beautiful Light is a PvPvP(vE) tactical first-person extraction shooter where 6 squads of 3 operators are tasked with entering, securing, and extracting an artifact in a hostile, horrific environment. Face other operators and player-controlled anomalies, but beware: mistakes can risk your life and gear.

name: Beyond the Pitch
summary: Dig beneath the pitch and uncover secrets no one was meant to find.

name: Beyblade: Metal Fusion - Battle Fortress
summary: The Bladers have returned for a shot at the World Beyblading Championships. The action is hotter than ever with each team bringing their enhanced spinning Beyblades to battle. Beybladers customize their Beyblades with different parts for winning strategies with offense and defensive abilities. In addition, each Beyblade is equipped with special attacks to fight with making no battle the same! Execute the Special Attack to inflict enormous damage to your opponent! Become the No.1 Beyblader by utilizing customization and special attacks!

name: Beast Master and Prince: Flower & Snow
summary:
Follows a young woman named Tiana who would like to be a beastmaster like her mother. She came across four animals that she bought along with a strange brooch. Unfortunately, they are actually the prices from Fasan Kingdom who are under the spell Players can get to know Matheus, Alfred, Lucia, and Erik, the four brothers, and help them break the spell (You could also end up with her childhood friend)
Includes both the original Moujuutsukai to Ouji-sama and the fan disc Moujuutsukai to Ouji-sama Snow Bride. In the fandisc, you can see side stories and an epilogue for each character

name: B.E.A.S.T.S.

name: Behind Zombie Lines

The apocalypse is here and you are stuck behind zombie lines. Here, the time is limited and you cannot afford to stop. To stay alive, you must shoot your way through the hungry hordes of the undead. Do remember, your gun is your only friend here because, between the zombies and you, only one can survive. 
 
Get involve yourself in a thrilling Zombie Survival Game. 
Keep your defense and shoot zombies in FPS view. 
 
How to Play: 
-------------------------------------------- 
- Shoot Zombies with different guns 
- Upgrade weapons 
- Experience the 3D shooting thrill 
- Run as much as you can to be at the top 
 
Features:

- Stunning graphics with lighting and post-process effects 
- Explosive fun that will leave your heart pounding 
- Enjoy the multiple modes 
- 3D characters and environments with an unprecedented level of detail 
 
The Best FPS Zombie Survival Shooting Game on Mobile! 
Play Now for FREE and share your REVIEWS!

summary: Get the track 'ROCK IT' by Tokyo Machine, slash the beats, and show the world how you rock! This track is part of Rocket League x Monstercat Music Pack, brought to you by Monstercat & Psyonix.

name: Best Sellers Complete Bundle
summary: In this Bundle, you'll find our studio's Best Sellers for Xbox and Windows, including Mr. T-Shirt, with adventures in a paper world; Little Bear, featuring a bear cub on a quest for honey; Slime Ranger, a strategic quest to defeat the Slime King; and Sunbeam Feast, a challenging precision platformer.

name: BeachHead Rogue
summary: BH Rogue is the next exciting iteration of the BeachHead brand. It blends the action FPS of the original BeachHead game with new Rogue-lite elements.

name: Beat Saber: Teminite & Skybreak - "Accelerate"
summary: Get the track ‘Accelerate’ by Teminite & Skybreak on Beat Saber now. This track is part of Monstercat Mixtape 2.

name: Bear, Vodka, Stalingrad!

name: Beyond Dark Castle

name: Best Plumber
summary: Help the young plumber hold the water in the right direction as fast as you can.

name: Beauties Unveiled 2

name: Beat Saber: Hip Hop Mixtape
