summary: Get the track 'Rollin' (Air Raid Vehicle)' by Limp Bizkit and slash the beats! This track is part of Interscope Mixtape, brought to you by Interscope Records. Music Downloads Not Rated by the ESRB Music Downloads Not Rated by PEGI

name: Beatcraft Cyclon
summary:
The first series of the Beatcraft brand, a rhythm game developed by Nurijoy in 2014.

On May 6, 2014, it was released under the working title of "Project736T", and on May 29, the original project name, "Beatcraft Cyclon", was revealed.

Participating composers were NieN, Paul Bazooka, Mr. Funky, ND Lee, PlanetBoom, Electronic Boutique, 3rd Coast, Makou, Nauts, and other artists who had previously submitted songs to the DJMAX series. Also, Takahiro Eguchi, a composer and BMS producer belonging to Super Sweep/Nano Sounds, participated as a new artist. According to the phrase 'ARCADE THE FIRST' in the PV, it was first released as an arcade. However, due to the failure of the game, it is unknown whether the Beatcraft brand will continue to other models.

name: Beat Saber: Lady Gaga, Colby O’Donis - "Just Dance (feat. Colby O’Donis)"
summary: Get the track 'Just Dance' by Lady Gaga and slash the beats! This track is part of the Lady Gaga Music Pack, brought to you by Interscope Records. Music Downloads Not Rated by the ESRB Music Downloads Not Rated by PEGI

name: Beat Saber: Rudimental - "Waiting All Night (feat. Ella Eyre)"
summary: Get the track 'Waiting All Night (feat. Ella Eyre)' by Rudimental and slash the beats! This track is part of the Electronic Mixtape, brought to you by Warner Music UK, Ltd..

name: Beauty and the Beast
summary: Take a dive into the magic world of your favorite fairy tale Beauty and the Beast! Experience unusual 360-degree panoramas and 3D views in the classic Hidden Object game! Help Belle to go through all the ordeals and find love!

name: Between Two Worlds
summary:
What will you do when the boundary between fantasy and reality collapses?

You and your friends are playing a simple tabletop game, adventuring in the fantasy world of Euchora. But strange things start happening to you. An unknown woman is visiting you in the night. Your friends have started to behave in strange, unusual ways. What is going on?

name: Beatmania IIDX 12 Happy Sky
summary: Beatmania IIDX 12 Happy Sky is one of the many titles in Konami's IIDX rhythm game series, featuring more than 80 tracks, primarily from the arcade version of the same title. As usual for the beatmania series, the player is given seven piano keys and a turntable, and must play along with the notes that scroll down the screen to play the music. All of the game modes from the previous title have returned: Arcade, Expert, Class, Beginner's, Free, Training, and Gallery. The game also includes support for Internet score ranking (now discontinued) and custom-made Arcade courses.

name: Beyond Good & Evil: 20th Anniversary Edition
summary: Swoop into the marvelous world of Hillys as action-reporter Jade to investigate the mysterious DomZ alien attacks alongside colorful characters, like her adoptive uncle Pey’j or the valiant Double H. Embark on this epic adventure in up to 4K, 60 fps with improved graphics, controls, and audio, along with brand-new autosave and cross-save features. Enjoy exclusive new rewards as you explore the planet and discover more about Jade’s past in a new treasure hunt throughout Hillys. Put your skills to the test thanks to the new speedrun mode and updated achievements, and learn more about the game’s development and secrets in the anniversary gallery! Armed with her daï-jo and faithful camera, Jade’s adventure will get you to freely explore Hillys, combat creatures large and small, infiltrate dangerous areas, solve enigmatic puzzles, play addictive mini-games, race the best hovercraft pilots, and take pictures of the whole experience.

name: Bears Can't Drift!?
summary: Bears Can't Drift!? is an action packed Kart Racer set in a beautifully stylised world. Out now on Early access, race across a variety of tracks and game modes with up to four player split-screen. Time to find out if Bears really can Drift!

name: Bepuzzled Animals Jigsaw Puzzle
summary: 103 Puzzles – what great value! This game showcases a wide variety of animals and is great for animal lovers! User friendly User Interface 'Magnetic' puzzle pieces to make life easier Calming music What more do you need and at such great value!

name: Berserk B.I.T.S
summary:
Train and level up your B.I.T.S (Battle.Intelligent.Teammate.System). Team up with your digital buddy collect battle chips and take on the internet. Battle viruses explore new biomes and defeat powerful bosses!

Berserk B.I.T.S is an idle-rpg, auto-battler, chip-collecting game that runs on your desktop alongside your other applications. Re-position the game so you can comfortably work and monitor the progress of your B.I.T or minimize it completely and let it go in the background!

Collect and craft a plethora of battle chips to be used in real-time during battle. Each battle chip is placed in an ever growing library that you can strive to fill out. Get medals for completing tasks or kick back and spend time decorating your perfect HOME NET.

Level up your B.I.T by dropping them on a mission and taking on the internet, exploring different biomes! Be involved and monitor their battles and use battle chips you've collected in real time and help your B.I.T succeed - or sit back and relax, work on other tasks while you send your B.I.T to handle business!

name: Beyond the Grove
summary: Summon nature’s army in this charming RTS-inspired autobattler. With your troop of mushroom warriors and over 50 unique elemental Golems by your side, command your fun-guy forces to push back the corruption beyond your grove. Strategize, adapt, and overcome!

name: Better Days
summary: This is a new type of PVE combat game that combines elements such as shooting, skill-based battles, exploration, search-and-destroy missions, PVE combat, survival in a free-roaming environment, vehicle control, and character customization.

name: Beneath
summary: Plunge into a treacherous and enigmatic underwater world and brace yourself to confront the heart-stopping horrors that await as you fight against all odds.

name: Beam
summary: Beam is a precision platformer with puzzle elements in which you need to manipulate various light beams in order to find a way out of a crashed spaceship. Discover a rich backstory and experience the hilarious interaction between Cpt. Martin and his intelligent and sassy escape pod MARBLE!

name: Bermuda: Lost Survival
summary: Survivors, Adventurers, Explorers! Prepare for the journey of your life and experience one of the world’s most mysterious regions! The Bermuda Triangle is notorious for the vanishing of countless ships and airplanes. Will you survive long enough to reveal it’s secret?

name: Beavageddon
summary: Fire up your bulldozer and set out for vengeance in Beavageddon! Reduce cities to rubble while fighting off hordes of enemies trying to stop your rampage. Upgrade your bulldozer, enhance your arsenal, and unlock new animal pilots with unique skillsets in this roguelike auto-shooter.

name: Beta Decay
summary: The development of positronic propulsion technology has granted the ability for mankind to travel beyond the Sol system, to its neighboring star system, Alpha Centauri. Survive in the new frontier amongst an exponential uprising of mega-corporations, factions, and syndicates.

name: Behind Border Zone
summary: Behind Border Zone is a PC VR game with Oculus support, in which the player has the opportunity to receive an immersive experience in three different worlds.

name: Beastly Tactics
summary: A turn-based role-playing game where you embody a clever animal, facing off against others in strategic battles resolved through intuition and deception. Outsmart your opponents using the timeless tactics of Rock, Paper, Scissors.

name: Be the Ruler: Britannia
summary: Be the Ruler: Britannia is a Choose-Your-Own-Adventure RPG set in early medieval England. You are the king. Found a dynasty, and play your descendants later. Wear the crown, gain allies, plot, defend lands. Play many times to discover the full possibilities!

name: Beyond.Frontiers
summary: In beyond.frontiers, you take on the role of an intrepid explorer, free to venture through the universe and beyond the known boundaries of three empires to discover new systems, encounter friends and foes, and engage in thrilling battles. With a large, freely moddable universe and several storylines, this game promises an unforgettable adventure where every decision might shape the fate of the galaxy.

name: Beyond-Human
summary:
The games completion is currently dependent on the funding through Kickstarter.

"Beyond-Human is a combination of platformer and hack & slash inspired by Metroid, Megaman, and Devil May Cry. Beyond-Human builds upon the classic open-world Metroidvania style by mixing a deep hack and slash combat system, exploration, and 16-bit pixel art. The combat is inspired by an exciting mix of the Metroid and Devil May Cry franchises. The combat may feel similar to people that have enjoyed Devil May Cry and Guacamelee. Melee combat is all about performing combos that are easy to do but hard to master. You will also unlock new weapons by defeating bosses and mini bosses to improve your arsenal."

name: Before
summary: Survive a brutal primal world on 100-player top-down PvP/PvE servers. Craft tools, found settlements, recruit survivors, specialize, and endure. Achieve mastery in Science, Faith, Culture, or Combat - and Dominate your rivals to Ascend in Glory.

name: Beat Saber: Nitro Fun - "Final Boss"
summary: Get the track ‘Final Boss’ by Nitro Fun on Beat Saber now. This track is part of Monstercat Mixtape 2.

name: Beat Saber: The Pussycat Dolls - "Don't Cha"
summary: Get the track 'Don't Cha' by The Pussycat Dolls and slash the beats! This track is part of Interscope Mixtape, brought to you by Interscope Records. Music Downloads Not Rated by the ESRB Music Downloads Not Rated by PEGI

name: Bella: The girl in the Woods
summary: A game Inspired by true events that happened to a guy went he went camping alone in the forest and encountered a girl in the middle of the night. Out of curiosity he searched all over the forest and found an abandoned house where he learned the secrets of Bella and the reason behind missing people.

name: Beneath The Surface
summary: A man searches for his missing friends in the woods and discovers an abandoned property with dark secrets. As the horrors unravel, a deranged inhabitant drags him into a supernatural nightmare. Uncover the truth, face psychological terrors, and fight to survive—or lose your sanity.

name: Between Horizons
summary: Between Horizons is a narrative 2.5D sci-fi detective adventure. 33 years into the Zephyr's journey, its mission is suddenly jeopardized. Can you find the culprit before it's too late? Experience an enthralling story set in a semi-open world that branches and ends based on your choices.

name: Beat Saber: Feint - "We Won't Be Alone (feat. Laura Brehm)"
summary: Get track "We Won't Be Alone (feat. Laura Brehm)" by Feint, slash the beats and show the world how you are rocking it in Beat Saber. This track is part of Monstercat Music Pack Vol. 1.

name: Beat Saber: Daft Punk - "Get Lucky (feat. Pharrell Williams and Nile Rodgers)"
summary: Get the track ‘Get Lucky (feat. Pharrell Williams and Nile Rodgers)’ by Daft Punk on Beat Saber now. This track is part of Daft Punk Music Pack.

name: Beat Saber: Kendrick Lamar - "Not Like Us"
summary: SHOCK DROP: Get the trending track ‘Not Like Us’ by Kendrick Lamar on Beat Saber now.

name: Beat Saber: Skrillex, Justin Bieber & Don Toliver - "Don’t Go"
summary: Get the track 'Don’t Go' by Skrillex and slash the beats! This track is part of Skrillex Music Pack, brought to you by OWSLA/Atlantic Records. Music Downloads Not Rated by the ESRB Music Downloads Not Rated by PEGI

name: Beat Saber: BTS - "Burning Up (Fire)"
summary: Get the track ‘Burning Up (Fire)' by BTS on Beat Saber now. This track is part of BTS Music Pack.

name: Beat Saber: Metallica - "Sad but True"
summary: Get the track ‘Sad But True’ by Metallica on Beat Saber now. This track is part of Metallica Music Pack.

name: Beat.R.
summary: 3D blocks exploding everywhere while colors and sounds delight you in every way. This infinite runner is sure to grab your attention for at least 30 seconds.

name: Beatmania 7thMix: Keepin' Evolution
summary:
beatmania 7thMIX is a rhythm game developed by Konami. It is the twelfth game in the beatmania series and is part of the BEMANI franchise.

The game is played with a controller with one turn table and 5 keys, three white and two black. On the screen you will see bars moving from the top to bottom in columns representing each of the keys and the turntable. When the bars reach the judgement line it is time to scratch.

7thMIX allow the player to have separate lanes for the two black keys. Instead of in between the lanes of the white keys. This makes the lanes much closer to the beatmania IIDX series. 1-Turn scratches are introduces, where you need to turn the turntable exactly once to get the best score.

MANIAC has been renamed back to ANOTHER again. All singles and double charts has been re-rated and for the first time in the series the rate for the single chart and the double chart are rated separately.

The game has 27 songs returning from 6thMIX and introduced an additional 32 songs for a total of 59 songs.

name: Beyond the Bridge
summary: Beyond the Bridge is a tribute to one of the earliest roguelikes, Moria. Your journey begins with creating your character by choosing a class. From there, you'll explore six procedurally generated levels before reaching the goal of your quest and making your escape!

name: Best Sniper Legacy
summary: What kind of legacy do you want to leave as the last sniper leaving on Earth? Breathe in and ready your weapon!

name: BeatBeat
summary: BeatBeat is the first of its kind: A rhythm platformer. Left hand moves, right hand grooves. Every level is packed with vaporwave aesthetics and funky beats. Beat Beat the game.

name: Best Pearl
summary: Best Pearl is a shooter where one of the sea inhabitants repels attacks, protecting the pearl he found. Be careful the steering wheel landing can hurt you. Don't let them get it. They must not reach her. You can handle it.

name: Beautiful Japanese Scenery: Animated Jigsaws
summary: Animated Jigsaws is a jigsaw puzzle game with video instead of pictures. “Beautiful Japanese Scenery” contains moving images from Japanese famous places including Mt. Fuji, Kyoto, Tokyo, the Snow Monkeys in a natural hot spring and more!

name: Beach Boys: Tarot Hot Cards
summary: Discover the power of tarot and win the boy of your dreams. Let the cards reveal the secrets to capturing his heart. Make love work in your favor!

name: Beyond Good & Evil 2
summary: Beyond Good & Evil 2 marks the return of one of Ubisoftís most beloved games. The prequel will transport players into a profoundly multicultural world, capturing the spirit of the original with unforgettable characters, grandiose decors and intense dramas that play out across a vast universe. Players will rise from lowly pirate to legendary captain at the helm of massive star-faring vessels, adventuring alongside crews of unforgettable characters to fight for freedom and theright to determine their own fate among the stars. Ubisoft Montpellier will be developing the game alongside its community of fans.

name: Bearskull
summary: Fight with your friend Skull in Top Down Dungeon Adventure, can you stop Sorkin?

name: Beat Saber: Skrillex – "Scary Monsters and Nice Sprites"
summary: Get the track 'Scary Monsters and Nice Sprites' by Skrillex and slash the beats! This track is part of Skrillex Music Pack, brought to you by OWSLA/Atlantic Records. Music Downloads Not Rated by the ESRB Music Downloads Not Rated by PEGI

name: Bearly Escape
summary:
Wild animals should roam free, but Kidd, a deranged scientist (the game’s antagonist), ventures into the forest to capture animals and use his twisted “X Serum,” he freezes the animals and subjects them to extraction and compression devices that strip away their consciousness, trapping it inside dolls. These dolls are then stuffed into claw machines, imprisoning the creatures in a nightmarish state.

As the protagonist, you ( a forest protection volunteer) lead a peaceful life in Everwood, a town nestled near the forest—until one day, your beloved dog, Robin, goes missing. This leads you to discover Kidd’s sinister lab, where you discover his horrific experiments. Now, it’s up to you to embark on a daring mission: free the trapped consciousness of the animals, rescue them from the claw machines, and help them escape the clutches of Kidd’s evil control, venture dangerously through forest terrane to escape, ultimately returning them to their natural habitat.

The stakes are high, and time is running out. The wild is calling. It’s time to claw your way to justice!

name: Beherit
summary:
Trapped and alone, you must uncover the truth behind the gemstone known as the Beherit and overcome its nightmare. 
 
It will be no easy task, requiring you to navigate an ever expanding level and solve a wide array of puzzles, all the while being hunted by an advanced AI system.

name: Beatsplosion! for Kinect
summary: A rhythm and fitness game for Xbox One Kinect by Virtual Air Guitar Company.

name: Below Zero
summary:
Below Zero is a tactical turn-based strategy and role-playing game for PC 
The main attention in project is taken by the fight system and accidental incidents on the map during the way. You will have to reach a certain point controlling the parameters: 1. Hunger 2. Temperature 3. Health. 
 
The fight system is a classic Active Time Battle, where you have to combine the abilities of the characters and think over the tactics of defeating the enemy. 
Also our goal is to surprise and interest the player during his campaign and give him a choice that will affect the plot of the game.

name: Be You 2
summary: Be You 2 is an interactive visual novel. In this sequel to "be you", you must raise a child by making story choices. There are multiple routes and endings based on your offspring's personality.

name: Bewildered
summary: Bewildered is a Platforming-Adventure game where you form a friendship with a peculiar monster as you go about solving a mystery of what brought upon the endless night to the mysterious island. Learn to trust and help each other face obstacles and fears, as you make it through a vibrant world.

name: Beek: Familiar Spirit - Remastered
summary:
A call for help within a mysterious messaging app. Someone lost and wandering through a forest in a faraway place. And their destiny in your hands.

Beek: How I Became a Familiar Spirit and Everything After That is a text-based narrative experience from the creators of Nekojishi. Featuring dozens of branching paths, multiple endings, and CG's to unlock!

Help Beek seek a way home, and face the darkness of this world with strength and courage.

name: Beodara
summary: Beodara is a game that takes place during the Middle Ages. You and your opponent will control a character who will be able to gather resources with different aims: build your village, hire peasants as well as knights and many other soldiers.

name: Ben 10: 007 - Character: Wildmutt
summary: Vulpimancers are beasts with incredible athletic ability and sharp quills that serve both as projectile weapons and finely tuned sense receptors.

name: Ben 10: 002 - Character: Four Arms
summary: Built for Battle, the Tetramand is a massive species with four powerful arms and a dense armor-plated skin.

name: Ben 10: 003 - Character: Stinkfly
summary: Lepidopterrans are an insectoid race with transparent wings, sturdy exoskeletons, and stinging tails that deploy a variety of chemical weapons.

name: Ben 10: 010 - Character: Grey Matter
summary: Galvans are five inches tall with soft flexible bones that allow them to squeeze into tight spaces or spring quickly from danger.

name: Ben 10: 005 - Character: XLR8
summary: Kinecelerans reach speeds of more than 500 MPH by manipulating friction, enabling them to defy gravity and run across sheer surfaces.

name: Beckon the Hellspawn
summary:
Survive against hordes of relentless creatures by using your arcane powers to defeat them. Gather their essence and use it to increase your magical prowess! Use the beacons lure them and defeat them, but be warned, the more time passes, the stronger they get.

Your mission? Survive until "It" arrives. When "it" arrives, destroy it.

name: Ben 10: 009 - Character: Ghostfreak
summary: Living phantoms, Ectonurites can phase through solid objects, make themselves invisible, and often inhabit other bodies for limited amounts of time.

name: Ben 10: 008 - Character: Diamondhead
summary: Warriors composed of jagged shards of crystals, Petrosapiens reflect light beams and can cut through virtually anything

name: Ben 10: 004 - Character: Ripjaws
summary: The Fighting Fish Volanns' jaw can grip with the strength of an industrial vise using rows of razor-sharp teeth that can chomp through almost anything.

name: Ben 10: 011 - Character: Upgrade
summary: Biomechanical Mecromorphs are able to merge with any technology and "Upgrade" it into an incredible piece of Ultra-Tech.

name: Beé! Frenzy Sheep
summary: Take on the role of Nick and try to guide a flock of crazed sheep! Each one has its own personality, and keeping them all in the pen will be a real challenge. Use strategy, quick reflexes and avoid total chaos. Can you tame this out-of-control flock?

name: Bejeweled 2
summary: Get set to play the world's #1 puzzle game, now for the Wii! Match sparkling gems three at a time to make them burst in showers of color and points. Match four or more to create flashy power gems that boost your score and your mood with brilliant cascades and combos. Soar to gem-matching heights in Classic mode, or speed through matches against the clock in Action. For even more dazzling fun, bump up your brainwaves with multi-faceted Puzzles, or enter the Zen state of Endless play. Every match is high-carat fun!

name: Be Hunted
summary: Be Hunted is a special co-op horror game, that combines ghost hunting, escape game, psychological horror, paranormal activity, and more. You can play alone, or up to 4 player for the basic gameplay mode. You will use your ghost hunting equipment to prepare yourself.

name: Beyond Enemy Lines
summary:
Think your way in, observe the enemies and sneak into their base and complete your objective. You have the total freedom to choose your path - guns blazing or silent assassin - it's your choice!  
  
Beyond Enemy Lines is an unforgiving, intense experience where skill and tactical decisions matter!

name: Beat of Life
summary: Hit the beat and watch her journey through life.

name: Beast Wars: Transformers
summary:
In BEAST WARS you travel along the planet's surface and explore many areas, looking to destroy any enemies that cross your path. The innovative auto-targeting system locks on to any enemies in your area and makes for some straightforward killing. However, don't think it's going to be easy, as you will have to dodge enemy gunfire at the same time.

Eventually, your character will use up his Energon supply and you will have to refuel by transforming into Beast mode. While in Beast mode you cannot attack, and your sole purpose is to find power-ups to restore your Energon. BEAST WARS offers 10 different transformers to choose from, each with their own traits.

You'll also have the chance to battle in four different environments, each having its own set of enemies. With 24 missions to play and eight bonus missions, you'll have plenty to keep you occupied.

name: Behind the Hydra's Eyes
summary: Welcome to Forward Green, Dave, we hope you're excited. Project Lagoon Breeze is a great opportunity to make connections, oversee construction, and manage community relations on an international scale. This role requires resilience, but we know you're up for it. Are you ready to make a difference?

name: Bear Soul
summary: Bear Soul is a game where you pass levels and fight against evil in various shapes, rescue your cub from the wizard's hands and bring peace to the forest. Bear Soul is divided into several games, each contains its own characters, mechanics and storyline, but they all are parts of the entire universe. This is the first game in the franchise, the beginning of the whole story and an incredible adventure.

name: Beyond a Steel Sky
summary:
From Charles Cecil, creator of the Broken Sword series, with art direction by Dave Gibbons, legendary comic book artist behind ‘Watchmen’, comes ‘Beyond a Steel Sky’, the long awaited sequel to the cult classic ‘Beneath a Steel Sky’.

‘Beyond a Steel Sky’ is a dramatic, humorous, cyberpunk thriller in which engaging puzzles drive a fast-paced narrative set in a dynamic gameworld that responds to – and is subverted by – the player’s actions.

name: Beat Saber: Panic! at the Disco - "Victorious"
summary: Get the track 'Victorious' by Panic! At The Disco and slash the beats! This track is part of the Panic! At The Disco Music Pack, brought to you by DCD2 / Fueled By Ramen / Elektra Music Group.

name: Beyond Golden Coins: Wario's Conquest + SML2 Reclaimed
summary:
Super Mario Land 2 is back!
Relive the golden days in this remake of a classic- spiced up with lots of new features!

name: BeatPunk!
summary: BeatPunk! is a top-down arena shooter roguelike where you play as a musician trying to survive a horde of robots by composing deadly songs. Choose from a variety of weapons, traits and sounds where each choice results in a different song and playstyle, making each playthrough unique.

name: Beyond Astra
summary: Beyond Astra is a real-time 4X sci-fi grand strategy game. Expand your own civilization, explore captivating and mysterious planets and star clusters, interact with your citizens and other life forms and shape your destiny through nearly infinite possibilities.

name: Beware Planet Earth!
summary: Beware Planet Earth! is a beguiling mix of classic tower defense and time management coming to PC via Steam for the first time. Save your cows from the Martian invasion by building an effective defense using towers, traps and objects, and also by firing your Zapper directly at the invading force of little green men.

name: Beach Bar Simulator
summary: Run your own beach bar on the shores of Miami Beach! Serve drinks, manage customers, and grow your business. Play solo or co-op, customize your bar, and create the ultimate summer hotspot! ️

name: Beyond Pearl Harbor: Pacific Warriors
summary: Imagine the classic Arcade game 1942 in 3D.

name: Beasts of Bermuda
summary: Beasts of Bermuda is a multiplayer survival game in which the player is a dinosaur or other prehistoric creature. A player can take the role of flyers, swimmers, herbivores, carnivores, and semi-aquatic creatures that fulfill different niches in the ecosystem. No matter what the player chooses to be, the objective of the game is to survive and grow up on the islands of Bermuda by using their particular creature's abilities. Predation from other players as well as intense environmental events are the antagonistic forces in the game the player must survive against.

name: Ben 10: 065 - Villain Defense: Smoke and Mirrors
Ben 10
summary: Ben 10 for Hyperscan came with 6 pack-in IntelliCards.

name: Bereshipsis
summary: Can you feel the clocks stop? Take control of the Existentials, the first inhabitants of Earth, beings capable of altering creation itself, and master destiny in an unforgettable tactical RPG

name: Ben 10: 006 - Character: Heatblast
summary: Pyronites are Masters of Fire, which they unleash on their enemies, they absorb both flames and heat and can put out a fire as easily as starting one.

name: Become the Smartest in the Room! Brain Power Boost Plan
summary: Have you ever wanted to become smarter? This guide shows you how to unlock the full potential of your brain and enhance your thinking, decision-making, and focus.

name: Ben 10: 001 - Character: Ben Tennyson
summary: Ben, his Grandpa Max and cousin Gwen head off on a summer camping trip to seek adventure - and with his new 'watch' Ben is certain to find it. Scan this card to save games.

name: Beak Island Visitor Center
summary: Congrats! You're now in charge of Beak Island's visitor center. This old gem's a bit rusty, and help's scarce, but don't let that stop you! Spruce up the island, cook up some treats, and bring back the buzz from 50 years ago. It's all in your hands now!

name: Bebshoru Lodbuka
summary: Turn-based combat game where you will fight against the demons of Bebshoru Lodbuka's hell until you reach Trekim Gogzokk's lair, and thus banish the darkness from the land of Abunouzeppan. You can make combat strategies by throwing cards that are sold in the Marketplace.

name: Beaky and the Egg Snatchers
summary: The Andromedan Armed Condors like to lay their eggs on the planet Crackit. The hostile natives, the Egg Snatchers, don't particularly like that and try to destroy the eggs. You are Beaky, one of the condors, who must protects his eggs.

name: Begraved
summary: A cosy & dark first-person co-op dungeon crawler where you loot cursed crypts, dodge traps, and flee from things that should not move. Escape with treasures snatched from the dead. Decorate your hideout, uncover buried secrets, and remember: the Taxman always comes for his due.

name: Beneath the Bell
summary: Beneath the Bell is a horror game that combines exploration, bizarre puzzles, and frightening paranormal phenomena, all enriched by brief action sessions. A gloomy and disturbing atmosphere, which changes and deforms due to paranormal events that you will unintentionally trigger.

name: Beat Saber: Bossfight - "Endgame"
summary: Get the track ‘Endgame’ by Bossfight on Beat Saber now. This track is part of Monstercat Mixtape 2.

name: Beach Rules
summary: Beach Rules will test your memory, visual agility and reflex through various tests. Keep the beach in order and compete in different events and mini-games!

name: Beyond Gravity
summary: Beyond Gravity is procedurally generated "platformer" where you jump in-between planets and try to collect as many pickups as you can. This gets progressively harder the further you jump. No need to worry tho as you can upgrade your character with loads of upgrades and power-ups! Take control of brave space explorer and hold out as long as you can while collecting missing parts of your spaceship. Never miss to build up crazy score multipliers.

name: Be King
summary: King or Nothing: Your Choices Forge Your Fate.​​ Embark on an epic adventure that blends ​deck-building​ and ​character progression. Master the ​elemental advantage​ and strategically ​synergize your cards​ to crush your enemy. ​Will you claim the throne or fall into oblivion? The challenge awaits.​

name: Benji Bananas
summary:
Benji Bananas is a free-to-play mobile game from Animoca Brands available for download on the App Store and Google Play. It is a popular action game (over 50 million downloads) in which players make Benji the monkey and his friends leap from vine to vine through the jungle.

The transition of Benji Bananas to P2E begins with owning the Benji Bananas Membership Pass NFT. This NFT (ERC-1155) allows owners to earn Primate tokens by playing Benji Bananas; Primate tokens can be swapped for ApeCoin and other coins within the Animoca Brands ecosystem!

name: Beauties Unveiled 2: Tiffany Level Pack
summary: Nothing ruins a good match like malfunctioning equipment. You get off the court, sit down, lose your concentration while applying a new overgrip and suddenly it’s over. Tiffany experienced it first-hand but she may have found another way to reignite the passion.

name: Beast Master and Prince: Snow Bride
summary:
Fandisc of Beast Master and Prince.
Included in the "Story Jar" app in English.

name: Beat Saber: Fall Out Boy - "Thnks fr th Mmrs"

name: Beat Saber: Queen - "We Will Rock You"

T-Rex with laser guns, Lions with machine guns VS. a flock of 50 seagulls; anything is possible! Watch as the beasts dismember and rip each other apart in gory detail!

name: Bernband
summary: Bernband is an indie adventure game. You are an alien in a low-fidelity world.

name: Beeknighted
summary:
On a stormy evening a marauding troll absconds with a beehive while being pursued by hunters. While the hunter's plans go awry, the troll stumbles into their pitfall trap, dragging the unfortunate bee with him. Separated from the broken fragments of her hive and stranded during a storm, the bee must find temporary refuge in the caves below the Bugbear Antfort and escape to safety.

Meet friends and foes, discover treasures and traps, and traverse the dangerous caverns in this adventure inspired by Nintendo 64-era classics.

name: Best Adventure 4-in-1 Bundle
summary: Endling – Extinction is Forever: As the last mother fox on Earth, your cubs need all your care to survive in a merciless world on the brink of destruction. Explore what is left of nature and defend your family against all threats.

name: Belonging
summary: Belonging is a game about a cult and its victims. As a thief scouting a potential location they want to steal from, the player searches an abandoned estate of a cult to find valuables and uncover uncomfortable truths about what happened to the people that lived there.

name: Beat Saber: Linkin Park - "New Divide"
summary: Get the track 'New Divide' by Linkin Park, slash the beats, and show the world how you rock! This track is part of Linkin Park Music Pack, brought to you by Warner Records and Universal Music Publishing Group.

name: Beyond Reality

name: Beneath Europa
summary: Explore the eerie depths of Europa to find extraterrestrial life.

name: Beach Runner
summary: Beach Runner is a casual runner game. Move the block/player so you dont fall into the water. If you touch the water will you start from the begining/start point. Complete the level and start the next level.

name: Beam Time
summary: A logic puzzle game where you redirect and split laser beams to create digital circuits. Through the campaign, you will explore basic logic gates, oscillators, latches, counters, adders, memory, and more.

name: Before the Dawn
summary:
In this apocalyptic medieval world, your survival relies on your ability to lead. 
 
With direct control of your followers out of your hands, you will need to build trust in order for them to listen to you. They can refuse orders, retreat in fear, and take what they feel is owed. 
 
Fulfill their needs, overcome challenges and resolve any conflicts that arise within your group and maybe, you might survive another night.

name: Beyond a Steel Sky: Beyond a Steel Book Edition
summary:
Beyond A Steel Sky: Beyond A SteelBook Edition Includes: Base Game, Limited Edition SteelBook featuring comic artwork by Dave Gibbons, Sticker Sheet, Digital Original Soundtrack

The World: An adventure set within a dynamic world, populated by willful characters and driven by motivations that the player can subvert; In combination with a unique hacking tool, multiple solutions to puzzles emerge from the player's choices

The Story: Unravel dark conspiracies and defeat a terrifying antagonist in this dramatic, humorous, cyberpunk thriller which explores contemporary themes, such as: social control, AI, and total surveillance

The Puzzles: Intelligent puzzles are interwoven with an intriguing dramatic narrative to deliver a compelling gameplay experience.

The Look: A beautifully detailed, comic-book styled world from the mind of legendary comic artist Dave Gibbons (Watchmen)

name: Bee Master
summary: A fearless bee sets out on a relentless journey to rescue his captured queen. Dodge vehicles across 4 perilous roads, collect 3 hidden keys, and uncover the island's mystery!

name: Beyond the Wall
summary: A great survival simulator set behind the wall! A game following the best traditions of roguelike games based on one of the most famous story of our time. Hold out in the frost as long as possible while avoiding the walking dead.

name: Behind the Smile

After a lifetime with your mom, who left her parents as a teen, you're sent to spend time with grandparents you've never met in their remote house. Use voice interaction to speak directly to them and uncover hidden truths as they respond in real-time

name: Beam Driver

Beam Driver — become a master driver and explore new horizons!
Get ready for an exhilarating adventure in the world of Beam Driver, where the lines between reality and virtuality blur! In this game, you will become a true driver capable of performing incredible tricks and maneuvers that will astonish even the most seasoned motorsport enthusiasts.

name: Beat Down: Fists of Vengeance
summary: Beat Down: Fists of Vengeance is a 3rd person action RPG/Beat 'em up video game for the PlayStation 2 and Xbox. It was developed by Cavia and published by Capcom, and released on August 23, 2005. In it, the player takes the role of any of 5 gangsters, having been betrayed by their boss and scattered across the city. The player earns respect on the street by fighting enemies to take down a shadowy organization and gain control of Los Sombras. The player also has complete control of team-building and can free-roam for most of the game.

name: Bepuzzled Jigsaw Puzzle: Nature

With around three different choices to make and three unique lines of dialogue for each of them there's around nine different texts you can see and six endings.

name: Berserk Boy: Collector's Edition
summary:
Berserk Boy Switch Collector’s Edition Includes:

Collector’s Edition Box.
Switch Game.
Steelbook.
Double-Sided Collector Poster.

In the distant future, a mad scientist and his army of darkness seek to enslave the people of Earth. Hope for all humanity rests with The Resistance, but are they enough? Enter Kei, a rookie hero who is transformed by mysterious Orb energy into Berserk Boy!

With high-speed action and the power to defeat evil, Berserk Boy must face off against the diabolical Dr. Genos and his army of Dark Energy minions. Can he save the world before it’s too late? It’s time to go Berserk!

Features:

Unleash your ultimate form: with the power of the Berserk Orbs - Lightning, Fire, Earth, Air, and Ice - and become a force to be reckoned with.
Go Berserk! Become a master of speed and skill as you chain together combos to fill your Berserk Meter and unleash devastating special attacks! Upgrade your abilities and become an unstoppable force.
Explore the sprawling world of New Hope City and beyond, unlock hidden missions along the way.
Jump, dash, slam, and slide through multiple stages with Metroidvania elements as you discover alternate paths and hidden collectibles.
Berserk Boy brings retro gaming: into the modern age with slick and stylish platforming action. Inspired by the genre greats, you’ll be able to play for big scores and fast times in this modern adventure with a retro feel.

name: Beat Heaven Symphony
summary:
In Beat Heaven Symphony, rhythm isn’t just heard — it’s felt.
With 20 unique tracks, every beat is a challenge, every note a step in your musical journey.
From Easy to Expert, test your timing and let your fingers dance.
Hit the right keys at the right moment and become the master of rhythm.
The music is rising... the stage is yours, the tempo is with you!

name: Bear With Me: Collector's Edition
summary: The Bear With Me - Collector's Edition contains all three episodes, telling the whole story of Amber and Ted. It also includes the original soundtrack, a digital art book and full puzzle and script design documents.

name: Beatmania 3rdMix
summary:
Beatmania 3rdMix is a rhythm game developed by Konami. It is the third game in the beatmania series and is part of the BEMANI franchise ( which it was named after: BEatMANIa ). It is the only beatmania arcade to have an official European release.

The game is played with a controller with one turn table and 5 keys, three white and two black. On the screen you will see bars moving from the top to bottom in columns representing each of the keys and the turntable. When the bars reach the judgement line it is time to scratch.

Beatmania 3rdMix is the first game in the series to introduce combo count, meaning that your current combo is shown while playing and a good or less break your combo. If you get more than 10 combo your great verdicts will start flashing, but it does not award you with any bonuses.

Normal and Easy mode has been added to the game, which differs in what songs can be chosen and when. Battle, Mirror and Random modifiers were added.

The game features 11 songs from beatmania and beatmania 2ndMIX along with 16 new songs for a total of 27 songs.

name: Beyond Lost Planets
summary: Beyond Lost Planets is an intense Roguelike Deck-Builder. Fight through enemies and bosses across procedural worlds. Grab unique weapons, cards and companions to grow absurdly powerful and create wild, unique synergies every run!

name: Being & Becoming
summary: Being & Becoming is a dark, atmospheric metroidvania set in a kingdom consumed by a Collective Dream. Play as a Lucid Dreamer, able to possess the corrupted, absorb their spirits, and wield them as weapons to break the world free from its endless slumber.

name: Bermuda
summary: Welcome to Bermuda! Take command of your ragtag crew and navigate a mysterious patch of ocean where physics bend, time twists, and nothing stays the same. Bermuda is a pause-based strategy game with roguelite elements, crew management, and physics-driven combat.

name: Beescuit
summary: Get ready for a unique experience with Beescuit, an addictive game that combines strategy, fun, and relaxation! Help the bee with the constantly moving conveyors and fit the biscuits perfectly. How many different biscuits can you discover?

name: Bepuzzled Kittens Jigsaw Puzzle
summary: This game is great for kitten lovers who like their cats in cute or funny poses! 107 Puzzles! User friendly User Interface 'Magnetic' puzzle pieces to make life easier Calming music What more do you need and at such great value!

name: Beast and Cleaver
summary: Beast and Cleaver is an open-world adventure where players hunt and fight rare creatures. Master attack patterns, learn unique monster spawning mechanics, and expand the Hanging City to unlock new potions and customizations. Prepare for the hunt - filled with secrets, strategy, glory, and more!

name: Beats&Boss
summary: Beats&Boss is a BossRush style rhythm game. Follow the Beats and defeat the Boss! Ues powerful AOE skills to clear the field! Continuously kill and enter COMBO state，maintain the state without interruption！

name: Beth the Exhibitionist
summary: Beth is locked out of her hotel room...naked. Your job is to help her make the right choices that'll lead her to clothes without getting arrested or being seen by too many people in a short Choose-Your-Own-Adventure game with 3D Images. Includes Miku's Strip Trivia Night.

name: Beholder: Conductor
summary: A Beholder series spin-off. Become a conductor of the Determination Bringer train: monitor passengers, report incidents, and carry out important Ministry assignments — whose level of secrecy depends only on your loyalty. And remember: mission success is very important to you!

name: Beltion: Beyond Ritual
summary: Beltion: Beyond Ritual is a fantasy action RPG with steampunk elements. The game is set in the diverse world of Sarmontazara and includes a large variety of weapons and types of armor for players to utilize on their quest to summon the enigmatic power of Beltion.

name: Be My Girlfriends
summary: "Be My Girlfriends" is a beauty girl + magic obstacle dodging game + GALGAME combined game. You need to control the chickens, dodge all kinds of obstacles, avoid enemies, and girlfriends together to reach the love gate, so as to trigger the plot level ...

name: Bedtime Nightmare
summary: In Bedtime Nightmare, you play as a kid who must finish all your tasks before going to sleep. But something is lurking in the dark areas of your house, so remember to always stay in the light.

name: Beatfinder
summary: Dash, jump, and strike to the beat! Take on a city overrun by cultists in this fast-paced side-scrolling rhythm runner.

name: Beacon Pines
summary: Beacon Pines is a cute and creepy adventure game within a magical storybook. You play as both the reader of the book and its main character, Luka. Explore the town to find word charms. Use your charms to change the course of fate!

name: Beyond the Room

name: Beyond Enemy Lines 2: Enhanced Edition
summary: Take the role of a special agent deployed deep beyond enemy lines. You will seek, locate and destroy the enemy while causing havoc and confusion. Emerge a hardcore tactical experience in vast, nonlinear missions where skill and tactical decisions matter!

name: BeefArena
summary: A 2d platformer sh'mup in a roguelike package. Fight co-op through randomized runs constructed from hundreds of arenas full of secrets and explosive loot!

name: Beneath Steel Clouds
summary: Beneath Steel Clouds is a life-sim set in a dystopian future with a cyberpunk aesthetic and themes but without the gritty, grim-dark tone and with a healthy dose of snark added on top. You have thirty days to get a grip on your life, earn (or get) some credits and hopefully get the girl. Get on it, chummer, things ain’t gonna solve themselves! They never do.

name: Beatmania III The Final
summary:
Beatmania III The Final is a rhythm game developed by Konami. It is the fifth and final game in the beatmania III series, a spin-off of the beatmania series. It is part of the BEMANI franchise.

The game is played with a controller with one turn table, one foot pedal and 5 keys, three white and two black. On the screen you will see bars moving from the top to bottom in columns representing each of the keys, foot pedal and the turntable. When the bars reach the judgement line it is time to hit the key or scratch.

Every missing completeMIX 2 Double ANOTHER chart has been added. HISPEED has got more settings spanning from x1 - x16.

All 46 new songs from beatmania THE FINAL have been added. Additionally 222 songs from previous entries have returned. The final song list has 268 songs in total.

name: Beastro
summary: Welcome to Beastro! In this charming fusion of fantasy adventure, not all heroes wield swords… Some prefer the spoon. And, sometimes to save the world you’ve got to start with a really good meal.

name: Between Worlds
summary: MAT is a young boy trapped in a school he barely recognises. Help him in the search for answers, shifting between worlds, uncovering new challenges, creatures, and abilities in each of them. Explore a narrative platformer inspired by the metroidvania genre, made by friends for friends.

name: Between Two Castles
summary: Between Two Castles brings the delightful experience of the original board game to your computer! Build castles, make strategies and play online with your friends!

name: Bergentruck 201X
summary: The ultimate Deltarune driving simulator. Experience everyday life as Asgore Dreemurr, driving around in his Toyota. Use the mouse to honk at trees, eat flowers, swerve into bushes, and run over civilians.

name: Bebe's Kids
summary: Bébé's Kids is an action-oriented Super NES video game that is loosely based on the movie of the same name. The video game enjoyed a North America-exclusive release. Nintendo Power gave this game a 2.475 out of 5 rating (49.5%) in its January 1994 issue.

name: Beast Survivor
summary: In the jungle of the weak being preyed upon by the strong, only by continuously devouring the weak and strengthening oneself can one survive.

name: Beached
summary: Beached is a completely free to play experience, where your only goal is to SURVIVE. You must take on these challenges on by defending your base, scavenging various POI's (point of interests) around the map. Fight off animals, other players... and a strange force that lays in the sea...

name: Beatstar: Meghan Trainor - "All About That Bass"
Beat Saber: Billie Eilish - "I Didn't Change My Number"
summary: Get the track 'I Didn't Change My Number' by Billie Eilish and slash the beats! This track is part of the Billie Eilish Music Pack, brought to you by Darkroom/Interscope Records. Music Downloads Not Rated by the ESRB Music Downloads Not Rated by PEGI

name: Beat Saber: Tokyo Machine - "Epic"
summary: Get track "EPIC" by Tokyo Machine, slash the beats and show the world how you are rocking it in Beat Saber. This track is part of Monstercat Music Pack Vol. 1.

name: Beat Saber: Bruno Martini & Timbaland - "Famous ft. Jake Davis"
summary: Get the track 'Famous ft. Jake Davis' by Bruno Martini & Timbaland, slash the beats, and show the world how you rock! This track is part of Timbaland Music Pack, brought to you by BeatClub.

name: Beat Saber: BTS - "Mic Drop (Steve Aoki Remix)"
summary: Get the track ‘MIC Drop (Steve Aoki Remix)' by BTS on Beat Saber now. This track is part of BTS Music Pack.

name: Beat Saber: Metallica - "One"
summary: Get the track ‘One’ by Metallica on Beat Saber now. This track is part of Metallica Music Pack.

name: Beatstar: Blue Öyster Cult - "Don't Fear the Reaper"
Beatstar: Bossa Studios / Black Heron - "Surgeon Simulator (Theme Tune)"
Beatstar: Ultimate Studio, Tim Spicer, Yahor Milkota - "Hotshot (Hot Lap League Theme)"
Beatstar: Macklemore, Ryan Lewis, Wanz - "Thrift Shop"
Beatstar: Jukio Kallio & Daniel Hagström - "Everybody Falls (Fall Guys Theme)"
Beyond Hanwell
summary: Step into Hanwell and discover a world beyond it. Set in the deeper parts of London, explore Westminster and uncover the truth about the enigmatic stranger known as The Director. Fight with whatever you can find or use the environment to take out Anomolies.

name: Beautiful Sakura: Fitness Club
summary: A visual novel focused on mental health and personal identity.

name: Below, Rusted Gods
summary: A short horror game where you control an operator helping an expedition through a hole descending into the unknown.

name: Beyond Dark Castle
summary: Port of "Beyond Dark Castle" for Amiga.

name: Beta Fortress
summary: Modern TF2 has a spaghetti code problem. But what if the code became so messed up that it gained sentience? In Beta Fortress, you can experience just that. This game is an asset swap of another game I made, which was heavily inspired by Team Fortress 2.

name: Bendy and the Dark Revival
summary: Bendy and the Dark Revival is a first-person survival horror game set in the creepiest cartoon studio to ever exist. Discover the truth. Escape the studio. Above all, fear the Ink Demon…and survive.

name: Beat Saber: Britney Spears - "Till the World Ends"
summary: Get the track ‘Till the World Ends’ by Britney Spears on Beat Saber now. This track is part of Britney Spears Music Pack.

name: Be Not Afraid: Threads of Light
summary: A comedic yuri visual novel set in Heaven’s Office, where divine bureaucracy, choice-driven dialogue, and tender relationships unfold through humor and heart.

name: Besiege
summary: Besiege is a physics building game about constructing mechanical machines to annihilate armies, obliterate castles and overcome challenging obstacles. Conquer the campaign or skirmish with friends in Multiplayer!

name: Beat Souls
summary: Dive into the world of cyber and pop rhythms! Avoid noises and keep dancing in this high-speed avoidance action-game.

name: Beatable
summary:
BEATABLE is the ultimate hand-tracking rhythm action game, designed entirely for mixed reality. Transform any table into a high-energy musical instrument—tap, snap, and clap to the beat using just your hands!
With precision-tuned controls and real-world haptics, every move feels incredibly natural, responsive, and satisfying.

name: Beyond Enemy Lines: Operation - Arctic Hawk
summary: Think your way in, observe the enemies and sneak into their base. Rescue an as hostage held agent from an unknown arms dealer, adapt to changing weather conditions, and use the the darkness of the night to your favor in this unforgiving, intense experience where skill and tactical decisions matter!

name: Bejeweled 2 Deluxe
summary: Bejeweled 2 Deluxe is the enhanced, standalone version of the free online puzzle game of similar name. It builds on the original award-winning game, with the same basic objective of matching "jewels" in a grid by threes, by swapping adjacent jewels of different colors. Sharper graphics and more special effects improve the experience.

name: Before the Legacy
summary: A Point And Click Adventure Game created by Sam Gray as part of the Reality-On-The-Norm project.

name: Ben 10 Alien Force: Forever Defense
summary: An endless arcade style defense-based game where the player switches between Swampfire, Gwen, and Kevin to take on a never ending horde of Forever Knights.

name: Bee Simulator: The Hive
summary: Live the epic adventure of a tiny bee in a vast world! Collect pollen, race through jet streams, and protect your hive from wasps. Now even bigger with The Hive expansion - gather resources, build and customize your very own beehive!

name: Bedtime Stories
summary: Bedtime Stories is a wholesome 2D platformer with fun, forgiving combat where you play as the imaginary heroes in Cantonese and Indonesian fairytales. Face creatures inspired by Traditional Puppet Theatre, only to realise that the allies you form along the way are much more powerful.

name: Bengal: Game of Gods
summary: In the game "Bengal" you will have to make an exciting journey to India together with a cheerful tiger named Beng. Your goal - to find the untold treasures of the golden monkey. But before you will have to strain your brain and solve a few intricate puzzles.

name: Beandejo
summary: BEANDEJO is an action-packed spin-gun roguelite. Enter the Old West, where the cattle roam, and drunken vegetables terrorize the local saloons. Spin your gun, time your draws, and gun them down to become the toughest sheriff in town!

name: Beers and Boomerangs
summary: A VR game where you throw boomerangs at kangaroos that are trying to steal your beer! Cook and bring drinks to your mates, but don't forget to defend your BBQ from those pesky kangaroos!

name: Berserk Survivor
summary: Berserk Survivor is a free Hack n Slash arena fan game, set in Kentaro Miura's "BERSERK" manga/anime universe. Survive astral world invasion playing as Guts from various Arcs, or complete a series of Challenges to buy itens with your rewards at the in-game store.

name: Bear vs. Wolf Jigsaw Puzzle
summary: Piece together stunning images of nature’s fiercest rivals in "Bear vs. Wolf Jigsaw Puzzle"! Solve puzzles featuring powerful bears and cunning wolves in breathtaking landscapes. With 30 to 285 pieces, enjoy a relaxing, immersive experience perfect for wildlife and puzzle lovers alike!

name: Berserker Girl
summary: Berserker Girl is a 2.5D side-scrolling action game with tight platforming, intense boss battles, and a rich narrative told in a visual novel style.

name: Bears, Vodka, Balalaika!
summary: The year is 1941. You play as russian soldier in times of nazis occupation.

name: Behind You
summary:
Behind you
Can you control your nerve ?
Do you have what it takes?
From the depths of the manor house to the atmospheric underground and garden. It is always there just waiting, watching you, do you dare open the next door ?
what awaits you ? And more importantly can you escape it ?

name: Belot
summary:
Belot is a single level short adventure for Doom 2, set in the shell of an old monastery.
Tested in Nugget Doom at MBF21 compatibility, with some extra features for Nugget Doom players (custom HUD, custom UI sounds). Designed to be played without mouselook, jumping, or crouching.

name: Beanstalk
summary: Maybe there is a castle in the sky. Maybe there is a goose that lays golden eggs. And maybe your little broth won't get hurt if he falls down from the humongous beanstalk that's now growing in your garden. But you can't take any chances so you decide to climb.

name: Beatstar
summary:
Join all your favorite artists in the next generation of music games.

Follow the rhythm! Tap and Swipe to the instruments, vocals or beats to master your favorite songs and experience them in a whole new way.

name: Beatstar: Luke Bryan - "Country Girl (Shake It for Me)"
Beamdown
summary: Beamdown is a 3D top-down hack&slash action game featuring fast combat, upgrades, and difficult big bosses. Explore the different planet environments, take down large bosses, upgrade your character, and repeat.

name: Beyblade Burst App
summary: Beyblade Burst is taking the world by storm! Create, customize and battle your Beyblade Burst tops in the Beyblade Burst App. Compete to win matches and unlock virtual pieces! Beyblade Burst brings the excitement and energy of Beyblade to your own personal device!

name: Beacon
summary:
Beacon is a sci-fi themed Action Roguelike. Played as a top-down shooter, you must fight your way through a randomly generated hostile world, all the while trying to locate your emergency distress beacon and escape the planet into which your ship has crashed.

While you’re making your way through these areas you’ll not only find weapons and items to help you; You’ll also be collecting DNA from the enemies you defeat. Then, when you inevitably die, you’re given the opportunity to combine the DNA you’ve collected to your own, granting you different stats and potentially gameplay-altering physical mutations for your next run.

Beacon aims to create a bridge between fast, frenetic action and long-term strategy, where your actions can be felt and built upon hours down the line.

name: Beyond Up
summary: Beyond Up is an exhilarating adventure that will push your platforming skills to their limits! Your goal is simple: ascend through a world filled with obstacles, platforms, and unexpected twists, all while defying gravity and conquering your fear of falling.

name: Ben and Ed: Blood Party
summary: Welcome to the Blood Party! Play together with up to 3 people and compete in deadly game shows. Customize your zombie, build your own levels, share them via Steam Workshop and die a lot.

name: Beat Tokyo with Jimotoism
summary: The citizens led by Saitama rise up in rebellion! The epic battle to defeat Tokyo begins now! Get hooked on the unique, wobbly limb controls! Dash through 3D-rendered "hometown (jimoto: your local roots)" worlds in this innovative platformer like no other!

name: Beast Awakening
summary:
Beast Awakening is a turn-based, one-vs-many multiplayer game of deadly hide-and-seek, where every move counts.

Inspired by Nordic folklore, it draws you into a dark world where ancient creatures roam and the lines between right and wrong begin to blur.

name: Bearstone Campsite
summary: Bearstone Campsite, a tourism project launched by the state, closed its doors shortly after a mysterious incident occurred. Now, this abandoned facility is transforming into a world filled with unknown dangers and forgotten secrets, far beyond its former glory.

name: Beyond Shadowgate
summary: As the last descendant in the "Line of Kings", Prince Erik is summoned home to regain his rightful place on his father's throne. But alas, Prince Erik is accused of his father's murder by the evil Royal Advisor Belezaar, and is thrown into the dungeon to be executed at dawn. Your mission and destiny are intertwined. Escape the dungeon and start your long journey toward the land deep within Castle Shadowgate. Your quest is to free the kingdom from the evil grips of the Warlock Lord. You will need to make good use of all the resources you can find throughout your journey. Evil abounds, and creatures great and small will try to defeat you! Use the good that comes of it because the Legend of Shadowgate rests in your hands!

name: BearHammer
summary: Explore the beautiful island of Bearonia and defend Bears, Turtles, and Rabbits from the minions of the evil Toad King. Wield the powerful BearHammer and send enemies flying with ragdoll physics. Feel powerful. Explore the world. Prepare Your Bear.

name: Beatmania 5thMix: Time to Get Down
summary:
beatmania 5thMIX is a rhythm game developed by Konami. It is the fifth numbered game in the beatmania series (but 6th beatmania arcade game) and is part of the BEMANI franchise.

The game is played with a controller with one turn table and 5 keys, three white and two black. On the screen you will see bars moving from the top to bottom in columns representing each of the keys and the turntable. When the bars reach the judgement line it is time to scratch.

beatmania 5thMIX removed the combo count added in 3rdMIX, and restricted the flashing great judgement to EXPERT mode, both of these changes are reverted in the next entry in the series. Song selection has been reworked and are now shown in a list with difficulty levels shown to the left of the song name.

For the first time in the series a harder version of a chart is added. Only 4 songs feature them and the can only be played on stage 2 in Hard mode. The Modifiers SUDDEN and HI-SPEED were added.

The song list has 19 songs returning from 4thMIX, 7 Dancemania licenses and 18 new songs. The total track list contains 34 songs.

name: Beanball
summary:
Beanball is a fast-paced arcade game where you pilot a small spaceship and dodge incoming asteroids. The longer you survive, the more points you earn. Collect coins to boost your score and stay ahead!

But the real twist? If your ship gets destroyed, you can rewind time to bring it back—just be careful, your rewind energy is limited. Run out, and it’s game over!

How long can you last in the asteroid storm?

name: Best Month Ever!
summary: Join Louise in the 1960s USA and secure the future of her son Mitch.

name: Beavis And Butt-Head In Quest To Score
summary: Beavis and Butt-head can't afford tickets to a concert that they want to go to as the tickets are 20bucks and unfortunately they only had 20 cents. With a goal in mind to score and to do things that don't suck Beavis and Butt-Head set off to get $20 to pay for the tickets and to acquire the delicacy known as Nachos as the venue didn't sell it.

name: Beyond Memories: Tales From the Heart
summary: Become a whimsical Grim Reaper, flying through enchanted realms to free mystical souls. Experience 11 epic stories in this peaceful, magical adventure.

name: Beyond These Stars
summary: Journey on the back of the space whale Kewa, building a city for your people as you travel across the galaxy seeking purpose and answers, and developing deep relationships with the universe around you.

name: Becky Brogan: The Mystery of Meane Manor
summary: In the sleepy village of Old Haven, Becky Brogan's school assignment has led her to the mysterious Meane Manor on the outskirts of town. A foul mist wafts around the dilapidated house, an old fortune teller box sits abandoned in the foyer, and eerie journal pages from the past take Becky on a Hidden Object mystery hunt. Collect clues and pieces of the past as you help Becky get closer and closer to solving The Mystery of Meane Manor!

name: Beglitched
summary: Beglitched is a game about insecurity, in our computers and ourselves. In a pastel world of networks where nobody truly knows what they’re doing, hacking is a magical art and the notorious Glitch Witch is the most premium archmagi of the net. Through what appears to be nothing more than random circumstance, YOU are her new apprentice. You must use your wits and cunning to unravel the mechanisms of an alien computer and survive amongst a veritable web of clowns, leftclickers, and filedraggers.

name: Beast Unleashed
summary: Drawn breaks and the hunt begins... Beast Unleashed is a turn-based, one-vs-many multiplayer game of deadly hide-and-seek, where every move counts.

name: Berserker's Domain
summary: BERSERKER'S DOMAIN is a fast-paced, unhinged retro FPS freakshow with a roguelike loop, inspired by classics like Blood, Quake 1-3, and Doom, as well as modern shooters like Dusk, ULTRAKILL, and Doom Eternal.

name: Beautiful Sakura: Running Club
summary:
A continuation of Kaito's journey, where he embarks on a new hobby. This visual novel delves into themes of love, friendship, and self-discovery.

Players once again step into Kaito's shoes, guiding him through the ups and downs of his new life, where every run brings him closer to understanding himself and those around him.

name: Beneath the Cardboard: Be Happy
summary: You will have to survive the cold New Year's Eve, look for food in the trash in the world where no one cares about you. This is an adventure where you have to survive Christmas, a holiday that has never been so cold before...

name: Beyond Enemy Lines: Vietnam
summary: Take the role of a U.S. Special Forces soldier crashed into the vietnamese jungle on the return of a top secret mission. Adapt to jungle warfare, make your tactics and survive!

name: Beat Saber: Bomfunk MC's - "Freestyler"
summary: Get the track 'Freestyler' by Bomfunk MC's and slash the beats! This track is part of the Electronic Mixtape, brought to you by Sony Music Entertainment.

name: Beat Saber: Bomfunk MC's - "Freestyler"
summary: Get the track 'Freestyler' by Bomfunk MC's and slash the beats! This track is part of the Electronic Mixtape, brought to you by Sony Music Entertainment.

name: Beat Saber: Green Day - "Father of All..."
summary: Get the track 'Father of All...' by Green Day, slash the beats, and show the world how you rock! This track is part of Green Day Music Pack, brought to you by Reprise Records / Warner Music Group Video Game Licensing.

name: Besmirch
summary: Besmirch is a Pixel art Survival Farming-Simulator. Stealthily plant crops and carefully watch them grow. Avoid monsters and unwanted visitors by night. Socialize with the local city-folk but can you actually trust any of them?

name: Below
summary: Test your adventurer mettle against The Isle’s procedural subterranean labyrinths. Explore a large, interconnected underworld crawling with cunning wildlife, deadly traps and stalked by a shadowy presence. Survive the perils of The Depths and unearth what lies below... or die trying..

name: Beat Shapes
summary: Beat Shapes is a simple incremental bullet heaven shooter game. Defeat enemies of various shapes to collect resources, which you can use to upgrade the skill tree, unlock new bullets,upgrade instruments and explore other upgrades. Grow stronger and challenge tougher enemies and bosses.

name: Bedrot
summary: You've always tried to hide from the world when it becomes too much for you. This time, though, you're doing it a bit too well. Slowly, the line between reality and nightmare blurs beyond recognition...

name: Before
summary: Guide your tribe through the challenges of a harsh and unforgiving pre-historic world, shaping their culture and defining their history.

name: Bee Movie Game
summary: Bee Movie offers a one-of-a-kind experience as you play from the perspective of a bee. Race cars, chase targets, fly at high speed and more. As Barry B. Benson, you are on a journey to save the bee's production of honey that takes you to New York City and beyond. Master the hustle of the hive and venture outside the hive to navigate the hazards and excitement of the outside world.

name: Beyond the Beyond
summary: Beyond the Beyond gather warriors, mages, pirates and mystics. Observe as they transform into more powerful classes. Clerks evolve into high clerks monks into master monks and conjurers into mighty summers. Unravel complex secrets in two richly textured views, explore in lush top-down isometric view and battle savage enemies in full 360. Grow stronger and smarter, with each victory your swordsmanship increases in power and your magic will swell with potent energy. Use supreme magic to summon monsters, fatal storms to hurl tormentors into another dimension or drown them in a boiling sea of fire.

name: Bedlamball
summary: Bedlamball is a goal scoring game where you change the rules as you play!

name: Bertie the Stableboy
summary: Help Bertie the stableboy find his way out of difficult situations he unwittingly started in this modern take on the adventure game genre. There are many paths to success, making each playthrough unique. Help Bertie on his journey to becoming the hero of the kingdom, whether he wants to or not.

name: Be Queen Bee
summary: An action-strategy game where you command a bee swarm with pheromones. Split your swarm into squads and upgrade your bees to win escalating battles.

name: Beyond Inseparable
summary: The only one that matters to you in life has been taken. Enraged, you storm the hellish dungeons of Castle Ire to rescue and reunite. Hack and slash your way out of this nightmare together or perish with many who didn't.

name: Beyond the Map
summary: Survival ARPG set in a procedurally generated fantasy world. Build a base, gear up, and fight to survive as you chase better loot and stronger enemies.

name: Berlin 1948
summary:
West Berlin is held hostage by a nuclear device...
...and you've been sent to find it. You're Sam Porter, CIA agent extraordinaire. Or at least you'd better be. An atomic bomb is set to vaporize West Berlin and time's running short. Everyone says you're the best undercover man in the agency. Now you have to prove it!

Divided Berlin isn't the easiest place to run a covert operation. A Soviet blockade ravages the city, while black marketers run rampant on the Ku'damm. Foreign agents are everywhere and the citizens don't trust strangers. You'll need help!

Roam the war-torn street of West Berlin, stopping in bookstores, nightclubs and the cinema to try and unravel the plot that threatens world peace. Taxi through each sector, trading cigarettes, questioning suspects, making friends and enemies, and searching for the doomsday device - and the people who planted it.

Viewing cinema newsreels is one way to find clues and enjoy the brilliant graphics in this dramatic adventure.

Talk to citizens, trade with merchants and deal with Black Market leaders - they have the information you need!

Taxi across town using an historically accurate map of 1948 Berlin.

History's sights and sounds come alive with an audio cassette that syncs to your computer's graphic display.

name: Be (Not) Afraid
summary: This game was made for the O2A2 VN Jam 2025, a micro-Visual Novel jam with strict asset limitations and a 1000 word limit.

name: Be A Bee
summary: Get a taste of the sweet life of a hardworking bee!

name: Bepuzzled Jigsaw Puzzle: Aquatic
summary: 103 Jigsaw Puzzles of underwater and marine awesome! Three sizes of puzzle: 8 x 8 = 64 pieces 16 x 16 = 128 pieces 32 x 32 = 1024 pieces Timer and hints What great value!

name: Behind The Beyond
summary: The Behind The Beyond " is a thriller mystery Game which is developed by a independent single person which tells the story about a agent who is a victim of his own hallucinations. Through out the game he is perplexed between his dreams and reality.

name: Beatmania
summary:
Beatmania (Also known as beatmania CS to distinguish it from the arcade game) is a rhythm game developed by Konami. It is the first game in the beatmania series to have a home release. Which in turn is part of the BEMANI franchise.

This game is based on the engine from beatmania 2ndMIX and contains many songs from that game. A second CD is also included with the package, beatmania APPEND YebisuMIX, exclusive to this release. The base game is what is called a "Key disc", meaning it can be used to launch other APPEND games in the series, this was made so that they could contain more music and assets on the game without having to ship the engine.

Beatmania is played with a controller with one turn table and 5 keys, three white and two black. On the screen you will see bars moving from the top to bottom in columns representing each of the keys and the turntable. When the bars reach the judgement line it is time to scratch.

The game contain 23 songs from the arcade game Beatmania 2ndMIX, the bonus CD Beatmania YebisuMIX contains an extra 9 songs for a total of 32 songs.

name: Bellum
summary: Bellum is the next evolution of platoon-scale tactical shooters, built in Unreal Engine 5 and shaped by die-hard fans who demanded more from the genre. Set in a fractured Africa of the 2030s, players are thrust into counter-insurgency campaigns where global powers engage in proxy wars across dense jungles, open savannas, and broken urban sprawl. Our unique limited-life system captures the tension of immersive milsim operations while keeping every match accessible, focused, and intense.

name: Beautiful Cell
summary: In this little game, you will meet a host of unique characters and cut down legions of demons using a wide array of weapons, all in your quest to bend the Demon Kingdom to your will, conquering province after province and growing ever stronger with each step.

name: Bean Battles
summary: A unique take on the popular genre of battle royales. Multiple fast pace rounds that rewards kills just as much as being the last alive. Team up, take revenge, and be the last bean standing.

name: Beyond Blue: After the Storm
summary: After a severe tropical storm damages an underwater research station, Mirai and her crew are asked to help repair the damage and lend aid to the creatures in the surrounding biosphere. What they uncover there is more dangerous than they could have realized and will take all their skills, and help from an unexpected ally, to make right.

name: Because The World Died
summary: Retro pixel art role-playing game in a harsh and dark world, focused on survival and understanding your past. Why? Because The World Died. Features include nonlinear plot with many viable endings, dark humor and text-based combat (no animations).

name: Beyond the Titanic
summary: As the game begins you find yourself standing on board the Titanic, on her maiden voyage. Of course, that particular voyage was never completed! Your goal is to survive and somehow get back to your home in the United States. Most of your time will be spent solving numerous problems and dangers that arise, like starvation and drowning. If you've played any of Infocom's famous text games you will notice that Beyond the Titanic is quite similar to Zork and Planetfall.

name: Behind the Frame: The Finest Scenery VR
summary: The serene, heartwrenching tale re-imagined for VR! Guide brush strokes and solve a variety of puzzles to help an aspiring artist complete her masterpiece. As her painting starts to take shape, learn more about her brusque neighbor, pesky cat, and mysterious past!
