name: Before the Dawn
summary: "Before The Dawn" is a top-down perspective shooting Rougelite game! In a city where a zombie virus suddenly broke out, upgrade weapons, drive vehicles, search for supplies, and activate Signal towers for rescue! Use strategy to combine your equipment and fight your way out of the zombie tide!

name: Beerd leaver
summary: Have you ever wanted to try yourself in the role of a bird-bee? Then this is what you need. Once a small bee gathered nectar and did not notice how the evening came. In addition, the weather began to deteriorate, and it is far from home. Help the bee to get to the house, avoiding terrible predators and terrible weather conditions. You game you will have several lives for which you will be able to set a new record and try to take the small bee home to the family.

name: Beyond the Long Night
summary: Beyond the Long Night is a whimsical and chaotic twin-stick shooting roguelike adventure! Explore The Dark Mountain - a subterranean world full of monsters, secrets and lovable characters. Puzzle, upgrade and battle through three randomly generated areas to outrun a deadly storm and escape to the Overworld beyond. Uncover a trail of mysteries in this ancient kingdom of demigods and explorers, captured within an endless time loop.

name: Beatmania
summary:
Beatmania is a rhythm game developed by Konami. It is the first game in the BEMANI series ( which it was named after: BEatMANIa ). It is one of the few music games developed by the internal studio GMD (Game Music Division).

Beatmania is played with a controller with one turn table and 5 keys, three white and two black. On the screen you will see bars moving from the top to bottom in columns representing each of the keys and the turntable. When the bars reach the judgement line it is time to scratch.

The game contain 7 songs, which is the lowest number ever in the BEMANI franchise.

name: Bermuda Triangle
summary:
The SYD mission was successful, but the current era was only one place under attack. The invaders also traveled back in time, hoping to rewrite history. Only the six experimental space-time battleships known as ZIG could stop them, but they were attacked upon taking off. Now trapped in the past, they have no way to return to the present.

Bermuda Triangle is a scrolling shooter designed by the same team as Ikari Warriors. The player must survive each of the 9 levels, which automatically scroll both up and down, long enough to reach and destroy the boss. The ZIG, being a much larger ship than most scrolling shooter ships, can sustain several hits before being destroyed, and has both a straight ahead shot and a rotating turret that can fire in 8 directions. SYD ships can be picked up in levels and will fly near the ZIG in four different formations. They can block enemy shots but will be destroyed if hit by enemy ships. Energy can be picked up as well, which will either restore lost health or, at full health, power up the attack of the ZIG and SYDs.

The arcade version uses a rotary joystick to control the turret, but the PlayStation port places the turret controls on the shoulder buttons.

name: Beat Saber: Steppenwolf - "Born To Be Wild"
summary: Get the track 'Born To Be Wild' by Steppenwolf and slash the beats! This track is part of the Rock Mixtape, brought to you by Songs Of Universal, Inc. on behalf of Universal Music Publishing.

name: BeachHead 2020
summary: BEACHHEAD 2020 - IT'S NOT JUST A GAME, IT'S THE FUTURE OF REALITY. 20 years ago, BEACH HEAD 2000 changed the gaming paradigm by bringing a new gaming experience to life. 20 years later, the original game creators are ready to do it again. WELCOME TO BH2020 AND A NEW DIMENSION IN GAMING.

name: Ben 10: Protector of Earth
summary: Players will take on the role of Cartoon Network's popular everyday-kid-turned-alien-hero, Ben Tennyson. Using the power of the Omnitrix which has embedded itself on Ben's wrist, players will be able to battle as one of five popular alien heroes from the show. By taking on these amazing powers, players can battle to save the world through the game's diverse challenges, puzzles and skirmishes.

name: Bellatores
summary: Bellatores is an open-world adventure MMORPG set in the 15th-century medieval era, centered around conflicts between noble houses. Amid loyalty and betrayal, war and unity, your decisions may change the course of history. A journey to uncover the kingdom’s hidden truths awaits you.

name: Beholgar
summary: Beholgar is a classically styled 2D action adventure. Explore caverns, ancient woods and deadly castles; battle creatures and solve ancient mysteries at the kingdom.

name: Bendy and the Ink Machine: Chapter Five
summary: This is the fifth and final chapter of Bendy and the Ink Machine, continuing and concluding the game. On 6th September 2018 it was announced all players who owned chapters two to four would receive it for free on 26th October 2018.

name: Being John Gogh
summary: "Being John Gogh" is a life simulation game where you play as John, navigating through a world rendered in the style of Van Gogh's paintings, focusing on improving relationships, managing health, and enhancing charisma to find happiness on Bozca Island.

name: Beach Invasion 1944
summary: Beach Invasion 1944 is a WWII FPS game where you defend the fortified beach against invading forces who will attack with you troops, tanks, planes and more! Use the iconic WWII weapons such as MG42, Flak88 and Panzers, prepare your defenses with mines, explosives and bonuses!

name: Before They Catch Us
summary: A dark text-based RPG in which the world is consumed by an eternal race for survival. An inexorable mushroom forest corrupted all life on planet. And you are a prophet's disciple leading your clan to survival... or oblivion. Interpret misty visions, make important choices, do everything to survive.

name: Beat Saber: Britney Spears x Will.I.AM - "Scream and Shout (Will.I.AM)"
summary: Get the track ‘Scream and Shout (Will.I.AM)’ by Britney Spears on Beat Saber now. This track is part of Britney Spears Music Pack.

name: Beat Slayer
summary: Put on your headphones, feel the beat, step into the flow and survive. Beat Slayer is all about rhythm and fighting. Pick a crazy weapon like the flamethrowing axe and turn hordes of robots into scrap metal by creating your own symphony of destruction.

name: Beyond the Storm
summary: Beyond the Storm is a love-letter to the iconic shmup Tyrian, bringing back the same experience from the past while adding improved visuals, new stories and a lot of more content!

name: Beacon of Hope
summary: Hope Inc is a narrative platformer set in a frozen post-apocalyptic world. Explore crumbling buildings, fight against marauders, and unite with those who uphold morality.

name: Become The Wild
summary: Survive in the wilderness and become the wild

name: BeeTD
summary: BeeTD is a tower defence game all about protecting yourself from summer's greatest menace. The wasp. Do not let the cute visuals fool you! The wasps have no mercy. Collect items to make your insects reach incredible strength!

name: BeeTD
summary: BeeTD is a tower defence game all about protecting yourself from summer's greatest menace. The wasp. Do not let the cute visuals fool you! The wasps have no mercy. Collect items to make your insects reach incredible strength!

name: Bearnard
summary:
"Bearnard" is a captivating single-player adventure game where you step into the furry paws of Bearnard, a valiant archer-bear on a mission to reclaim a legendary bow and protect his beloved forest from threats. This journey takes players through diverse biomes, including dense forests, dark mines, snowy mountains, abandoned castles, and mysterious dungeons, each presenting unique challenges and enemies.

The game features a core turn-based battle system where strategic card use is essential for victory. Mastering tactical combat aspects, players will rely on archery as their primary weapon. Collecting and strategically deploying a variety of cards, ranging from common to legendary, is crucial. These cards offer powers like healing, defense, and enemy control, enabling powerful combos. As players explore, battle opponents, and uncover secrets, they'll enhance their archery skills, expand their deck, and unlock the full potential of Bearnard's quest. Engage in this rich, story-driven experience, where wit and strategy pave the path to victory.

name: Ben Jordan: Paranormal Investigator - Case 7: The Cardinal Sins
summary:
Ben Jordan, a young paranormal investigator, is spending Christmas with his family when Alessandro Renzi, an Italian living in Rome, phones him for helping him in clearing his name in a murder where the victim is a priest. Our hero calls Simon Booth and Alice Wilkins, two friends sharing his passion of the paranormal, for help and soon, the trio is investigating the case... Renzi thinks he's being possessed by a demon... Will Ben solve this mystery before it's too late? 
 
Ben Jordan: Paranormal Investigator Case 7 - The Cardinal Sins is the seventh case in the Ben Jordan series and is a free and independent game which can be downloaded from the official site.

name: Bears In Space
summary: Unleash your inner bear in this over-the-top bullet-hell FPS! Embark on a zany retro-futuristic adventure and destroy oil-thirsty robots with an outrageous arsenal. Transform into a bear, wield unique powers, and embrace the absurd fast-paced action of Bears in Space!

name: BestLuck
summary: BestLuck is an adventure puzzle game where you find clue by looking into different dimensional door frames to open the door.

name: Beat Cop
summary: A retro, pixel art style adventure in New York, inspired by 80’s cop shows. You are Jack Kelly and you’ve been framed into murder. Now as a regular beat cop you have to find out, who did that. Expect thick crime story, a lot of black humour and all the other things you can find on the streets of Brooklyn.

name: Beast Quest
summary: Embark on an epic action-adventure to save the Kingdom of Avantia from ruin. Overcome the dark magic that has corrupted the noble Beasts of the realm. Battle in the mythical world, tackling challenges through stunning landscapes and a plethora of side missions and objectives. Unlock new abilities and upgrades to successfully combat varied opponents. Based on the best-selling fantasy novels, Beast Quest comes to console for the first time ever, with a rich, progressive storyline, vibrant settings, and an excess of compelling challenges.

name: Beast Boxing Turbo
summary:
First-person Monster Boxing with Customizable Boxing Gear!

You play a secret human boxer in a beastly world. She's outmuscled, undersized, and in way over her head. Can she master the skills needed to get to the top of the legendary boxing leagues of Beasthalla?

Develop a fighting rhythm between attack and defense, and don't give up hope if you can't beat these monsters on your first try. There's a host of skills to train, and new gear to acquire that can give you an edge in the ring. Build up your boxing skills and gear to match your personal style, and beat the grand champion of the Ultra League to unlock NewGame Plus mode and reach a new level of challenge.

name: Bejeweled 3
summary: The biggest, brightest Bejeweled ever! Discover all-new ways to play the world's #1 puzzle game. Find your perfect match with 8 breathtaking game modes that meet all your moods ease into Classic Bejeweled for cascades of fun, journey through 40 challenging Quest puzzles, charge into the electrifying Lightning for non-stop action, and tailor your experience in Zen for a revolutionary new way to relax.

name: Bendy in Nightmare Run
summary: Bendy In Nightmare Run is an action-packed ‘boss runner’ for your Android device. Play as Bendy, Boris the Wolf and Alice Angel as you swipe to jump, dash and counter-attack four of the largest, nastiest bullies ever depicted in the classic 1930's cartoons of Joey Drew Studios. The action never stops as you fend off enemies, avoid obstacles and navigate your way through pirate ships, city streets, a junkyard and a not so quiet library.

name: Beast Brigade
summary: The new shooter from the team at Intrinsic Games, delivers an intense, cinematic action experience bringing monsters and modern combat together. Beast Brigade arms players with an arsenal of advanced and powerful weaponry, and a wide variety of monsters to assist them in battle.

name: Between
summary: An Interactive first-person game. Help Elures navigate through the labyrinth of dreams and uncover the secret of extraneous memories.

name: Beach Cafe III: The Escape Room
summary: Grandpa is still missing and as you dive deeper into the investigation, everything becomes stranger and more enigmatic. The adventure of puzzles and mysteries continues with Beach Café III: The Escape Room. Investigate, discover all the clues and interpret them properly in order to advance.

name: Beast Mode: Night of the Werewolf Silver Bullet Edition
summary: Unleash your inner beast, rack up epic kills, and dominate the leaderboards in this over-the-top Arcade Action spectacle!

name: Be Missed and Remembered: The Letter from Mayoiga
summary: The setting is 50 years ago, Showa 47. The protagonist, a high school student, is heading to his grandparents’ countryside home. A short trip taken during summer vacation, a yearly tradition. Spending time with his sister, peacefully interacting with the villagers, but…

name: Beyblade Burst
summary: Beyblade Burst (Japanese: ベイブレードバースト, Beiburēdo Bāsuto) is a Beyblade handheld video game for the Nintendo 3DS published by FuRyu. It was released on November 10, 2016 in Japan.

name: Beastfall
summary: A pure Boss Rush roguelike - no trash mobs, only epic boss battles. Find your sister's body in a journey of redemption and revenge. Encounter eight unique deities and uncover the truth buried 200 years ago.

name: Beyond Extinct
summary: Beyond Extinct is a Roguelike First Person Shooter where you climb through randomly generated levels to reach the surface of the planet. Pick a class, fight waves of monsters, buy and upgrade a wide variety of weapons, and collect Perks to stack-up their powers to become even stronger each floor.

name: Be Quiet!
summary: You woke up in the middle of nowhere, the only thing you can see in the forest is a house. Solve various puzzles to get to the next rooms and accomplish objectives!

name: Before Exit: Supermarket
summary: Before Exit: Supermarket combines features from roguelike with walking simulator. As Supermarket employee you clean up damaged items, wipe up stains, and turn off the lights. Your task is close the store behind you, hoping that all tasks have been completed.

name: Beam Bound
summary: Trapped in a scifi labyrinth but BOUND for freedom, you must BEAM your way out of the HALL OF MIRRORS by solving its DEVILISH PRISMATIC PUZZLES.

name: BeamNG.drive
summary:
BeamNG.drive is a realistic, immersive driving game offering near-limitless possibilities. Our soft-body physics engine simulates every component of a vehicle in real time, resulting in realistic, dynamic behavior.
The driving feel is authentic and visceral, and crashes are realistic and violent; yet the physics are accessible enough to drive with a keyboard or gamepad while still being authentic with a full racing wheel with uncompromising realism.

name: Beyond the Threshold
summary: Summon minions, create powerful magic projects, and build your economy. Then use that power to drive back your foes and ascend to untold heights of magical power. Play solo or with 1-3 friends.

name: Beyond The Board
summary: A single player puzzle game that transforms traditional chess into a minimal immersive journey.

name: Beat Saber: The Rolling Stones - "Whole Wide World"
summary: Get the track 'Whole Wide World' by The Rolling Stones and slash the beats! This track is part of the The Rolling Stones Music Pack, brought to you by Courtesy of Polydor Records / Promotone B.V. under license from Universal Music Enterprises and Courtesy of ABKCO Music & Records, Inc.

name: Beyond Citadel
summary: Beyond Citadel is an anime style retro throwback shooter inspired by the classics of the 90's, with realistic gunplay mechanics, anime violence and fast paced combat. Fight your way through the heavily armed mechanical fortress and discover the secret that lies beneath.

name: Beast Slayer Origin
summary:
Welcome to Beast Slayer Origin, a turn-based hunting RPG inspired by the hunting side of Monster Hunter and the rpg side of Final Fantasy.

In a world where monstrous beasts threaten the delicate balance of nature, you are a Slayer — a warrior tasked with tracking, battling, and mastering these ancient creatures. With every hunt, your affinity with weapons, elements, and combat styles grows, shaping your journey.

name: Beyond Sunset
summary: Welcome to a high-octane cyberpunk first-person shooter with RPG elements. You are Lucy, an enhanced street samurai searching for lost memories. Fight yakuza, zombies & robots in large, open, interactive levels. Inspired by Doom Eternal & Deus Ex, made using a modernized Doom II engine!

name: Beats of Fury
summary: Beats Of Fury is mix of Rhythm Game and Bullet Hell Top down shooter, be ready to take the role of the DJ and smash your own fingers playing music while shooting every single beat on the screen.

name: Bee Aware!
summary: Bee Aware! Not just another Bee Game! Help the bees get rid of all the bad, bad industrialists on every continent with the use of bags of biological pest control. Earn these bags by playing seven minigames. Games that will surely fit the needs of every casual gamer!

name: Beyond Good & Evil HD
summary:
For centuries, the planet Hillys has been locked in conflict with a race of relentless alien invaders. Wary of her government's promises to repel the aliens for good, a rebellious action reporter named Jade sets out to capture the truth behind the prolonged war.

Armed with her camera, Dai-Jo staff, and fierce determination, Jade soon finds herself inside the jaws of a horrific conspiracy, and face to face with an evil she cannot possibly fathom.

In a world where deception is the deadliest weapon of all, will Jade's discoveries be enough to free her people?

name: Beyond the Evil
summary: Beyond the Evil is an psychological horror game that places the player to a hard experience to find who created one supposed plague that might doom the world.

name: Below the Crown
summary: Explore the dungeons Below the Crown, in this love letter to Roguelikes, Dungeon Crawlers, and Chess. Prepare for strategy, game-changing spells, psychological tests, and challenges from your fellow players.

name: Betrayed
summary: Enter Betrayed, a 3-16 player party shooter where trust is scarce, and deception is paramount. Navigate diverse maps, use proximity voice chat to strategize, and earn currency for traitorous tools. Will you prove innocence or master deception? Gather your friends for suspense and laughter!

name: Beat the Humans
summary: Beat the Humans is a turn-based tactical RPG where you lead a squad of aliens against human invaders. Gather your squad, fight, collect artifacts and explore the star system map to survive and win.

name: Berserk Heroes Online
summary:
Berserk Heroes Online is a fast-paced tactical card dueler where every decision counts. Summon powerful creatures, cast game-changing spells, and equip legendary gear to outmaneuver your opponent. Victory is achieved by being the first to reduce the enemy Hero's health to zero.

At the heart of the game is deep strategic diversity. With a wide array of unique Heroes and a vast library of faction-based cards, the possibilities for deckbuilding are nearly endless. This design empowers you to experiment, innovate, and ultimately define your own unique style of combat.

name: Bean There Won That
summary: A physics driven party game designed to tests your friendships! Engage in a variety of crazy minigames as you shoot, boot and bash your way up to the top of the scoreboard! Online or splitscreen, you can crush your friends worldwide.

name: Bewilder House: Enhanced Edition
summary:
Bewilder House is a classic first-person horror puzzle game that challenges your perception and willpower. Trapped in shifting mazes where the walls open and close when you're not looking, you'll need to rely on your mind and first-person controls to navigate a deceptive funhouse that manipulates your surroundings and your sense of reality. Every corner hides a new obstacle; every escape is just another illusion.

This enhanced edition brings minor improvements that breathe new life into the classic Bewilder House experience, making it easier to immerse yourself in the twisted horrors lurking within. Key Features:

Immersive Horror Atmosphere: Feel the pressure as you confront the unsettling twists and turns of a world that isn’t as it seems.

Challenging Puzzles: Solve mind-bending puzzles that play with both your sense of direction and your reality.

Enhanced Performance: Smoother frame rates and optimized controls for a more responsive and enjoyable experience.Note: The enhanced edition has no extra in-game content compared to the original.

name: B.E.S.T
summary: B.E.S.T is an adult visual novel where romance, competition, and betrayal intertwine. 100 participants. $500,000 at stake: who will you trust? Make your choices, build your relationships, seduce or betray… and become the last one standing.

name: Beyond
summary: Beyond is a sci-fi turn-based strategy game set in a generated solar system that orbits a distant star every round. Play as one of five alien species as you race to collect resources, build your military, develop new tech, expand the area you control, and drive opposing factions from the system.

name: Bella-Anna's Head
summary: 2008, Spring. Bella-Anna's body was found near the railroad tracks. The body was headless. No one can find the girl's killer, and her head. But no one knows... That that head has been with me for a long time.

name: Beat Saber: Lynyrd Skynyrd - "Free Bird"
summary: Get the track 'Free Bird' by Lynyrd Skynyrd and slash the beats! This track is part of the Rock Mixtape, brought to you by MCA Records, Universal Music Enterprises.

name: Beacon of Neyda
summary: In a world where a robot revolution failed, the last humans search for a way to survive and escape. Beacon of Neyda is a side-scroller strategy game where you have to survive waves of enemies while creating and upgrading your base. Build where you want - Defend what you can.

name: Beat Saber: Lady Gaga - "Poker Face"
summary: Get the track 'Poker Face' by Lady Gaga and slash the beats! This track is part of the Lady Gaga Music Pack, brought to you by Interscope Records. Music Downloads Not Rated by the ESRB Music Downloads Not Rated by PEGI

name: Beaux-Arts
summary: Beaux-Arts is a surreal horror-adventure game about being held prisoner by the residents of a countryside estate. Trapped in an arbitrary and nightmarish system of justice, you must explore the grounds and try to convince the family and staff to let you out alive.

name: Beat Saber: Skrillex – "Bangarang (feat. Sirah)"
summary: Get the track 'Bangarang (feat. Sirah)' by Skrillex and slash the beats! This track is part of Skrillex Music Pack, brought to you by OWSLA/Atlantic Records. Music Downloads Not Rated by the ESRB Music Downloads Not Rated by PEGI

name: Beer Ranger
summary: Logic platformer in the Oldschool style. The dwarfs are on a quest to find as much beer as they can. Only smart mind and skilfull hands will bring them to the desired goal. Will you manage to beat the most hardcore levels?

name: Be Our Guest
summary:
Have you ever found yourself exhausted and confused by the hustle and bustle of corporate life in the big city?

Wouldn’t it be wonderful if there were a place you could just relax and unwind, maybe have a nice cup of coffee or a snack, in the company of a variety of attentive pink-feathered waterfowl (and also Kenneth)?

Need an opportunity to just hang out and be unafraid to be yourself?

If the answer to any of this is no, then it should be yes, and if the answer to any of this is yes, then you’re welcome to Be Our Guest at the Matinee Cabaret, a fun and inviting café, just a little off the beaten path, and with live entertainment too! Pop in for the grand opening in this charming visual mini-novel featuring original, dynamic sprite-work and colorful backgrounds for the various locations in the café, where you can meet and chat up the employees through their voice-acted branching dialogue trees. Order a drink, make a friend, solve a dilemma, and preview what the Matinee Cabaret has in store!

name: Beneath the Surface
summary: Based on a police report dismissed as fake, Beneath the Surface is a story-driven horror game set in 1958 BS Nepal. As Ved, uncover what really happened in the forest with his friend. Was it all in his head—or did something truly follow them back?

name: Beyond R: Rule Ripper
summary:
You awaken in a mysterious luxury bar, the Golden Jack, alongside nine strangers, and are forced to play a game by The Owner. Each player represents one of the game's rules. You can disobey your own rule, and that rule will disappear if you die. Only three players can survive...unless you find another way.

Beyond R: Rule Ripper is a visual novel with some light gameplay elements, inspired by series such as Zero Escape, Danganronpa, and Ace Attorney, as well as anime like Death Parade and Kaiji. Mixing suspense, drama, and mystery, with a seasoning of comedy.

name: Beat Saber: BTS - "Ugh!"
summary: Get the track ‘UGH!’ by BTS on Beat Saber now. This track is part of BTS Music Pack.

name: Beer and Rush: Non-VR Edition
summary: Experience the hilarious 360º platformer, 'Beer and Rush: Non-VR Edition', where you must find a bathroom in a dream world after having a few beers. Based on a personal experience, this short game is a platformer packed with humor, great music, and challenges.

name: Beyond the Space Wall
summary: Beyond The Space Wall is a story-driven brick-breaking action game, enriched with RPG elements and other original features. In addition to the usual brickbreaking, you’ll face plenty of choices and side quests that directly influence the direction of the main story. Can you find the path to victory?

name: Beast Breaker
summary:
Beast Breaker is a turn-based, mouse-bouncing adventure. You play as a tiny warrior named Skipper, tasked with defending innocents from giant mosaic beasts that threaten to destroy everything.

The game combines pinball physics with tactical decision making. Pick a style of attack, line up the best angle, and launch! Watch Skip careen around the screen and break the giant beasts to pieces.

Along the way, you will meet a vibrant collection of characters who will help you craft new equipment, teach you completely unique fighting styles, and maybe even help you figure out where these Beasts came from...

name: Beijing 2008
summary: Embrace the competitive spirit of the world's most prestigious sporting event and represent your country as you compete for the highest honor - the Gold.

name: Beat Arena
summary: Strum, strike, and jam away! Liven up your VR gig! Perform on stage in a band as a pianist, a guitarist, a bassist or a drummer, all in VR! Grab your friends' play data and enjoy a VR jam session together! Perform your favorite songs from the BEMANI series in VR!

name: Become The Moon
summary: Become The Moon is a roguelike deckbuilder and auto-battler mashup where players build powerful teams of minions from a deck they construct as they play. Will you save the moon from corruption, or embrace the chaos and become it?

name: Beat Blitz
summary: “Beat Blitz” is a hardcore rhythm-platforming experience. Jump and Roll your way through a gauntlet of platforming challenges, all while collecting beats to create dope music!

name: Beast: Bio Exo Arena Suit Team
summary: Immerse yourself in the cosmic adventure of BEAST! A unique 3V3 online shooter designed for all ages. BEAST combines charm and excitement with intuitive controls.

name: Beasts of Bermuda: Palaeophis Supporter Warpaint
summary: Show your support with the Palaeophis Supporter Warpaint! This DLC offers special eyes and a cosmetic overlay with three static color options, plus a customizable, glowing marking.

name: Behind the Curtain
summary: Welcome to Purgatory, Alchemist. Your task is simple: inspect transmutations, weigh each ingredient, and judge those who dare reshape reality. The rules are absolute. Follow them well, and in time, you may even find your place among us.

name: Bent Oak Island
summary: Bent Oak Island is a 1990's point and click adventure set on a mysterious island! Join twins Archer and Sam as they delve into the mysteries of both the island and their own heritage, and maybe save the world!

name: Beyond Contact
summary:
Beyond Contact is a fiercely formidable survival game, inspired by the art and style of pulp science-fiction comics, the moral dilemmas of contemporary science-fiction films, and the unforgiving gameplay of survival genre classics.

Taking place on the often mysterious and always deadly, procedurally-generated, alien world of Ketern, Beyond Contact features exploration and discovery, a robust system of research and crafting, intuitive base building and defense, farming and creature feeding, narrative-driven objectives to save the inhabitants of the planet, and enough flora, fauna, extreme weather, and environmental hazards to kill even the toughest players 1000 times over... and trust us if the planet gets the chance, it will.

name: Beer Runner
summary: Jump, run, and climb over obstacles to deliver the keg of beer. Solve easy puzzles to progress further in the cyberpunk city. In each level, you'll discover new abilities like double jump, teleportation, etc. You can collect beer cans that will unlock additional content.

name: Berserk Mode
summary: Berserk Mode is a fast-paced first-person action roguelite in which to beat the monsters, you'll need to become a monster. Featuring over-the-top slaughter, pixel graphics, experience progression system and procedurally generated zones.

name: Betia Pera-pera English Adventure
summary: Betia Pera Pera English Adventure is an immersion-type Interactive English conversation learning game in which users encounter battles and collect items by communicating with the characters of the game by listening, speaking, and writing, learning the correct pronunciation, and daily conversation as they play.

name: Betrayal at Krondor
summary: Betrayal at Krondor: Midkemia – a realm of enchantment and ancient magic where elves, dwarves and man once battled an unimaginable evil across rifts in time and space. The legends tell of a boy named Pug who would become Master Magician. His friend, Tomas, would wield the unearthly armor of the Valheru and command the armies of Elvandar to fight the final titanic battle at Sethanon. In Betrayal at Krondor experience an all-new tale in the Riftwar legacy as you travel the world of Ramar.

name: Beachfront
summary: Beachfront is a sandbox game where you take care of mischievous alien critters as they soak up the sun, dig for buried treasure, and asexually reproduce.

name: Beyond the Mirror
summary: Developed by ‘Checkmate', a senior student team from Hoseo University, “Beyond the Mirror” is a 2D horror adventure where players manage stress and switch characters using the Baton Touch System to escape a mysterious mirror world and uncover the truth behind a chilling school ghost story.

name: Beach Vacation Simulator
summary: Welcome to Beach Vacation Simulator, the cutting-edge simulator that offers an unparalleled experience of tranquility. Immerse yourself in a virtual paradise where your only priority is to take in the sights and sounds of the waves and wind brushing against the beach.

name: Beater: Apocal Undone
summary: Apocals have taken over the earth. Fight through hordes of Darklings in this roguelite/survival setup to cleanse the world of these apocalyptic creatures. Beater not only allows you to choose powers for your character but for the enemies as well.

name: Bellochia: Love Powered by Gears
summary: Find your first love in the kingdom of Bellochia, use your skills to talk with our 4 main protagonists, invite them to dates and live a school life in a day-by-day gameplay.

name: Beercrush
summary: BEERCRUSH is a first-person action-roguelike where John Beer must fight his way through various environments to quench his thirst for beer.

name: Beacon Patrol
summary: Beacon Patrol is a cooperative and relaxing tile laying exploration game. You play as captains of the Coast Guard, navigating the coast of the North Sea to secure its beacon buoys, lighthouses and waterways. Work together with your friends and score points by creating the most complete map.

name: Beaver Creek
summary: A casual 3D Platforming adventure about a beaver on a journey to find a new home. Waddle, jump, and bounce your way through the wilderness. Harness the power of water physics to overcome obstacles. Meet cute animals, avoid ghosts from the past, and gnaw your way to a brighter future!

name: Beloved Rapture
summary: Beloved Rapture is an indie jRPG inspired by the classics. Explore beautiful landscapes, fight in turn-based battles, and uncover many secrets. This mid-length adventure balances both an intimate coming of age story, and larger threats looming over the troubled kingdom.

name: Bear Adventure
summary: Do you miss mind-blowingly difficult games? Then Bear Adventure will be a real find for you. In this incredibly challenging game, you have to play as a funny bear who has to get through all the obstacles and eat all his food!

name: Beholder: Blissful Sleep
Beneath the Earth: Backrooms
summary: Beneath The Earth - Backrooms is a Co-Op horror game that can be played with at least 1 and up to 4 players. Where you and your friends will fight to escape from the different levels of the backrooms, solving different puzzles.

name: Betty & Earl
summary: Betty & Earl is a puzzle game where you control everything at the same time in order to reunite the two main characters. Hundreds of levels, optional challenges, secrets, and multiple endings.

name: Beasties' Shelter
summary: In **Beasties Shelter**, care for adorable pets like Golden Retrievers and other dog breeds. Feed them, give them medicine, and keep them happy. Also, look after cute stray cats and kittens. Build your shelter, rescue new animals, and create a loving home for your furry friends!

name: Beaked Buccaneer
summary: Beaked Buccaneer is a 2D mini metroidvania full of treasures and pirates that tells the story of a parrot who wants to become a pirate legend!

name: Bean There, Swung That
summary: Swing, race, and grapple your way to glory. Bean There Swung That is a high-speed grappling-hook platformer built for speedrunners. Master momentum, speed and accuracy to perfect your runs. Race through 90 themed levels versus friends, or your own times.

name: Bermuda Survivor
summary: Bermuda Survivor is a unique blend of bullet heaven and world exploration. Your goal is to survive the hordes of enemies and discover the secrets of the Bermuda Triangle. Each run will provide you with new unlockables, story bits, NPC-related quests, and optimal paths to achieve victory!

name: Beyblade x Evobattle: Digital Beybooster Metal Coat
Bekkouame
summary: A short, 2-4 hour, free-to-play Horror game.

Beyblade x Evobattle: Digital Beybooster Vol. 3
summary: Includes 3 additional Beys! Contents: METEOROID DRAGOON 3-70J CURSE MUMMY 7-55W GILL SHARK 5-60FB

name: Bear's Restaurant
summary:
What will you have for your last meal?

In this restaurant, the dead will have their last supper. Hamburgers, omelets, sushi, pudding, anything. Let us cook your favorite dish when you were alive.

name: Better Mart Simulator
summary: Create and expand your dream supermarket. Manage your aisles, inventory, machines, cleaning, deliveries, and staff. Welcome your customers and decorate every corner. Play solo or with up to 6 players and transform a small shop into a retail empire!

name: Beam Car Crash: Drive Simulator 2025
summary: Welcome back to Beam Car Crash! Show everyone that speed is your middle name!

summary: Get the track ‘DABADABADABADABA’ by Excision & Dion Timmer on Beat Saber now. This track is part of Monstercat Mixtape 2.

summary: What Lies in the Multiverse is a story-driven 2D adventure that one could call a dramatic comedy.

Ben 10: Ultimate Alien-Cosmic Destruction is a video game based on Ben 10: Ultimate Alien and is the fifth game in the Ben 10 video games series.

The game was panned by reviews, being criticized by its limited length, game mechanics, as well as several gameplay and design concepts.

summary: Beast Saga is an open-world RPG set in a martial arts universe where you play as a young wolf tribe member named Lang Jiusi. Immerse yourself in a world of free exploration, gathering, crafting, life skills, martial arts cultivation, forming alliances and experiencing unique Jianghu adventures.
