Each note has a letter above it, which must be typed on the keyboard at the proper time to play the music. At certain points in each song, notes with phrases will appear, and the full phrase must be typed before the note reaches the bar in order to play it. This version includes a total of 26 songs, and comes packaged with a USB keyboard.

name: Beemis: The Curse of God
summary: Become a real life bee and also fight god himself. Take on many bosses and wacky levels as a young bee whose life has been drastically changed by a curse that was maniacally concocted by god.

name: BeaverKarts
summary: Show who’s the coolest Beaver in the whole valley by doing awesome tricks & flips. Beat your friends’ high score in weekly tournaments and challenge them through Facebook!

name: Beat Flip
summary: A fast paced casual game that will test your reflexes and mind.

name: Best Fiends
summary: A match three game developed by Seriously Digital Entertainment.

name: Becoming Bytes
summary: Reminisce the moment when you first raised and played with virtual monsters, now on your mobile phone with music composed by award-winning Kentaro Sato aka Ken-P.

name: Before Dawn
summary:
You've arrived for your apprenticeship at a island where you will live and work for a old lighthouse keeper and experienced sailor.

He says most men don't make it before dawn comes and they've all quit due to the isolation here and atmosphere driving most people insane.

name: Beats Trellis
summary: A Sony Computer Entertainment developed PlayStation Mobile rhythm title

name: Beyond Humanity
summary: Beyond Humanity is an homage to 8 and 16 bit games such as the MegaMan series.

name: Beatmania IIDX 21 Spada
summary: The 21st entry in Konami's beatmania IIDX franchise

name: Before The After
summary: Before The After (by David Irimia & Daniel Hristescu) is an escape-room-like game where you play as a soul stuck in the afterlife of the Great Passing. In the afterworld, you will play out the lore of the Romanian purgatory as told by folklore stories.

name: Beasties
summary: Beasties is a lovingly hand-drawn 2D monster trainer game with a turn-based puzzle combat, where you take on the role of a Beastie trainer.

name: Beat Street
summary:
Beat Street is the first beat 'em up with intuitive single-touch controls and is a love letter to the 90s beat 'em up genre!

Evil gang members are terrorizing Toko City and the citizens need your help. Use your fighting skills to fight your way through hordes of enemies to become the new hero in town.

name: Bermuda Adventures
summary: Explore island, build a farm, harvest crops and craft new recipes in Bermuda Adventures!

name: Berserker and Thumbnail Maker
summary: Simple pixel art puzzle platformer. Created for Weekly Game Jam 184.

name: Beebo Deluxe
summary: A fast-paced match 3 game will have you matching honey and solving puzzles in a crazy quest for maximum "Bee-ficiency!" Our bee buddy Beebo is traveling the world to help his friends build their hives. Earn points to purchase items for your hives and take on 64 challenging levels.

name: Beach Bowling 3D
summary: Bowl at the beach on the go.

name: Beat Head
summary:
Unreleased Prototype from Atari Games.

Jump on the tiles that match your color or that have your color and your opponent's color. Jump on enough to fill your spaces before your opponent fills his.

name: Ben and Ed
summary: Ben and Ed is a 3D platformer, in which the player controls Ed the Zombie, who is forced to participate in a grotesque game show called "Rundead". Will he beat all obstacles Hans Showmaster confronts him with, to save his best friend Ben?

name: Beyond Revival
summary: A 7-level episode for Doom 2 taking place in a South American UAC installation overrun by the legions of hell.

name: Beast Mode: Night of the Werewolf
summary: Beast Mode: Night of the Werewolf is a goofy, fun, over the top Arcade Beat 'Em Up. Flex your paws, sharpen your claws and lay those hippies to rest! String together the highest kill combo and compete against the clock to earn the highest score and submit it to our online leader boards!

name: Bean Climb
summary: Simple yet fun parkour game. You're a bean trying to conquer the world and get to the top. Get to what? Nobody knows...

name: Beach Body Bros
summary: Embark on a ridiculous 4 minute musical journey through a world of pure muscle, intense strength, and stupid greatness.

name: Beatitas
summary: Join Lily on her pilgrimage as she pushes through trials, puzzles, and strategic combat in order to be reunited with her family.

name: Beats Advanced Rhythm Game
summary: Beats Advanced Rhythm Game is a DDR inspired rhythm game for Android.

name: BeanKind by Ketnipz
summary: Help Bean build a room and a team, and share love all over the world, just by tapping your screen!

name: Best Friends: My Horse 3D
summary: Your new best friend will depend on you, and let you ride him, but only if you care for him properly and build his trust. Enter beauty contests and jumping tournaments where you must work together to win, and so much more!

name: Behind The Backrooms
summary: Behind the Backrooms is a 1-4 player co-op horror exploration game

name: Beyond Fighting 2
summary: The sequel to Further Beyond Fighting.

name: Being John
summary: In the RogueLite-based life simulation game Being John, you help John to return to his old life after the events that have happened to him.

name: BE-A Walker
summary: You are the pilot of a battle mech BE-A Walker (Biped Enhanced Assault Walker). Your mission is to defeat the hostile natives to protect the colony population. But annihilation of the native race is not the only way to stop the war. Choose your side and make the decision that suits you best: to be a human, a true son of Earth fighting for survival of your race and killing whoever stands in your way, or to be a humanist who’s trying to protect the poor natives, victims of the greedy invaders. Controlling the mech is not an easy thing. Raise up one leg, move it to the left or to the right, and then take a step. Repeat it for the other one. This is how the Walker walks. Control every leg to smash the enemies or to avoid grenades and missiles. Key features: - Seamlessly generated world - The weirdest and most cruel walking simulator out there - Upgrade your mech and weapons to become more dangerous - Defeat the natives or lead them in their effort to protect their homeworld

name: Beek: Familiar Spirit
summary: Lost in darkness, a mysterious messaging app, and their destiny in your hands.

name: Bed Wars
summary: Bedwars is a teamwork PVP game, you will be battling your opponents on islands in the sky, protect your bed and try to destroy your opponents' bed to prevent them from respawning, beat all the opponents to win the game!

name: Beat Saber: Daft Punk - “Around the World / Harder Better Faster Stronger”
summary: Get the track ‘Around The World / Harder Better Faster Stronger' by Daft Punk on Beat Saber now. This track is part of Daft Punk Music Pack.

name: Beach Love Shop
summary: Welcome to Forever Summer City. You just moved to the city and you are ready to start a new business: a Beach Shop!

name: BeeCells
summary: BeeCells is a highly enjoyable game. Once you start, you won’t want to stop. Try it, and see how high you can score. The goal is to group six or more balls of the same color together. Once the balls are grouped, your score increases, and the grouped balls disappear to make room for more maneuvers. After each turn, iPhone (or iPod) puts more balls on the board and your task becomes more difficult. The game is over when the board completely fills up. Full version of BeeCells has colorblind mode with fruits and flowers instead of balls. There are also different color skins. Enjoy the game!

name: Beyond
summary: Your grandma has died. No one knows how or why. You are the sole beneficiary of her will. Heed the warning in her will as you investigate her death. Explore, investigate, and survive.

name: Between Portals
summary:
Between Portals is an exploration through the intricacies of the universe. Go on a mission to increase humanity's understanding of foreign star systems and discover new stars. As new star systems can be tricky to navigate, you need to alter the flight path of the space capsule to spend as much time exploring as possible. Portals in each star system have a strong gravitational pull, forcing the capsule to take the shortest route on its own.
Find 270 stars in 90 different star systems on your journey through three galaxies. Use cosmic dust clouds and wormholes to your advantage. Expect to be puzzled and challenged when navigating space labyrinths with hours of good fun and even longer to unlock all 270 stars.

name: Beetle Ju 3
summary: Compared to Beetle Ju & Beetle Ju 2 your goal is to retrieve all children from the all 100 levels in this game.

name: Bewitched
summary: Maze game

name: Beauty and the Beast: Perfect Match
Best Friends: Mijn Paard
summary: A horse raising game for the Nintendo DS.

name: Besser Essen: Leben Leicht Gemacht
summary: The game to the successful TV format now makes it possible for anyone to deal individually with their own diet while traveling or at home. With the unique nutritionist for Nintendo DS, losing weight is a breeze and fun! Healthy life is in vogue! Better Food Life Made Easy is based on the Pro7 documentary series, written by renowned physician and bestselling author Dr. Stefan Frädrich is moderated. Finally, there is his valuable advice on life coaching, delicious recipes and nutritional advice for the DS! Better food life made easy accompanied with personalized meal plan suggestions and effective healthy eating tips through the day. In 35 lessons, you acquire playfully essential knowledge for better nutrition. Your personal dietary goals are always kept in view with the daily planner. With a daily planner for diets, top 10 lists of tips and aids, food-themed minigames and more than 100 recipes from starters to desserts, Besser Essen offers everything that makes life easier.

name: Beast Master
summary: Beast Master is an open world RPG game. Start your adventure, tame tons of creatures, loot and craft items, clear dungeons, gather your beasts and go to war, take territories and much more!

name: Beatmania IIDX Club Version
summary: Beatmania IIDX Club Version was released on April 21, 1999 by Konami to the Japanese arcade audience. It could be linked with a Dance Dance Revolution machine for simultaneous play.

name: Before I Go
summary: Explore the haunting, dreamlike fantasy world of BEFORE I GO, a punishing Metroidvania where you embody the innocence of an inner child on an allegorical odyssey towards death acceptance. The end is inevitable, but will you brave the journey?

name: Beacon of the Bellrock
summary: Beacon of the Bellrock is a small open-world farming/building game, where you as James Hocken have to build and equip a lighthouse for the Intergalactic Royal Navy. Be the guiding light in the vast intergalactic ocean!

name: Bear Haven Nights 2
summary: Welcome to the Bear Haven 2! This time we built our motel deep in the woods. Nothing will disturb your peace of mind away from civilization. At night we have some strange problems with alarm, but we're sure you'll manage to fix this.

name: Beat Sports
summary:
These aren’t your typical sports nor your typical opponents. The away team is from far, far away: a musical galaxy full of aliens obsessed with one thing…Sports!

These adorable creatures are your teammates and opponents, challenging you in a variety of music-infused whacky mini-games based on familiar sports like tennis, volleyball, and golf. Let your ears and eyes guide you into the groove and show them how it’s done!

Designed by Harmonix Music System, Inc., the makers of Rock Band™, and developed exclusively for the new Apple TV, Beat Sports is controlled using the brand new Siri Remote. To get the whole family playing, download the free Beat Sports Remote app from the App Store and use your iPhone or iPod Touch as a controller, allowing for up to 4 players total.

Original soundtrack features songs composed by Harmonix and by Masaya Matsuura, the creator of PaRappa the Rapper.

name: Berenstain Bears
summary:
Berenstain Bears comes with three different cassette tapes that are designed to be used with the Kid Vid Controller (originally packaged with Smurfs Save the Day - the only other Kid Vid game). The cartridge won't do much without the tapes. At the beginning of each game, Actual Factual Bear takes off while you control Brother Bear on his unicycle. Avoid the boulders and cross the bridge to reach one of the games, chosen by the particular tape you are listening to. The games are:
Big Number Hunt: Catch the correct numbers as they fall from the tree
Great Letter Roundup: Catch the correct letters as they fall from the tree
Spooky Spelling Bee: Spell a word by catching the letters falling from the tree

name: Beyblade: Evolution
summary:
Developed to take advantage of the unique capabilities of the Nintendo 3DS, BEYBLADE: Evolution lets players launch their in-game BEYBLADE, using the gyro and motion sensors and manipulating the viewing angle with the Augmented Reality camera for precise control and adjustment.

Players engage in real-time multiplayer battles or follow the Story Mode campaign unlocking new parts and information to fine-tune their tops in the Bey Factory. Expected to spin into retail this fall, the game will be available in two versions: a standalone Nintendo 3DS edition, and in collaboration with Hasbro, a collector's edition, which includes an exclusive, six-piece BEYBLADE Wing Pegasus 90WF toy previously unavailable outside of Japan.

name: Bewbewbew
summary: Bewbewbew is a lovingly crafted, unique, and colorful action-arcade game!

name: Beware of Light
summary: Beware of Light is a «hard sci-fi» city-building game focused on narrative and survival. After an unexpected crash landing on a dead world, as the new Captain, you must manage colony infrastructure and manpower. Can you thrive under the scorching sun? Will this planet become your grave or salvation?

name: Beach Soccer
summary:
Thank you for purchasing Beach Soccer! We hope you will enjoy this intense
game of action, sun and sand. There are many exciting locations for you to
explore, and many good teams to beat. There’s no time to waste - slap on the
sun lotion and head for the beach! Good luck!

name: Be Richest!
summary:
A city is left in ruin at the hands of a corrupt official, and you have been called in to rebuild it in this exciting new installment of the Be Rich franchise! 
 
Build and restore homes and businesses, keep residents safe and happy, and bring the city’s crooked former mayor to justice as you develop your own business empire in Be Richest game. 
 
Find out if you have what it takes to Be Richest!

name: Bejeweled Legend
summary: Bejeweled Legend is a discontinued tile match-3 mobile game in the Bejeweled series. It was hosted on the GREE service, released exclusively in Japan.

name: Belly
summary: An organic and dark Shoot 'em up experience.

name: Beast Pets
summary: Beast Pets are smart and magical pets that live in virtual reality. Come play with cute baby dragons that behave like flying puppies! Beast Pets are friendly for all ages and perfect for families trying VR for the first time. This app is currently in Beta.

name: Beta Bloc
summary: The world of Beta Bloc is made up of 7 citadels and dungeons, guarded by legendary monsters! Use your paddle to fight your way through more than 120 stages, casting magic spells to fight tough foes!

name: Beat 'Em Up
summary: The Beat 'Em Up game is a complete package of boxing and karate. The whole game is designed in a story mode that you will Have to fight against the gangsters of city by applying your boxing kung Fu skills. This kung Fu game is advanced type of fighting games. Beat 'Em Up is in wait for you.

name: Beastball
summary:
Beastball is an unreleased Sega Mega Drive sports game. It is a console adaption of the 1993 Amiga title Brutal Football/Crazy Football (ported to the Amiga CD32 in 1994, IBM PC in 1995 and to the Atari Jaguar in 1994 as Brutal Sports Football). Beastball was also set to be released on the Super Nintendo but was presumably cancelled at the same time as this Mega Drive adaption.

A prototype has since been released showing a mostly completed game. Both the Mega Drive and Super Nintendo releases were advertised in North America during late 1993, possibly asserting either a release in time for Christmas of that year, or in early 1994. The Mega Drive version was also sent out in small numbers for the press for review.

Despite being built in Europe, no plans appear to have been put in place to release Beastball outside of North America.

name: Benefactor
summary: After two hugely successful pinball games, DICE ventured into new territory with the Amiga game Benefactor. In this cutesy puzzle platformer, you play the character Ben E. Factor, who has resigned from the military to become an all-around good guy. Factor’s mission is to save a group of “Merry Men” who have been kidnapped from their home planet and imprisoned over 60 tricky levels. The player has to carefully navigate through the puzzle levels and release the Merry Men in the correct order so they can help rescue the rest of the prisoners.

name: Beltex
summary: Beltex is a casual factory game played on a hex map. Extract numbers. Combine them using mathematical operations. Deliver them using belts across a huge map. Unlock new buildings and upgrades.

name: Beat Them Up: Box Simulator
summary: Beat Them Up is a 2D game on levels, where the main type of fight is boxing.

name: Beetle Uprising
summary: Breed for stats, looks, and abilities; then use your creations to dominate the entire vacant lot in this RTS/Genetic Simulation. Use fluid "swarm" combat tactics to gain control of resources vital to your colony's expansion and secure a genetic future for your swarm.

name: Beautiful Amazing Jungle Animals for Kids
Beamed 2
summary:
Beamed 2 is a grid based puzzle game based upon simple principles of optics. Each puzzle includes up to three laser beams in colors red, green and blue. Drag and drop mirrors, beamsplitters and prisms onto the grid to blend, split and reflect beams onto Jewels of seven colors in order to make them sparkle.
When every Jewel is sparkling the puzzle is solved!

name: Beyond Enemy Lines: Essentials
summary: Beyond Enemy Lines: Essentials continues the trilled and intense combat experience from Beyond Enemy Lines: Covert Operations with a new campaign, additional Single Missions and weapons to utilize. Think your way in, observe the enemies and sneak into their base. Rescue an as hostage held agent from an unknown arms dealer, adapt to changing weather conditions, and use the the darkness of the night to your favor in this unforgiving, intense experience where skill and tactical decisions matter!

name: BeatNiks
summary: BeatNiks is a pet simulator from Harmonix that features customizable monsters whose evolution is influenced by music in the users' library.

name: Bed Bounce
summary: Help Mr. Strings bounce off his bed and collect his hi-tech state-of-the-art gadgets

name: Best Friends: Dogs & Cats
summary:
In "My Best Friends: Dogs & Cats," you have the unique opportunity to play with and cuddle Dalmatian, Husky, German Shepherd and Retriever puppies and Siamese, Maine Coon, British Blue and Domestic cats. 
 
Teach them lots of crazy tricks, and form a team that will win prizes both in the beauty contests and the obstacle course competitions. Train to perfection and become best friends!

name: Beehive Bedlam
summary: Beehive Bedlam is a game playable on Sky TVs in the UK using your television's remote control. The player must shoot coloured bubbles to the top of the screen to make combinations of three or more of the same bubble to clear the board in the style of Puzzle Bubble (Bust-A-Move).

name: Be Honest
summary: Be Honest is a completely normal personality quiz.

name: Bear in Venice
summary: Be the bear, take the ride.

name: Be-Bop High School: Koukousei Gokuraku Densetsu
summary: Be-Bop High School: Koukousei Gokuraku Densetsu is an Adventure game, developed and published by Data East, which was released in Japan in 1988.

name: Belle's Beauty Boutique
summary: The owner, Belle, needs your help to give all of her customers the treatments they want. Help her wash, cut, shampoo, and color a crazy cast of characters.

name: BeanWars
summary: BeanWars is a multiplayer game where players battle as beans with fast movement and a variety of weapons. You can play with up to 16 friends, and the game offers cosmetics for customization. Join the bean-based battle and show your dominance in BeanWars!

name: Beware
summary: Beware is currently in early development. At the base, it's an open-world driving simulation where the player embarks on a long journey of information-gathering through exploration. One of the gameplay elements are intense, 70's movies style, car chases with challenging AI opponents. There are stealth element too where you can avoid being detected and explore the world undisturbed.

name: Behind the Reflection
summary: Help a mother rescue her trapped son in Behind the Reflection, a mesmerizing adventure through a parallel world. A mother and son are taking a summer walk when their time is interrupted by a cellphone call. With her back turned, the boy walks off to a nearby home when all of a sudden, a bright light and strange sounds draw her attention back. Her son is gone.

name: Beatmania for WonderSwan
summary:
A portable version of Konami's Beatmania series. The game features falling blocks that you must hit in time with the beat when they reach the judgement line.

The game is played with the Wonderswan held vertically. A scratch attachment is included that you mount on the console to be able to trigger the scratch button more easily. Unlike the Game Boy versions of Beatmania, beatmania for WonderSwan features the original versions of the songs, instead of 8-bit renditions.

The game is played in rounds, with each round giving you a selection of songs, as you clear the round a new selection with harder songs is made available. There are 11 songs included in the game.

name: Beatmania: The Sound of Tokyo
summary: Beatmania: The Sound of Tokyo was a rhythm video game developed and distributed by Konami and was sold in combination with the special Beatmania Controller that had especial keys to play the game and was one of the last games of the Beatmania series

name: Beyond A Steel Sky: Utopia Edition
summary:
The Utopia Edition includes:
- Game: Beyond a Steel Sky
- Steel book
- Stickers
- Original Digital Soundtrack
- Exclusive Hologram Lamp
- 50 Page Mini Artbook
- Enamel Pin
- Exchangeable Dog Tags (Keychain & Necklace)
- 5 Holo-ad-Cards
- 2 XXL Premium Stickers
- Unique Collector's Box

name: Berlin Maniacs
summary: In Berlin Maniacs you take on the role of the young and impressionable Tina in a fictionalized snapshot of West Berlin in the year of 1968, a time when state violence led to radicalization within the student protest movement.

name: Benkei Gaiden: Suna no Shou
summary:
Benkei Gaiden: Suna no Shou is a Japanese RPG set in a version of Ancient Japan filled with monsters and youkai.

The game is a traditional top-down turn-based RPG in the vein of Dragon Quest. The player is able to choose between a male or a female avatar and name them, recruiting other characters as the game progresses.

name: Beyond Terra
summary: You and your crew crash land on an alien planet. You must scavenge for supplies so you can attempt to escape.

name: Bepuzzled Jigsaw Puzzle: Sweets
summary: This game is great for people with a sweet tooth! 103 Puzzles – devoted to sweets, candies, confectionery and indulgent edibles! User friendly User Interface 'Magnetic' puzzle pieces to make life easier Calming music What more do you need and at such great value!

name: BetterSADX
summary: BetterSADX is a modpack for the Steam release of Sonic Adventure DX: Director's Cut, which features various enhancements and features that have been added by members of the community.

name: BE-A Walker
summary: BE-A Walker is a side-scroller walking simulator in which you are playing as a pilot of the battle mech called BE-A Walker (Biped Enhanced Assault Walker), defending a human colony from the hordes of savage natives located on Eldorado planet.

name: Best Multiplayer and Co-op 6-in-1 Bundle
summary: Aces of the Luftwaffe – Squadron: The Aces of the Luftwaffe have returned! Dodge a hail of bullets and face their fearsome war machines in bombastic air battles and boss fights!

name: Beach Girls: Don't Lie in Summer
summary: Lying is not a good thing to do, especially in love. So behave well and be sincere as well as quick in giving your answers.

name: BeerLeague Superstar
summary: BeerLeague Superstar is a Basketball Simulation RPG that lets you take control of your very own superstar. Customize his appearance and skillset then lead your team to BeerLeague glory and win the ultimate prize: The BeerLeague Championship.

name: Bennu Bennu: Protect the Pyramid
summary: In this fast-paced, cooperative wave defence game, you ARE the towers. Defeat wave after wave, create powerful combos and personalize your playstyle through the randomized upgrade system. Every round is different!

name: Betrayal.io
summary:
Hi everyone!

Thanks for all your patience, we are excited to announce the next (more open) alpha phase of Betrayal- an online multiplayer social deception/murder mystery game!

We have been big fans of the genre for years now, and it's been some of our dream to make an interactive, real-time version of Werewolf/Mafia/Town of Salem since the Zombs.io days. We are super happy to see the success of Among Us, which many of our team has been playing - and that has inspired us to finish our version and hopefully push the envelope on the whole social mystery genre!

With that said, we welcome everyone in this discord to try the game and help give us feedback, suggestions, and more! We've been working on this for quite some time and I'm excited for everyone to try it out and let us know what you think!

name: Beast and Princess
summary: Released as Moujuu-tachi to Ohime-sama in Japan for Vita. In English it was Included in the "Story Jar" app by NTT Solmare.

name: Bezier: Second Edition
summary: Bezier is a twin-stick blaster set inside a vast computer built deep underground. The story traces the principal's escape from this "Noah's Ark" gone wrong. A simple shooter on the surface, the deeper narrative pulls in his relationship between evolution and god, family and love. These themes question his motives, force him to confront what is real, and lead him to salvation. Powered by BezierSynth technology, traditional rendering is renounced in favour of a fluid aesthetic guided by story elements and player interaction, while an 80 minute soundtrack blends together orchestra, synthesizers and many ethnic instruments to drive the drama through fifteen dynamic game zones.

name: Between Two Stars
summary: Between Two Stars is a 2D procedurally generated space exploration game. Players take control of a starship, as part of a simulation on behalf of the Orpheus Corporation and explore the Sierra Galaxy to discover new worlds and new materials with which to trade, craft and build bases.

name: Bedtime Fright
summary: Turn off all the lights, but beware the darkness...

name: Bendy: Studio Collection
summary: Survive and discover the mysteries of Joey Drew Studios in this dual collection of the popular Bendy franchise. Bendy: Studio Collection tells the story of Henry in Bendy and the Ink Machine and Audrey in Bendy and the Dark Revival. Find out what nightmares lie within the inky abyss of this classic animation studio.

name: Beat Breaker
summary:
Begin your musical journey with beat breaker and drop some beats with stunning visuals at insane speed.

enjoy the pure beats and some juicy visuals in your musical journey with classic gameplay of arkanoid and electronic music.

name: Beat Sneak Bandit
summary: Beat Sneak Bandit is a stealth/rhythm mashup game for iOS. It was developed by Simogo and released in early 2012.

name: Bella Sara: The Magical Horse Adventures
summary:
- Experience a fantastic adventure in the universe of Bella Sara!
- Create a unique magical horse with 530 different accessories at your disposal
- Save your horse to print it out or send to your friends

name: Beast Collector
summary: Beast Collector: Capture, Evolve, Battle in this thrilling card game adventure!

name: Beyond the Lens
summary: Capture surreal AI-generated photos exploring a strange environment with your camera in this relaxing, experiential art-game.

name: Besieger
summary: Besieger is a real-time strategy game where it is up to the player to find Thor's hammer and set things straight again as the vikings, fight as the Cimmerians or play as the returning Korin in three different single player campaigns.

name: Beyond the Future: Fix the Time Arrows
summary: An fantasy otome game released in Japan in 2011.

name: Bearbushkas
summary:
Bearbushkas is a local multiplayer 2D arcade game for iPad with hand-drawn cartoon graphics. 
Up to 4 players try to mark their opponents to be chased by homing missiles while at the same time trying to shake off the missiles chasing them. 
Extra levels add the additional challenges of navigating through an asteroid field or avoiding giant lasers that can be activated by shooting at them.

name: Beneath & Beyond
summary: First person co-op PVE fantasy RPG with semi-realistic graphics and procedurally generated level.

name: Bearded Dragons
summary: A lightning-fast indie brawler where bearded drag queens fight over cash tips that rain down from the sky.

name: Beverage: The Last Call
summary: You know the feeling when you wake up after a good ol' fender-bender, and you just have to smash and kick-ass your way through all kinds of creatures of ancient mythologies in order to rescue the gods, and to bring peace back to the earth? That's what Beverage is all about!

name: Before Nightfall
summary: First map of the IKSPQ series: a small Wizard castle in the mountains.

name: Ben 10: Omniverse 2
summary: Set off on an all-new adventure with Ben as he infiltrates Incursean battleships to secretly return to Earth.

name: Beehive Bedlam
summary: An HD fan remake of Beehive Bedlam for mobile, web browser and Amazon Fire TV.

name: Beehive Bedlam
summary: An initially unreleased and incomplete remake of Beehive Bedlam from 2004 by Denki, that reached internal beta testing. In 2023 the game was finished and made available to play on Denki's website.

name: Beverage Hills
summary: Beverage Hills is an outrageous RPG adventure with a turn-based combat battle system containing some very recent current events.

name: Beat City
summary: A rhythm-based mini-game collection for the DS that trades on a colorful and bizarre art style.

name: Beach Games
summary:
Beach Games is a sports game from critically-acclaimed developer Donut Games.
Hit the beach and master five different sports.

name: Being One: Episode 2
summary: Being One - Episode 2

name: Beach Fun Summer Challenge
summary: Beach Fun Summer Challenge is an Action game, published by Zoo Games, which was released in 2010.

name: Beat Champion
summary: Beat Champion is a VR rhythm game that challenges you in ways unlike other VR rhythm games before it. Musical notes are represented by 4 colors, and notes can come at you from multiple directions.

name: Beat the Intro
summary: The ultimate music quiz game

name: BeeCells HD
summary: BeeCells HD is a highly enjoyable game for your iPad. Once you start, you won’t want to stop. Try it, and see how high you can score. The goal is to group six or more balls of the same color together. Once the balls are grouped, your score increases, and the grouped balls disappear to make room for more maneuvers. After each turn, iPad puts more balls on the board and your task becomes more difficult. The game is over when the board completely fills up. BeeCells HD has a colorblind mode with fruits and flowers instead of balls. There are also different color skins. Enjoy the game!

name: Beatdown
summary: Take control of your own neighborhood in this RTS game set in the hood. Your linear path sends you down a career path of selling and buying drugs, mugging targets of opportunity, recruiting new members to your gang, and large amounts of murder. You have to maintain your drug contacts, and keep rival gangs from taking over your turf. Meanwhile the cops walk by and let you go blissfully about your business.

name: Bessarabian Nightmares
summary: Help close the gates of hell, kill bosses, find keys and move on. Good luck!

name: Best Served Cold
summary: Can you mix a cocktail while eye-to-eye with a criminal? Find out in Best Served Cold, a murder mystery set in a bustling speakeasy where you serve customers, make friends and enemies, and solve crimes. At the Nightcap bar, prohibition is a killer… and so are some of your customers!

name: Beastie Land
summary: Rob the hidden treasure with your beastie abilities and escape without getting caught!

name: Be the Hero
summary:
Be the Hero is a VR single play action game in which the player becomes a hero to save the city from the enemies.
You can become the hero who everyone used to dreamed of.

name: Bearbarians
summary:
Your village has been destroyed, can you rebuild your team and defeat your enemies to become the ultimate warrior?

Fight as 4 different classes, give orders, level up and unlock 30 hats, 30 weapons and 20 pieces of armor to change your stats and appearance in this 2D arena battle game!

name: Beauty Lawyer Victoria 2
summary:
Beauty Lawyer Victoria 2 is a trial simulation game. You become Attorney Victoria and help your client, who is suspected of being a criminal, prove his/her innocence at the court.
As an attorney, you can review court records and gather evidence for the trial.
Interview related people and call them as your witnesses.
You will enter the battle of brain and psychology against a public prosecutor that sued your client. Become a talented attorney and prove your client's innocence at the court.

name: Beware of Falling Angels
summary:
This is an Eternity Engine map with portals and some special effects.
The gameplay is classic: no new monsters or weapons, no jumping. Freelook is not needed or recommended.

name: Bestiary of Sigillum
summary: Bestiary of Sigillum is a one-on-one competitive online game that blends the depth of a turn-based strategy with the diversity of the MOBA genre. Summon your army of legendary heroes with one-of-a-kind abilities and destroy the opponent’s castle.

name: Beekeeper
summary: "Beekeeper" is a game of the genre of independent economic strategy, in which you will take on the role of a debut beekeeper, making his first steps in the honey business. You will take the helm of your own company and lead it to the top of the rankings.

name: Beneath the Lighthouse
summary: Beneath the lighthouse is a serene puzzle action game about a boy in search of his lost Grandpa. Your journey will take you through mysterious mechanical wheels that lay beneath the lighthouse!

name: Beluga Dreams
summary:
Sleep. Eat. Swim. Repeat.

Mr. Beluga is tired of the same daily routine and longs for something more. He looks forward to bedtime when he can close his eyes and dream of what he wants to do most of all: flying.

name: Beware of the Blob
summary: Eat people and craft limbs in this third-person puzzle exploration game. You'll need brains, arms, lungs, and more to escape from Black Hawk Industries HQ in one piece.

name: Beyond Arm's Reach
summary: Beyond Arm’s Reach is an action adventure game, set in a 1950’s steampunk universe. You have to use the physics based grappling hook, to navigate around the world, defeat enemies and solve puzzles along the way.

name: Beyond the Hours
summary: Beyond The Hours is a first-person psychological horror and mystery game that offers a rich, immersive story. Step into the surreal experiences of Adam, the main character, and unravel the eerie events that blur the lines between reality and nightmare.

name: Beyond the Sideline Football
summary: New American Football simulation from Out of the Park Developments

name: Beastly: Frantic Foto
summary: A modern day retelling of Beauty and the Beast set in a big city high school. Using your Nintendo DS stylus, spot the differences between scenes.

name: Before the End
summary: In this game you play as an experienced paranormal investigator. On the way you will need to look for keys from the doors, notes from the staff and those who studied here.

name: Beyblade VForce: Ultimate Blader Jam
summary: A sinister group is stealing Bit Beasts from the World Champion Bladebreakers and you must help defend against this mysterious force, using skill, balance, and endurance. Play as any Bladebreakers--including Tyson and Kai, and call upon your best strategies and mightiest Bit Beasts. Unlock more than 100 Beyblade collectibles as you fight through 50 Vforce challenges. It's a battle with the best Bladebreakers in the world, so make sure you've got the fighting spirit.

name: Bear Dream
summary: An Augmented Reality app used in educational flash cards about animals and vehicles.

name: Best of Eleven
summary: Puzzle game about finding patterns. Create your own set or randomize the rules to explore almost unlimited amount of gameplays.

name: Betroyal
summary: Betroyal is a fast-paced roguelite turn-based tactical game, in which you play as a king dethroned by his own daughter. Gather an army from scratch, hire different mercenaries with exclusive skills, and level up your commander unlocking new destructive powers to get your throne back!

name: Becoming Captain
summary: Dive into a unique Roguelike Deckbuilder experience with Becoming Captain, set in a sci-fi realm where piracy is nearly eradicated—except on the notorious Calamity. Will you become its captain or die trying?

name: Beyond the Fringe
summary: Welcome to Beyond the Fringe, a single-player action/adventure set in a sci-fi universe with over seven different handcrafted maps to explore! Fight, fly, loot, mine, and craft your way through each world, searching for your mother and discovering the truth about the danger looming over the galaxy.

name: Beach de Reach! DS
summary: Full remake of the original game with redone graphics.

name: Bee Farming
summary:
You start up a bee farming business with a swarm of bees and 0 cash. Every week, you bring the bees to a forest and show them where the flowers are. The bees will bring nectar back to the beehive and produce honey. Sell honey in BEEDEX market will earn you money to go shopping at Farmer's Co-op for more bees, a bigger honey jar, or a larger beehive.
There are 7 types of working bees and 3 types of guardian bees. Working bees with larger appetite will collect nectar faster. Guardians do not collect nectar. Their job is to protect the working bees from Hornets! There are enemies hiding in some forests, such as hornets, black hornets, wax moth and giant hornets. Before you venture into a forest, ensure you have the right size of guardian team or your whole bee troop will be gone!
There are 11 different forests. Forests with higher entry fee are more dangerous but also give you more opportunities. Explore it to find out more.

name: Beatdown!
summary: Wrongfully dismissed from his job, the hero is on a war path to take down anyone who gets in his way of giving the CEO a much needed beatdown! Inspired by the classic beat-em up genre; get ready for beatdown!

name: Be a King: Golden Empire
summary: Defend your kingdom from raiders in Be a King 3: Golden Empire! Rebuild cities to their former glory, feed the poor and protect them from raids by bandits. Rule with your strong hand and raise a powerful empire. Complete different objectives and enjoy the medieval atmosphere as you experience the life of a king. Stop the evil monsters and raiders before it’s too late in Be a King 3: Golden Empire!

name: Beat the Soul Z
summary: Beat the Soul Z is a 2D pixel style platformer action game. The player takes on the role of the main character and plays the game from different perspectives, and cooperate with his soul to fight, explore, and pass the level.

name: Beach Pong
summary: An interesting arcade game in which you need to hit the ball and try to beat the opponent. Classic pong under the scorching southern sun!

name: Bernie Needs Love
summary: A retro platformer about an old man who collects blue pills amidst urban dangers and bird poop in a desperate effort to reach his girlfriend before he is himself reached by the ever-approaching Grim Reaper.

name: Behind the Screen & Defoliation
summary: Behind the Screen & Defoliation is a suspense puzzle set of games.

name: Beatmania IIDX 6th style
summary: The 6th game in the beatmania IIDX series. This version saw a major graphical upgrade in terms of interface and overall polish. Features many licensed tracks from Avex's Super Eurobeat and Cutting Edge sub labels.

name: Berzerk Ball 2
summary:
Let out some rage on internet geeks and smash them into oblivion! Berzerk Ball 2 is finally here! Your objective is simple; select a character, build a geek, then smash him as far as you can! It won't be easy; he'll insult you and make fun of you in 1337 speak as you repeatedly hit him further and further! Best of all, you can upgrade your character learn new moves, earn new weapons, and other items that increase your stats and impact the overall damage you do to your nerd!

Originally a flash game, released also on mobile platforms, it's now available as part of Berzerk Flashback on Steam.

name: Beyond the Black Hole
summary: Beyond the Black Hole is a computer game developed by The Software Toolworks in 1989 for the PC/MS-DOS, Commodore 64 and Commodore 128. The player controls a scientific officer sent to investigate strange occurrences. the player uses cartography orbs to examine a variety of objects in space.

name: Berry Tree
summary:
Berry Tree is a Pokémon e-Reader game for the Game Boy Advance. In order to play Berry Tree four different Pokemon cards must be scanned. The cards are: Nidoqueen (#22), Gligar (#59), Growlithe (#62), and Ursaring (#110).

The object in Berry Tree is to shake as many berries out of the trees as possible. A set of button prompts will show up at the bottom of the screen. Afterwards the player will be given a set amount of time to copy the buttons displayed.

name: Best VRcase 9000
summary: Small minigame experiments of differing genres rendered in simplified N64+ graphics in Virtual Reality. otherwise classified as "retro VR".

name: Berry Berry Festival
summary: A wholesome and heart-warming story game about a young girl who wants to become the Berry Berry Champion. Explore a small town and help the residents with odd jobs to prepare for the Berry Berry Festival!

name: Bear-ly There
summary: Help Barris last through the coming Winter. Shake, rattle, and roll your way around the forest, finding food to fatten up before the year ends. Make sure Barris is fed and safely back in his warm cave before it's too late!

name: Before Dark
summary: With a short battery life and no jumping, how can you survive this world of darkness and bring it back to life? In this platformer, precision and patience are crucial to survival.

name: BeatBox Runner
summary: BeatBox Runner is a retro platformer with a twist: switch states to survive its unique series of traps and challenges.

name: Beambender
summary: The sequel to Fury3, Hellbender has players piloting a ship (the Hellbender) destroying various targets and reaching checkpoints, in order to protect Earth from destruction by the Bions.

name: Bear Shooter
summary: Simple vertical scrolling shooter with a bear as the main character, 5 stages in total

name: Bear Care
summary: A gay crush and a big gay mess

name: Benji Challenges
summary:
Benji Challenges is a fun and casual platformer where you control the monkey Benji, swinging from vine to vine. 

Features gorgeous graphics, intuitive control mechanics and 50 hand-crafted levels of challenging gameplay!

name: Beat to West
summary:
Easy to play action game!
Cute characters and beautiful scenes take you an amazing experience.
The adventure and fosters system will make you indulge in it.Try hard to make your hero more powerful!
An off-line game,supports running anytime and anywhere.
The equipment system, local-network PK, video playback and sharing is coming.stay tuned!

name: Beyond the Phone Screen
summary:
Welcome to the latest and greatest in Geolocation based Augmented Reality entertainment!

Thanks to our deal with Shivers City we've integrated the hit videogame Civilian GO! in an unprecedented way with your town! Enjoy extremely immersive events and activities while you stroll around your beautiful home.

Go out there and make your Mayor proud!

name: Beneath the Basement
summary: Fight and explore your way out of this exciting new 2D shadowy platformer Beneath the Basement! Avoid traps and collect as many lives as you can across 20 levels while slaying demonic creatures that lurk below. Will you manage to escape?

name: Beaver Fun
summary: Beaver Fun is a retro rhythm game that lets the user complete a level with the controller buttons. Try to complete the level with your best time. Trophies are collected as you complete the rhythm goals. Single player fun and arcade style entertainment.

name: Beatmania IIDX 29 CastHour
summary: The 29th iteration of konami's beatmania IIDX series.

name: Beware the Bully Redux
summary: You can’t escape the Bully! Beware The Bully Redux is a fast-paced action platformer. You must run and dash your way through obstacles and challenges and try to avoid the Bully in this story-driven adventure!

name: Berzerk Flashback
summary: Anthology of Berzerk Studio's old flash game catalog. Includes 18 full games, updated to remove ads and microtransactions, plus some unreleased projects and prototypes.

name: Beat Reality
summary: Beat Reality is an new rhythm experience you have never seen before! Use your hands to explode the beats as they spawn in front of you – every orb indicates which hand you need to use and the rotation you need to match.

name: Beyond the Gate
summary: Loot two billion worlds beyond the Gate in this unique RPG. Features procedurally generated content, charged attack combat, distinct aesthetics, and a bittersweet story.

name: Beautiful Indie Worlds Bundle
summary: Two beautiful indie stories in one bundle!

name: Bejeweled Blitz
summary: Enjoy one minute of explosive match-3 fun from PopCap Games! Detonate as many gems as you can, 60 action-packed seconds at a time, in the hit puzzle game played by over 125 million people worldwide. Match three or more and create cascades of awesome with Flame gems, Star gems, and Hypercubes. Use powerful Rare Gems and upgradable Boosts to compete against friends, or challenge other players and top the leaderboards in Blitz Champions.

name: Bejazzled
summary:
Wordsmiths and Puzzle masters, Bejazzled is the exciting new word puzzle game, from Sungift Games.
This superb new match 3 word puzzle game gives you hours of fun, exercises the brain muscles and includes a fantastic jazz music sound track.

name: Beyond Enemy Lines 2: God
summary: A new intense singleplayer mission where you need to provide cover fire for a special task force, ordered to rescue Mikhail out of a prison.

name: Beyond Enemy Lines 2: Military Airfield
summary: A new intense singleplayer and large scale mission where you need to inviltrate a Military Airfield and upload a virus to track all comms traffic.

name: Bermuda Syndrome
summary: Bermuda Syndrome is a 2D platformer released in 1995 for the PC which was very similar to Flashback. Noted for its very richly detailed backgrounds.

name: Bearcycle
summary: bearcycle combines fast-paced motorcycle racing with wacky platforming madness. Grind, grapple, and rocket your way through the forest, local city, and beyond! So grab some berries, catch some air, and land a trick in this unBEARably fun classic.

name: BeatBlox
summary: BeatBlox is a fast-paced puzzle game in which the action is dictated by the music.

name: Beat the Champ
summary: Multi-sport game developed by Konami in 1996.

name: Beautiful Warrior Hibiki's Captive Violation Days
summary: A role-playing game from WINDWAVE.

name: Between Stations
summary: You can't remember what time it is, but you know it is late. You have just checked into your room at the Brownie Cove Hotel. The bed is lumpy and you can't sleep, but the TV is tempting...

name: Better Than Dead
summary: "Better Than Dead," is a FPS where brutal and realistic gunfight meets the haunting beauty of a photorealistic Hong Kong. Inspired by classic Asian bloodshed cinema

name: Beat Biome
summary: Play music through your headset and Beat Biome will automatically pick it up, reacting to the beats and wavelengths. Enjoy several psychedelic environments, even create your own!

name: Beyond the Deep
summary: Discover what lies outside your world!

name: Ben Jordan: Paranormal Investigator - Case 3: The Sorceress of Smailholm
summary:
This time Ben Jordan travels to Smailholm, Scotland to investigate the murder of two children. Everything seems to point to witchery, so it's Ben's duty to investigate this crime. 
 
The interface is typical point and click with icons. The action is divided into days and there are two different paths towards the end. 
 
Also the game comes with a Handbook in HTML that contains some information that will be very helpful to solve the Smailholm mystery.

name: Beat Saber: Daft Punk - "Lose Yourself to Dance (feat. Pharrell Williams)"
summary: Get the track ‘Lose Yourself to Dance (feat. Pharrell Williams)’ by Daft Punk on Beat Saber now. This track is part of Daft Punk Music Pack.

name: Become a pig
summary: Online cooperative puzzle solving game using voice recognition

name: Berserk: The Cataclysm
summary: Berserk: The Cataclysm is a fantasy card battler with automatic battles in the 'Berserk' universe. Immerse yourself in the world of Laar, once thriving, and now absorbed by the Dark forces. Try yourself as a powerful wizard, master of the tower on a flying island, extend your possessions, fighting for controlled territories. You will be able to conquer barbarian lands or lands of other 'Berserk: The Cataclysm' players and compete with your friends.

name: Beat the Art Breaker
summary: A game with 4 endings. Your game will not be saved.

name: Berkeley's Maid: Remake Edition
summary: The ghosts of the past, recounting the tragic past

name: BearShark
summary: An exclusive endless runner made by the website CollegeHumor.com. Run, jump, and swim for your life as a bear and a shark try to kill you.

name: Best of Casual Games
summary: Finally! Best of Casual Games combines all of the fun of Zuma, Hidden Object, Match-3 and time management games in a single, explosive package! Collect hundreds of puzzle pieces while finishing forty levels with different degrees of difficulty.

name: Bear Adventures
summary: Go through the levels collecting honey, set a time record, kill animals. In BEAR ADVENTURES you can play with friends, the co-op game mode supports up to 4 players!

name: Bee & Flower
summary:
Bee and Flower is a single-screen arcade game. You control a honeybee who, over the course of a day, has to visit flowers at the bottom of the screen and return the nectar to the hive at the top of the screen.

The air between your hive and the ground is patrolled by hostile insects of various sorts: dragonflies, butterflies, ladybirds and wasps. Each of these have distinct movement patterns. For instance, the dragonflies patrol the top part of the screen and move horizontally with frequent pauses. Butterflies on the other hand visits and feeds on the flowers near the ground. Once a butterfly has drained a flower of its sustenance, the flower disappears. You can divert the attention of a butterfly by dropping a sugar cube, which it will eat in preference to visiting flowers.

All of the insects can be dispersed using your sting, of which you have an infinite number, and can launch at your opponents in a parabolic arc. Later in the day, a human bug collector that prizes you as a specimen will appear, and is impervious to your sting. Killing an insect gives you points, as does returning to the hive with nectar.

Each level takes place over the course of a day, and ends when you have collected a certain amount of nectar (indicated by the number of grubs lying on the ground). On completing a level, you get a bonus for the amount of time left in the day. And then the next level starts, with more enemies and requiring a larger number of trips to complete.

name: Before the explosion
summary: Space, emptiness and silence! Suddenly, a huge meteorite flies to the spacecraft and hits the engine, the spacecraft is damaged. You have only 3 minutes before the explosion to have time to leave the ship.

name: Being The Game
summary: Enter a world of chaos and adventure as you seek revenge against the Emperor and the orcish horde in this adventure RPG. Explore a vast open world, hack and slash enemies, hire troops, and complete quests. Discover the Emperor's sinister plan and fight to defeat him. Will you emerge victorious?

name: Beach Ball Valley
summary: The sun is bright, the clouds are white, the beach balls are aloft in flight. Please hit them with your pizza paddle hands, and send them off to whimsical lands.

name: Beaver Clicker
summary: Beaver Clicker is an idle game where you collects logs, then using these logs, you can acquire all sorts of sources for these logs, like convincing squirrels, sponsoring school field-trips, or even taming the fungi found in nature itself to help you in your wood collecting journey.

name: Bearly Delivered
summary: A 3D physics-based package delivery game

name: Below Surface
summary: Fast-paced 3D horror game about exploring a supernatural cave

name: Before the Needle Lifts
summary: You and your girlfriend Sayori investigate a series of strange disappearances around your town.

name: Better Homes and Gardens Cool Crafts
Bewildebots
summary: Bewildebots is a brain-frying new take on the puzzle genre that requires you to send commands to up to 10 robots at once. Every robot will move at the same time, interpreting your commands based on the direction they face independently.

name: Beat the Rhythm VR
summary: Can you Beat the Rhythm? Punching orbs with your hands, deflecting projectiles with laserblades, or shooting drones with guns, using songs produced for this game, player created osu! beatmaps or any song from your local music library - in the most advanced VR rhythm game.

name: Beauty Agent
summary: The heroine Ai belongs to a secret agent organization made up of women. Recently, the organization was attacked by evil forces, and a large number of agents were kidnapped. As the core combat member of the organization, Ai went deep into the enemy base alone to rescue his companions.

name: Belt Miners
summary:
Welcome to the Utopia Arura mining ship Tau Ceti. Your overall mission is to mine asteroids for usable resources. Your mission commander is the android Io. She will brief you on all missions and manage your progress.

Belt Miners is a simulation game with the goal of providing a relatively accurate simulation of what it would be like to be an Asteroid Belt miner in the future.

Engage in hours of sci-fi asteroid mining experiences in space with 70 missions, scanning asteroids, deploying rigs, retrieving ore, trading, and maintaining the spaceship.

name: Belly Bumpers
summary: Use your belly to knockout other players in this 2-8 online and local party game. Eat juicy burgers to increase the size of your belly or force-feed opponents until they burst. Bump it out in a world of food-themed stages.

name: BeatMotor
summary: rhythm stepping + fancy motorcycle + rubbing moves = BeatMotor

name: Be Richer
summary: Earn your riches in the real estate market in this exciting Time Management game. Build your company from the ground up, as you build houses, mansions, stadiums and even whole neighborhoods in Be Richer! Keep your tenants happy by constructing huge shopping centers, providing maintenance, and meeting their expectations. Plan beautiful cities as you reach your goals, turn a tidy profit, and Be Richer!

name: Beyond the Kingdom
summary: Gather a team of brave heroes and go on an exciting journey following the route marked on an ancient pirate map. Only camaraderie and teamwork will help you overcome the obstacles in this time management game.

name: Beneath our Scars
summary:
This game takes place in a private clinic and depicts the blooming love story between Melinda and Rowan.

Your choices matter and will allow you to build and help their relationship evolve. Make the best decisions to unlock illustrations during the story!

name: Belladonna
summary: Darkness twists the minds of those who reside in the Ricci Estate. Once a paragon of class and wealth, the land now lies desecrated with darkness-imbued vampiric terrors. Belladonna, mother of the Ricci family, now returns to her old home to face the threat and put an end to the madness.

name: Beyond Eden: Dear Edward
summary: Spun off from 'Beyond Eden', 'Beyond Eden: Dear Edward' is a Boys’ Love Life simulation game starring Edward, a naïve young aristocrat. Hone his skills as detective, psychic, or gambler, seek fortune and adventure in the streets and salons of 1890s London, and romance two desirable young men!

name: Beyond the Void
summary: Beyond the Void is a 1vs1 strategy competitive game in a world between science-fi and fantasy. Draft your mothership’s skills, forge your army, Destroy your opponent’s fleet, and conquer the enemy's planet to Dominate the game. Will you win the war Beyond the void? Beyond the Void is revolutionary, offering true ownership of game items in its digital second-hand market, which is based on the Ethereum blockchain.

name: Ben Was Assimilated
summary: A hack n slash where you can run around, kill bad guys and get assimilated.

name: Beast
summary: Push blocks and squish monsters.

name: Beku
summary: Captured by a plotting king of Beku and forced to embark on a challenging quest to finalise his plans, you'll master your devastating ethereal abilities in this 2D platformer to overcome increasing waves of formidable foes. What secrets will you find along the way?

name: Beach Cafe: Caribbean Sand
summary: Follow the clues of your grandfather's disappearance and unveil all the mysteries hidden in this abandoned place. Will you be able to find out what happened?

name: Be Silent
summary: You got trapped in a garden by something. In order to escape you have to find hints and items - but be silent, something is listening...

name: Ben-Hur
summary: A video game adaption of the 2016 Ben-Hur film.

name: Behind the Beyond: Ulti
summary: A card game of wit and strategy. Can you defeat the best players and become the ULTImate Champion in the Kingdom Behind the Beyond?

name: Beneath a Withering Moon
summary: The land is beset by shadow. You have two minutes to cast the spell that will banish the darkness. Can you restore light to the world? Or will you succumb to the dark?

name: Beat Miner
summary: Mine and collect ore blocks to the rhythm of your music in procedurally generated caves. Featuring many levels and different gameplay modes, Beat Miner will challenge your mining reflexes!

name: Beer!
summary: Grab yourself a drink in this collection of rapid minigames that test your quick thinking and reflexes!

name: Beauty and the Silent Beast
summary:
"Beauty and the Beast" is the famous animation film.

The original long story was written by French novelist, Gabrielle-Suzanne Barbot de Villeneuve.
Later, the shorter version was rewritten by Jeanne-Marie Leprince de Beaumont.
And this is the origin of the story which we know today.

In this app, I changed the story dynamically based on the story written by Beaumont.
I hope you enjoy the story in the special version.

It depends on the player, if the Beast changes back to what he was, the Prince.

name: Beautiful Girl Fight School
summary: This is a beautiful girl fighting game. Players control characters to fight with beautiful girls and experience various interesting stories in the Academy. It's a game that you can't miss for those who like the role of beautiful girl or the fighting game!

name: BeeTheBest
summary: Winter is coming and the Hive needs resources. Become the Queens' champion collecting pollen against the clock, facing the environment and sabotaging the other players. A Party-Game to learn about many astounding details of the bees while having fun competing with each other in a Quiz.

name: Be the One
summary: Can you defeat the endless Waves of Enemies while trying to improve your Highscore?

name: Beyond Hope
summary: Beyond Hope gives you and your friends one epic space journey! Your mission alone or with friends is to save yourself from getting pulled into the hot Sun. Gather debris, scavenge asteroids and build your own space station. Reach for the stars and survive when all odds are against you!

name: Between: Stardust Trail
summary:
Made for Otome Jam 2023.

Clickety-clack... Clickety-clack…

Along the sound of the train track, Estelle, the MC, wakes up. After realizing that the information on her ticket was missing, Estelle had no choice but to work as a train attendant?! Will she be able to get off the train eventually?

name: Beat Fever: Music Tap Rhythm Game
summary: Beat Fever is a rhythm game featuring 4-lane tap/hold to the beat gameplay, collectible beat monsters, challenges and more.

name: Beer Simulator
summary: You are single? You have a very hard work and small salary? Then this game is just for you. In this game you can earn beer just by clicking on beer. Upgrade your beer, sell your beer, earn gold, purchase more beer without becoming an actual alcoholic.

name: Beast Shooter: Mezase Beast King
summary: Beast Shooter: Mezase Beast King is an Action game, developed by Hudson and published by Konami, which was released in Japan in 2002.

name: Behind the Masc
summary: A collection of game materials and art that reenvision masculinity

name: Beglov Style
summary: KB was just a dangerous prisoner, but then something went wrong.... The protagonist fights for survival in a post-apocalyptic world.

name: Bear Simulator: Ragnarok's Rise Survival
summary: Become the bear hero in Bear Simulator: Ragnarok’s Rise – prepare for mythic chaos!

name: Beat Bolt City
summary: Take to the skies and ride the lightning in Beat Bolt City! Run through the streets and swing among the rooftops with super-heroic speed as you swing along with the music.

name: Beer Break
summary: Very Challenging Medieval themed match 3 game. 400 levels for experienced users who wants the challenge of match 3 games with no help or purchases. The best players might beat all 400 levels.

name: Best Friends Tonight
summary: Newly recruited as the star of Teen Planet's TV show, you must make the cast become best friends - otherwise the TV show will be cancelled!

name: Become Dirt
summary: Become Dirt is a PSX-style 2.5D exploration horror game developed as part of the 2022 TGD Spooky Jam!

name: Beyond Flesh and Blood Episode 1
summary:
Space is easy... Prepare for Earth.
Beyond Flesh and Blood is the harsh shooter designed to push your skills to the limit.

name: Be King
summary: Be king is a decision taking game, and you can loose if you take the wrong decisions! Taking and making the right decisions is what you need to ensure you keep increasing your empire in size, and in power!

name: Ben Jordan: Paranormal Investigator - Case 5: Land of the Rising Dead
summary: After the events in London, Ben decides to return to his home... but then gets a call from his friends, Simon Booth and Alice Wilkins. Simon says that there have been a series of mysterious murders in Osaka, Japan... but they soon discover that there is much more going on than they had first suspected. Working together with local police and his friends, Ben discovers the involvement of living dead, and tries to find links between different events.

name: Beneath the Willows
summary: So an umbrella walks into a bar...

name: Behind These Eyes
summary: Behind These Eyes is a unique, exiting, and terrifying new horror game. Take control of protagonist Moribu, in his epic fight to overcome his penetrating fear, and save those he holds most dear.

name: Beyond the Kingdom 2
summary: The Fairy Kingdom is in trouble. Dark forces burst into all corners of the wonderland. Embark on a time management journey to help the King and his faithful assistants restore peace in the fairy kingdom and learn the secret of pirates.

name: Beat Survival
summary: Beat Survival is 2D pixel action-adventure survival game where you can play as single or in 2 players local co-op where you start driving around, looting, scavenging, crafting, fishing, dismantling and do more missions. Not only you fight the bad guy and zombies, but you also interact with others.

name: Beat Racer
summary:
In a desolated world, a lonely driver sets off to a journey to the surreal world of beats. Racing through the gorgeous soundscape, you explore the world by following the trail of alluring beats. Adventuring across the road, you jump over obstacles and defeat enemies to finish the race to complete all music.
Discover the beautifully designed backgrounds and unlock all the handcrafted uniquely designed cars. Join the fast-paced journey of rhythmic electronic music and stunningly stylish visuals.

1. STUNNING GRAPHICS
Experience the beautifully minimalistic 3D design and surreal graphics of the game world. Journey across the mysterious, special themed background landscape. Explore and unlock all the stunning futuristic car designs.

2. EASY CONTROLS
Drive sideways and jump to collect beats and avoid obstacles. This very addictive game is designed to be simple and easy for anyone to enjoy.

3. ELECTRONIC MUSIC
The game world presents various electronic indie music.
For the best experience play with headphones and full volume.

name: Beasts & Monsters
summary: This game is an extremely addictive pixel art adventure game. No more walking around outside in the cold. Now you can catch all your favourite beasts and monsters without even leaving your livingroom. Stay alive for as long as you can to reach the top of the leaderboard! Collect coins to unlock more wizards, spell books, magical wands and more. Try to always maintain full energy for the special super wizard attack. Fight to free the Pixel Kingdom from the pesky Beasts and Monsters!

name: Beyond the Horizon
summary:
Beyond the Horizon. We take you to the edge of a black hole and toss you in. That's where your adventure begins. 
Travel about, taking in the sights and sounds of this unusual world.

name: Bendy Royale
summary: Bendy Royale is a fan-made playable version of the April fools troll game trailer with the same title.

name: Beneath the Nexus
summary: Beneath the Nexus is the bullet hell that's better with friends, focusing on precise movement, stylish pixel-art, and full parties.

name: Beards & Beaks
summary: Beards and Beaks is an action/strategy game for Windows Phone 7.

name: beatmania complete MIX
summary:
beatmania completeMIX is a rhythm game developed by Konami. It is the fourth game in the beatmania series and is part of the BEMANI franchise.

The game is played with a controller with one turn table and 5 keys, three white and two black. On the screen you will see bars moving from the top to bottom in columns representing each of the keys and the turntable. When the bars reach the judgement line it is time to scratch.

Even though the game is based on the beatmania 3rdMIX engine, it does not feature a combo count. It is the first game in the series to show song titles on the song select and not just the genres. The flashing great judgement is introduced, which requires better precision to obtain over the normal great judgement.

INTERNET RANKING functionality is implemented. After a course has been completed an INTERNET RANKING code was given, which could be entered on Konamis online leaderboards.

beatmania completeMIX is a compilation mix containing the full song lists from beatmania - beatmania 3rdMIX. Only 4 new songs are added to the game, 2 of which are english versions of earlier songs. The total number of songs available in the game is 44.

name: Being Struck By Lightning is Probably the Best Way That You Could Die On Account of All of Its Awesomeness
summary: The game is tricky, with tough jumps to make and numerous dangerous spike pits.

name: Beat Them All
summary: Beat Them All is the ultimate Beat'em Up game. The whole game is designed in a story mode where you will fight against the thugs of city by applying your Boxing and Kung Fu skills. Includes a training mode to help your learn all techniques you will need to progress throughout the game. Clean the city now!

name: Beautiful Girls
summary: Relaxing puzzle game with beautiful girls

name: Beyond the Breach
summary: Discover a world overrun with robots, and play as a defective bot who tries to find a way to flee the facility. Find others who are the same kind, free them, and escape the laboratory!

name: Beach Boys: You and Me
summary: Everyone agrees on the same thing. The most attractive thing in love is a sincere and respectful guy. So, in this game you will have to show your sincerity to make it clear that you are a seducer.

name: Ben Jordan Case 8: Relics of the Past
summary: This is the eighth entry in the Ben Jordan series of popular freeware adventure games.

name: Beware Tomorrow
summary: You must escape a mysterious facility and solve complex puzzles in this psychological horror game. An unseen entity manipulates both you and a deranged man, forcing you to make life-or-death decisions to survive.

name: Berry Brother
summary: A metroidvania with a unique perspective mechanic. Find your missing clothes and confront your tiny brother...

name: Betterified VI: Bestified
summary: The sequel to Betterified V and the final game in the Betterified series. Sin Man assembles a team of four villains in an attempt to take down Mario or Toad.

name: Belief & Betrayal
summary: A point and click adventure game influenced heavily by the religious conspiracies and ancient secrets made popular by The Da Vinci Code.

name: Beat Around the Bush
summary: Beat Around the Bush is a series done over YouTube shorts where the top comment got the next addition to the game. Beat Around the Bush is a game where your primary goal is to Beat around the Bush. Once you do, you did it. You won. Therefore, there's no more reason to keep playing this game.

name: Bestowment
summary: The fun and intricacy of a collectible card game meets the endless replayability of a roguelike. Collect terrifying creatures and powerful spells to craft your unique deck in a sprawling campaign seeking audience with the 6 great gods in a quest to discover who you really are

name: Beware of Trains
summary: So you have been fired from your comfy, well paid, corporate job and now you just want to watch the world burn. Careful what you wish for! Beware of Trains is a twisted, violent puzzle sandbox unlike anything you have seen before.

name: Beast Lord: The New Land
summary: The climate suffered from an abrupt change, and resources are scarce. To survive and thrive, as a lord, you decided to search for new territory. After going through all kinds of hardships, you finally found a piece of fertile land. However, the seemingly peaceful new territory is full of hidden dangers.

name: BeatRider
summary: Mioi and the others, as apprentice Tuners, embarked on a six-month investigation in Baixiang City. As their mission progressed, the city's normalcy began to unravel, with dissonance and disturbances growing increasingly frequent and severe.

name: Bear It
summary: Can you handle this un-bear-able fast-paced FPS? Bear It is a highly replayable roguelite parkour movement shooter for agile players. Use parkour on the environment and even on your enemies to traverse the Ark’s platforms quickly and efficiently. Be prepared for the unexpected!

name: Berzerk: Enhanced Edition
summary:
This Enhanced Edition adds new features such as:
- Robot voice phrases - INTRUDER ALERT! and others
- Robots fire diagonally for more challenging gameplay
- New explosion animations
- Minor bug fixes from the original

name: Beach Cafe: Caribbean Sand
summary: Where is Grandpa? and why has his beach bar been closed for more than 2 years? An adventure full of puzzles and mystery begins! Explore, discover all the clues and read them correctly in order to advance. Let yourself be enveloped by a story of intrigue set on a beach.

name: Beatmania IIDX 31 Epolis
summary: A new arcade rhythm game from Konami.

name: Beta Escape
summary: Escape room inspired game. Solve puzzles, alone or with your friend, just like in your favorite escape room!

name: Beyond Sol
summary: Beyond Sol is a unique blend of action combat and grand strategy empire building in a dynamic open world. Collect resources, build your city, upgrade your ships, and cultivate relationships or wage wars with rival cities in your quest to dominate the solar system. Play singleplayer or multiplayer.

name: Beef Jerky
summary: A short-form RPG about a young man who lives with his sickly older sister. Struggling to support the both of them, he comes home from work one day to find something strange at his front door...

name: Bee 52
summary:
You're about to find out just what's involved for a young bee with a day-job. Gigantic spiders, sneaky ants and loathsome slugs are just a few of the meanies who'll get in your way when you're bee number 52. You're hardly defenseless though, and with enough speed, skill and firepower you may get through the day - despite being heavily outnumbered. Let your nose, or rather proboscis, lead the way to the flowers and don't let anyone - or anything - get in your way! B52 - you're cleared for take off!

Bee 52 is a side-scrolling video game published by Codemasters for the Nintendo Entertainment System in 1992.

A Commodore 64 version was completed in 1993, but was not published due to Codemasters withdrawing from the C64 market. After reaching an agreement with Codemasters, the programmer sold the game himself via mail order.

name: Better Call Saul Kart
summary: Join Saul Goodman and his friends in this high speed wacky kart racing game. Big Trash Games promises that this is indeed a video game that can be played by humans.

name: Best of Mahjong
summary: Relax your mind with the ancient game of tiles. "Best of Mahjong" features 404 layouts of the traditional tile-matching game in 3D, each with millions of different shuffles to play.

name: Behold!
summary:
Behold is a 2D twin-stick shooter in a dark fantasy setting! Barbarians, insane wizards, total despair and bloody pieces.
You are playing as a monster who is stuck between two armies.

name: Before the Battery's Over
summary: Restore a robot's memory files before the battery runs out. A distinct jigsaw puzzle game in which the movements and resources consume the life of your robot. Recover your memory with a variety of stylized arts that tell a mysterious story from your past.

name: Being Faust: Enter Mephisto
summary: An interactive mobile application played live in a given time and place with other people. This quote-heavy game was inspired from Goethe's Faust, a German classic.

name: Below the Ocean
summary: Dive deep "Below the Ocean" in search of legendary treasures while using your oxygen lifeline to swing passed obstacles! Run, Jump, Swing, Bubble-Jump, Bungee, Slingshot, Puzzle-Solve, Platform, Treasure-Hunt, BELOW THE OCEAN!

name: Beowulf: The Mobile Game
summary:
Beowulf: The Mobile Game is a fantasy themed 2D action platform game for mobile phone based on the 2007 movie based itself on an old English epic poem. In the game the player assumes the role of the mighty warrior Beowulf who is said to possess the strength of thirty men.

Gameplay incudes platforming and defeating enemies with a sword. Enemies include monster, skeletons and several bosses like a sea serpents, Grendel and his mother. Along the way gems can be collected as well as food to restore health and jewels to increase health. Beowulf can use over fifteen special moves including a move called Carnal Fury that can kill several enemies at once. There is also a move that lets you rip an enemy in half.

name: Bear Jump
summary: Step into the bouncy world of Bear Jump! Help a determined bear jump endlessly upward, dodging obstacles, collecting power-ups, and reaching new heights. With intuitive controls and addictive gameplay, Bear Jump is easy to pick up but challenging to master.

name: Beyond Skyrim
summary:
Beyond Skyrim is a massive multi-team mod project that opens the borders and brings Skyrim’s neighboring provinces to life. No longer will you be turned back at the borders of Skyrim, but you can travel onwards to the lands beyond.

Projects in development
- Beyond Skyrim: Argonia - The Roots of the World
- Beyond Skyrim: Cyrodiil - The Seat of Sundered Kings
- Beyond Skyrim: Elsweyr - Sugar and Blood
- Beyond Skyrim: Iliac Bay - Tower of Dawn
- Beyond Skyrim: Morrowind - The Star-Wounded East
- Beyond Skyrim: Roscrea - Voices of the Deep
- Beyond Skyrim: Atmora - Expedition to the North
- Beyond Skyrim: Valenwood - Lure of the Wilds

Projects Released
- Beyond Skyrim: Bruma

name: Bestiary Survivors
summary: Embark on a journey in a world on the brink, where dragons threaten animal homeland. Master five elements, utilize dual attack modes, and unique clan abilities. Challenge dragon bosses, uncover hidden tales in this roguelite, hack-and-slash adventure. Can you withstand the dragon onslaught?

name: Beat Workers
summary:
Beat Workers is set in a futuristic world where most of the work is done by robots. You're put in the shoes of the Great Architect, one of the last employed human being. Your job ? Rebuilding monuments from the Great Country’s past to offer some more distraction to the mostly idle Great People.
In order to do that, you need to synchronize builder robots by tapping to the beat of the awesome tracks composed specially for the game.
This task would be a piece of cake if it was not for the Saboteur, a dangerous criminal bent on preventing your Great Work from being done. You have to fight his legions of robot minions with the tip of your fingers, while keeping up with the rhythm of increasingly difficult music tracks.

name: Beyond Enemy Lines 2: Tank Base
summary: A new intense and large scale hostage rescure themed singleplayer mission in a highly guarded Tank Base. Including free Multiplayer Content for Conquest, Coop and Team-Deathmatch.

name: Beetle Ju 2
summary: Evil little creatures are invading Beetle Junior's world. Use your skill to defeat them in this side-scrolling adventure. To complete each level, you will need to destroy all the monsters on the level and save all the little bugs.

name: Beet: Drum Machine Game
summary:
Beet is the finger drumming game that puts your grooviness to the test.
Explore over 200 spicy beats designed by real producers.
Earn shiny stars to unlock new beats.

name: Beezooka
