summary: You are a humblebee with a bazooka full of pollen! Now it is up to you to pollinate the flowers in the garden around you in true "Beezooka" style. Also: while you are at it, try to defend them from the evil bugs.

name: Beyond Enemy Lines 2: Stronghold
summary: A new intense singleplayer and large scale mission where you need to locate the warhead in Volkov's, by paramilitary soldiers guarded Stronghold.

name: Beezaster
summary: Build an army and coordinate the defence of your Hive while at the same time attempting to capture the enemy Hives you discover as you complete a variety of unique missions. Fast paced, fun, action packed adventure.

name: Beauty or the Beast
summary:
Beauty or The Beast allows the player to adventure through a variation of the classic "Beauty and the Beast" tale through the eyes of either the Beauty or the Beast. From the perspective of Belle (the Beauty), her father has been imprisoned in the Beast's castle and she must find her way through the castle in order to rescue him. The Beast is investigating interlopers in his domain.

The gameplay has the player navigating the character through a point and click adventure. Navigate against pre-rendered backgrounds and pick up items to use later. Consult the automatically drawn map for directions. Many of the rooms in the game also contain some type of minigame necessary to advance the overall game. Minigames include reassembling suits of knight armor from a mess of pieces; quickly lighting a sequence of torches; guiding a group of frogs off a fountain via circling lily pads; and protecting a moth from a gang of hungry spiders.

There are two owl brothers -- Horace and Boris Finefeather -- who offer advice and assistance throughout Belle's and the Beast's quest respectively.

name: Be my sword!
summary:
An action RPG where you challenge barriers by making full use of sacred tools
"Be my sword!" has been translated into English. At first, the hero can only attack with a sword. If you take an item in the Yashiro, various actions are possible. Tactics vary depending on the combination of items. Aim to clear levels with your own strategies.

name: Beneath the Bleeding Moon
summary: A boys' love / yaoi visual novel set in 19th century Japan. Follow the adventures of Haru, an aloof young man forced to crossdress by his mother from childhood, and Kishou, a cheerful and irreverent thief brought up in poverty, as they travel across the country to break an age-old curse.

name: BeeFender
summary: An arcade-style shooter that challenges you not to defend yourself; DEFEND THE HIVE! Defend it from the birds, defend it from the insects, defend it from... oh, just play the game to find out. How long can you last against the onslaught? Can you break the online top-15 leaderboard? Use a variety of powerups and keyboard-and-mouse skill to fly through an evolving world thats only goal is to destroy your hive. BeeFend!

name: Best Friends Forever
summary: Help unite Petey and Patty in our brand new game, Best Friends! It's amazingly addictive, with wonderful physics, whimsical graphics, and charming speech sounds!

name: Beat!: After the Summer - Another Season Episode
summary: This is a story about 4 girls, who had a desire to become an idol. After the break-up of ♡beAt, they are facing a new challenge and about to stand out.

name: Bellumentum
summary: Ever play a MOBA and wish you could be every one of your teammates? Well, it was DEFINITELY their fault, but time to see if you could do any better.

name: Betty Bat's Treasure Hunt
summary: Play as Betty Bat as she travels the world collecting gems. Tired of living in caves, the bats of the world have gathered up enough gems to buy a castle. You must reach your fellow bats and gather their gems before the birds have a chance to steal them!

name: Beyond the Wall
summary: Classic point-and-click adventure with a magical atmosphere. Discover what happens one night Beyond the Wall of the garden. Immerse yourself into a mysterious world where fantasy meets reality with a pinch of humor. Solve puzzles, collect items, and overcome obstacles that await you on your journey.

name: Behind the Kurten
summary: A survival/slasher text game

name: Beyond Your Fear
summary: Descend into an atmospheric, story-driven psychological horror game where the player must investigate a case, solve riddles, and make hard choices on the way to uncovering what lies beyond your fear.

name: Before the Kingdom Falls
summary: Will you be able to hold out long enough to prevent the kingdom from falling?

name: Beat Blast
summary: Beat Blast is a music maker bullet hell. The music you make is also your skill tree. Create powerful attacks and catchy beats by combining different music notes.

name: Bepuzzled Jigsaw Puzzle: Japan
summary: 103 Jigsaw Puzzles of Japan! New meets Old! Three sizes of puzzle! Timer and hints! What great value!

name: Beach Restaurant
summary: Your task is to serve the orders of arriving tourists. Each order is unique, here you have a burger and cheeseburger, and soda and coffee.

name: Behind Closed Doors 4: Balrog's Day Out
summary: A text adventure game.

name: Bella & Friends: Puppy Doctor
summary: Have fun with Bella again in her new doctor adventure!

name: Beat Dungeon
summary: Try to survive a dungeon where the monsters move to the beat.

name: Bee-Man
summary: Our Bee-Man's hives are scattered all over the place. Help it collect all of the hives in each level and travel to the next level in the bubble!

name: Be-Yond: Kurodaishou ni Mirareteru
summary:
When I woke up from the darkness, I learned that I was the legendary Devil of Darkness, that was said to have the power to destroy the universe.

The beautiful girls approach me one after another. My shout roars in space. When I pat a villain gently, he is discomposed into molecules... It seems that I have the power... But... am I really the Devil?

name: Beeline
summary: Guide Hank to his bee-hive, avoiding the energy-sapping toadstools, spiders, faces, insecticide cans, trackers and lizard's tongue whilst collecting the pollen grains, flowers, apples, honey pots and bowls of water.

name: Beneath Floes
summary: Qikiqtaaluk, 1962. The sun falls below the horizon and won't return for months. You wander the broken shoreline, wary of your mother's stories about the qalupalik. Fish woman, stealer of wayward children: she dwells beneath the ice.

name: Be
summary: Build, relax or explore in a beautiful world. Chill out next to a lake or build crazy structures (with friends!) Choose your own weather & time of day.

name: Best of Arcade Games: Brick Breaker
summary: Rediscover all the pleasure of Breakout in this timeless classic!

name: Bee Flowers
summary: Relax and Puzzle with Buzzing Bees!

name: Beat Stomper
summary:
Music, Neon light, Geometry.
Jump, Hold , Stomp.
The perfect combination of pure joy.
It is born for you, and you are born for it.
What are you waiting for?

name: Benji: Space Rescue
summary:
As Benji, your mission is to save a number of scientists that are being held by robot drones somewhere in the solar system. Once they are on board, you take them safely back to Earth. This can be done by going into the engine room and selecting the planet of your choice, and you can modify the warp and jump settings to get to the planet faster or slower. When cruising the planet's surface, your ship's alarm will sound if it detects enemy movement. This is followed by the drones chasing you and shooting you with their lasers. While fighting the drones, you can use the keyboard's function keys to either fire torpedoes or phasors.

Also while transporting scientists, you must supply them with rations in order for them to survive. You are constantly running out of fuel, meaning that you need to stock up while orbiting space. Higher ranks have you rescuing more scientists and navigating an asteroid field. You have a specific number of star days to rescue the scientists. If you run out of time or fuel, the game will be over. The higher the rank, the more difficult your rescue mission becomes.

name: Beat Back VR
summary: This game is a rhythm game in which you move your body and destroy flying magic balls. Blow away your stress with a powerful blow, and collect various cards

name: Between Planets
summary: You were attacked on the way back to the mission. When you wake up, you will find that the escape cabin has fallen onto a planet. You need to survive on the planet and find the truth of the matter.

name: Ben 10: Ben to the Rescue
summary: The game features Tetrax Shard kidnapping Gwen, prompting Ben to chase after him to save her.

name: Beat the Mons!
summary: BEAT THE MONS is simple pixel auto shooter. Dodge, shoot, beat all these monsters and earn score! Life is not much else...

name: Beneath the Woods
summary: 'Beneath the Woods' is a stylized, narrative-focused 3rd person mystery / horror / puzzle game about a young man in a race against time to investigate the disappearance of his younger sister. What he stumbles upon is something far more sinister than he could ever imagined.

name: Beach Head 2002
summary: BEACHHEAD 2002 follows on the success of BEACHHEAD 2000 with ease of use and hard-core, non-stop 3D shooting action in a photorealistic and accurate environment. Players will be assigned to an inland defense perimeter, protecting a command post to repel an expected airborne assault. It has more depth and game play variations, smarter troops and with more weapons to choose from. Continuous day and night fighting with searchlights and night flares and much, much more.

name: Bella
summary: 10 Levels for Zdoom, Plus 2 secret levels. Each level has all new challenges awaiting you. Plenty of use of the features in Zdoom like stealth enemies. There are also some new enemies capable of peforming the most unexpected tricks. There is no scripting this wad because I havent figured it out. There are 3 new types of Cacodemon, 1 new Cybderdemon, 1 new Mancubus 2 new Hell Knights. You're mission is to Save the backpack from the white Super Cybderdemon and kill yet another giant spider. Secret exits are in Level 1 and 8, both are extremley difficult to figure out, but the secret levels are the most stunning.

name: Bella II
summary:
Bella II is a megawad for Doom II by Paul Corfiatis and Chris Hansen that was released in 2003. Difficulty is medium to difficult throughout and the theme varies from level to level. Some of the maps are experimental. ZDoom is required for best gameplay results.

There are 43 levels in total, 35 main maps including 5 secret levels. You must destroy John Romero and rescue MassMouth.

name: Beached
summary: After a mysterious boating accident, you find yourself stranded on a small tropical island. Life isn't so bad here: there's food, wood, and gold for the taking, so why leave? Well, even paradise has its dark moments, and this particular paradise is about to be wiped off the map by a hurricane. Your newfound life of leisure has turned into a lesson in bare survival. Avoid starving to death, chop wood, build a boat, and get off that sand pile. Before you leave, you might even have enough time to line your pockets with the gold that still litters the island.

name: Beauty and the Beast
summary: Explore, uncover, and unravel the mystery behind the Beast and his residence in this first-person narrative adventure.

name: Be My Loyal Subject
summary: The reign of King Ulric begins. Help him decide how he will rule his kingdom. Between the clergy, the army, the merchants, and the common people, will he treat them fairly? Maybe he will find love in one of his followers...

name: Bernd das Brot und die Unmöglichen
Be a Maid in the Demon World: The Secret Cafe of the Demon Angel Hero
summary: The protagonist who Reincarnated to the Demon World became a black mascot, in order to restore his original appearance. Use the knowledge of the "different world" to transform the little devil's tavern into a maid cafe, and aim for the first maid cafe in the demon world!

name: Beyond Myths
summary: Beyond Myths is a Metroidvania, where the player traverses a futuristic Chinatown split between dimensions with high mobility and difficult combat encounters.

name: BelisBelus
summary: A fighting game based entirely on pinching your opponent.

name: Beat the Song
summary: A music game, where you play songs. You play missing percussion, guitars, pianos, vocals, synthesizers, effects, strings and many more other instruments that change during the game. A total of [b]127 minutes[/b] of music you can play.

name: Beyond the Dark
summary:
Demon, Hell, the Beyond!

After being locked in a unknown location. All you know is that you need to keep the lights on, and find a key to get out of there. A demon from Beyond lurks inside the darkness , retching for your soul!!!

name: Beat Bricks
summary: This game is very interesting, using the rebound principle of objects to play the game.

name: Beat 'N' Path
summary: Combine creativity and logic to create machines… that create music! Take on exciting challenges in Career Mode, or experiment in Sandbox Mode.

name: Ben 10 Ultimate Alien: Ultimate Crisis
summary: Ben 10 Ultimate Alien: Ultimate Crisis - Aggregor villain and his robots are attacking Earth! Use the powers of the Ultimate Swampfire to defeat as many robots as you can. Why not punch, kick and throw balls of fire to protect the Earth from the invasion of Aggregor villain and his great army of robots. It's hero time!

name: Bejeweled Blitz Live
summary: The most competitive 60 seconds on XBLA! Take on friends in the brilliant gem-matching action of Bejeweled Blitz Live! Choose your favorite playing style - Classic or Twist - and rocket up the leaderboards! Create cascades of fun with Flame gems, Lightning gems and Hypercubes. You can even combine scores with friends for the highest weekly and all-time Friendscores. The challenge is irresistible!

name: Beyond Polaris Guardian
summary: Beyond Polaris Guardian is a action-rpg and TPS on a flexible campaign system with different stories. Incarne 3 unique characters and develop your personal story thanks to the innovative Galactic Network system.

name: Behind Walls
summary:
Behind Walls is a small, short game that focuses on the storyline, the player will reveal the truth of this world. 
The main idea of this game came from presentable liberty, and many similar features can be found throughout the game. 
This game is quite short and only take around 20min to complete, the game will also have more updates to come soon after.

name: Beast's Fury
summary: Beast's Fury is an anthropomorphic-themed fighting game with high resolution graphics.

name: Beatmania 6thMIX + Core Remix
summary: Final PlayStation beatmania release. Contains all of the songs from beatmania 6thMIX, all of the new songs from beatmania Core Remix, four long versions from beatmania III Append 6thMIX, and six new remixes.

name: Beatmania Append Gottamix
summary: Is a derivative game from beatmania series. It has a total of 20 songs, most of them brand new songs. It requires a Key Disc to play it because it's an extension. Normal, Hard and Expert are absent from the game. The player go straight to play the songs.

name: Beyond the Destiny
summary: A team of indie-developers are excited to present a new sci-fi MMO shooter game on the Unity 3D engine. Beyond the Destiny is a new science fiction multiplayer online game with an open game universe, which combines the genres of classic role-playing games, real-time strategy and third-person shooter.

name: Beatmania IIDX 23 Copula
summary: Beatmania IIDX 23: Copula is the 23rd installment of the Beatmania IIDX series. The first location test was held at the Tokyo Lesiure Land #2 location in Akihabara, Japan from July 10 through 12th 2015. It was released on November 11, 2015.

name: Better Boyfriend
summary: Improve your boyfriend so he’s better than all the rest! Nag and encourage your boyfriend to level him up… If you are vigilant, your boyfriend will learn to complete tasks without you reminding him, and will start proactively doing nice things for you!

name: Between them
summary: In Between them you are an agent who gets different missions. You yourself have the decision how to complete the mission and therefore you have several options to choose from.

name: Bejeweled
summary: ColecoVision version of the popular game Bejeweled made by Daniel Bienvenu. The core game remains the same: matching up three or more of the same jewel by swapping their positions with neighboring jewels on a grid.

name: Bebylon Battle Royale
summary: Bebylon Battle Royale is a VR game about immortal babies battling it out in vehicular combat.

name: Beeps and Blips
summary: A game featured in Action 52.

name: Benjamin's Revenge
summary: Embark on a daring mission in Benjamin's Revenge, a retro-style puzzle platformer set in the year 2060. As Benjamin, you must navigate through a high-security facility filled with traps and intricate puzzles. Sneak past surveillance cameras, hack security systems, and outsmart your enemies to hijack the top-secret lab and uncover its hidden mysteries. Can you unravel the truth before it's too late? The fate of the future rests in your hands.

name: Berries Challenge
summary: Berries Challenge is a berries hunter simulator. Here you can walk around the forest and enjoy the nature, meet different animals and, of course, gather berries.

name: Bestanden! Dein Weg zum Führerschein (German Highway Code)
summary: Discover the best way to learn the German Highway Code! Prepare for the exam, test your knowledge, and challenge your friends in exclusive mini games. Enjoy every mode in solo or with other players, overcome your blind spots with special quiz series. Your future driving license is right around the corner!

name: Beat Boss
summary: Ever get tired of listening to your boss at work? Ever get so mad you wish you could punch him silly? Well, now you CAN with this fun game Beat Your Boss! It's been a long day, you're ready to go home, and this guy just won't leave you alone! So take your aggressions out on the boss and don't actually get fired from your job!

name: Beppo's Hole in One Golf
summary: A 2D top-down golf game featuring 9 holes of golf.

name: Beach Bar VR
summary: Beach Bar VR is an arcade game about bar tending. See how many tips you can earn in the time limit. Learn to make different cocktails.

name: Ben 10: Power Splash
summary: Your mission is to prevent Jonah Melville from stealing the Krakken's eggs and to rescue the bound and gagged Gwen. Avoid all of the enemies on the screen or kill them and avoid getting hit by the bombs the Jonah throws at you as Stinkfly.

name: Beyond Enemy Lines 2: Covert Strike
summary: A intense new Campaign set after the events of Beyond Enemy Lines 2. The russian mafia were involved in the theft of advanced technological research from a US facility and you need to bring it back!

name: Best Friends Forever
summary: Visual Novel

name: Bearzerkers
summary: Bearzerkers is a local multiplayer game of two halves, with a focus on indirect combat and avoidance. HUNT pits you and your friends against each other; where you don't need to run faster than the bear to survive, just faster than the person next to you. Gauntlet is the ultimate game of moment to moment cooperation where every second counts and a single slip up can be the end for you and your team.

name: Befuddle
summary: Befuddle is a cozy multiplayer party game where players take turns decoding the addictive word puzzles of your favourite songs, books, films and video games! Deliberate, deduce and decipher the mixed up titles with your friends or Twitch viewers and see who’s the best Befuddler!

name: Beacon
summary: Beacon is a short point-and-click adventure game. It is about commander Valentin who came back from space in a capsule and entered Earth's atmosphere when something failed. The space vessel hits water and sinks to the bottom. Commander Valentin is hurt and cannot move, so the player takes control of an emergency drone with the objective of deploying an emergency beacon for recovery.

name: Behind the Barrier
summary: The year is 1440, and you are a priest that was brave enough to travel to the village of Rosenwood to cleanse the evil spirit (demon) that has been lurking there. . .

name: Because I happened to know a secret of a transforming heroine...
summary: A visual novel from Hengaya.

name: Beyond Castle Wolfenstein
summary: The Atari 8-bit version of the game has different graphics on the soldiers and character and sounds. The castle layout stays roughly the same.

name: Beyond Castle Wolfenstein
summary: The DOS version has different graphics but similar sound to Apple II version. Notably this is a bootable game.

name: Beauty and the Beast: The New Adventure
summary: After breaking the first curse that transformed the Prince into a Beast, the tranquility is interrupted when a magical force stops time.

name: Bengan Yes
summary: Bengan Yes is an action-packed arena fighting game designed for livestreaming. Choose to either let your viewers brawl it out or simulate a clash between thousands of bots. Everyone has an equal chance of winning with both the arena and stats of players being randomized.

name: Be Her Hero
summary: You're the hero and it's your job to save cute girls from an evil crime organization!

name: Beat Valkyrie Ixseal
summary: Oudou Tsuguhiko is a student who believes he is the reincarnation of the Demon King, and is waiting for the time he can fully regain his powers. When that time comes, he is attacked by the valkyrie Ixseal, and further betrayed by his Demonic Chancellor Bezel, who steals six of his powers and leaves him only with lust. Ixseal learns that the Wargrim, Bezel's army, have isolated her from the heavens and her source of power, so she teams up with Tsuguhiko to fight back against them.

name: Beyond the Law: The Third Wave
summary: Choose from 50 members of an elite group of paramilitary specialists and lead them on 20 missions to stop an organized crime wave in New York City

name: Being
summary: Being is an abstract adventure game that explores, from a future lens, the past and present of the Palestinian lived experience. The player controls an avatar from the distant future of Palestine on a mission to recover artifacts, memories, and messages from a mysterious house near an old border.

name: Benchmark Your Skills
summary: With tests to measure and improve cognitive abilities such as memory, reflexes, and reaction time. Try it now and challenge your brain!

name: Beatmania IIDX 7th style
summary: The 7th game in the IIDX series.

name: Beyond the Sea
summary:
On one small island, the boy came across a girl. 
They start to grow big dreams with each other. 
Can they achieve a dream?

name: Beverly Hills Cop
summary: Beverly Hills Cop is a video game developed by Tynesoft and published in 1990. The story is loosely based on the 1984 film Beverly Hills Cop. The player controls Axel Foley in four distinct sub-games: a side-scrolling action game, a driving game, an overhead view shooter, and a first person shooter. The game was released on Commodore 64, ZX Spectrum, BBC Micro, Amstrad CPC, Amiga, Atari ST, and MS-DOS. The BBC version only contains the driving game.

name: Beat Blocks VR
summary: Beat Blocks VR is a VR Arcade game where your goal is to assemblate blocks and make best combinations to explose the high-score. Very innovative game, you will interact directly with shapes linked to the level soundtrack.

name: Beachcombing
summary: The humans left a bunch of treasures on the beach as usual.

name: Beyond the Skies
summary: Time to have fun!

name: Beats
summary: Downloadable rhythm game for PSP that can be played with the player's own MP3s stored on the memory stick. Available through the online PSP store or PSN.

name: Beans Dash
summary:
Winter is coming.
Merry Christmas!!
Time To beat beans.
Tap on the space grid, and beans will dismiss if there are at least two beans with the same color in the cross line.

name: Beast Boxing 3D
summary: Fight the boxing legends of Beasthalla. Even the weird ones.

name: Beach Outlet Simulator
summary: Run your retail company. Sign contracts with leading brands, order new products, meet customer needs, and never let your customers leave the store empty-handed. Hire new workers, expand your store, and enjoy the growth of your retail company.

name: Beach Bounce Remastered
summary: A slice of life visual novel game in three parts following Tomoyo during his summer visiting a long lost relative. A fun tongue in cheek story with multiple branches, several relationships and various alternate endings for you to enjoy.

name: Beat 'Em Down
summary: Beat 'Em Down is a First Person Shooter rhythm game where you shoot and play to the rhythm of the music. Select your song and upgrade your weapon through challenges by killing enemies. Are you ready? Beat them down!

name: Beyond the Legend: Mysteries of Olympus
summary: Journey to ancient Greece to relieve a beautiful tale of romance in this exciting Hidden Object Adventure. Theron, a modest hunter deeply in love with the goddess Artemis, has to overcome all obstacles standing in their way to happiness. Travel with Theron across the worlds of mighty gods to finally reach Mount Olympus and to prove that he deserves to be with the goddess. Explore gorgeous locations and watch as this amazing and breathtaking story unfolds!

name: Beetlebum
summary: Insect-themed classic survival horror demo with pre-rendered backgrounds.

name: Beach Volleyball Challenge
summary: Feel the heat of sunshine, suit up in a light outfit, and start the emotional battle in Beach Volleyball Challenge. It’s the best simulator of beach volleyball available on the market! Get a virtual trip to places like Copacabana or Manhattan Beach – the capitals of that summer sport! This sport game will serve you emotions comparable to that given on tournaments like Manhattan Beach Open, New York Open, or Huntington Beach Open!

name: Beerslinger
summary:
Beer Slinger is a fairly straightforward game - you play a bartender and you serve beers to your patrons. The catch? Not every patron orders the same beer, and you'll soon realize that you'll have multiple orders at once! 
 
As the levels increase, the choice of beer changes, more orders come in, and it can become crazy in no time! To add to the pressure, the customers will only wait so long before they decide to go to a different bar! 
 
To add to an already addicting good time, Beer Slinger uses voice samples for the patrons, stating the beer type they'd like. 
 
Do you think you have what it takes to be a true Beer Slinger?

name: Bepuzzled Space Jigsaw Puzzle
summary: 108 Space puzzles to complete! Interesting space rockets, space suits and celestial bodies. Challenge yourself with the timer and resist the urge to use hints. Friendly User Interface for easy selection and 'magnetic' pieces for convenience. Calming music, which can be muted.

name: BeiJing Courier Simulator
summary: After graduating from college, I resolutely gave up hundreds of millions of property. I decided to stay in Beijing and be an ordinary courier. I have to work hard on my career. I set a small goal ： earned him a hundred million. Then marry BaiFuMei and embark on the peak of life.

name: Beyond Tokyo
summary: Beyond Tokyo is a VR adventure around Shibuya in Tokyo, Japan. Get a taste of the unique culture of Japan by freely exploring a stylized Shibuya and experience different places - both popular and off the beaten path - via 360 videos, photos, narration, and storytelling.

name: Beat Ninja
summary: Beat Ninja is a rhythm based VR game that has you cutting up music like never before. Slice through the music notes as the fly at you from all angles while a tower defense mini-game plays out to your actions. Works with your own music library and supports user and auto-generated beat maps.

name: Bebop and Tempo
summary: One hit and you are out. Bebop and Tempo's difficulty matches your play style. Take the easy route and carefully plan your next step to complete each level. On the other hand, master the mechanics of Bebop and Tempo to switch, dodge, and attack within a blink of an eye to earn the highest score.

name: Behind the Horizon: The Sky Fortress
summary: Expands the game Behind the Horizon with a new exciting main story, many new areas, items, spells, new pets and plants ! - A farm RPG in a nature simulation that keeps changing the world. Dive into a new adventure! BtH-The Sky Fortress awaits you...

name: Beyond Kung-Fu
summary: Unreleased prototype was canned because it tested badly. Also known as Super Spartan X.

name: Bejeweled Stars
summary: The original match-3 series is back with Bejeweled Stars. Match colorful gems across hundreds of levels, deploy explosive Powers and collect Stars to rebuild the night sky.

name: Behind The Truth
summary: Have you ever be deceived by a stranger on the internet? Have you ever seen those exposed college girl’s nude-photos as they can’t repays the loan? You will play as a female journalist, to disclose all the danger and crime which underlie the depths of society and awaken more women.The game is based on a true story, and it has been reported in Southern Weekend on 7th July 2017.

name: Beat Survival: Expansion
summary: If you enjoy playing Beat Survival in Early Access and want to continue playing with extension map and additional 9 NPC's missions, then please buy this DLC-Expansion In this DLC, the map becomes double size for you or with other player to explore than in Early Access. More stories are more fun.

name: Beauty and Violence: Valkyries
summary: A third-person fast-paced ARPG. Customize your female warriors and bring them to the most brutal combat. Slash your enemies into pieces, gut them, and release the darkest side of Valkyries.

name: Become Castellane in Another World
summary: This gameplay is a virsual novel game developed according to the anime with same name of "Become Castellane in Another World", which enclude enriched plot branch options to provide more funs during the jouney in another world by following the key role, to enjoy the journey with funs and happiness.

name: Bevel's Painting
summary:
Bevel's Painting is a freeware horror exploration game by Maninu made in RPG Maker VX. It's not too long, estimated to be about 2 hours, but will likely be longer than that if you replay for other endings.

A girl named Bevel explores a painting of her own creation.

name: Beullokgwa Miyeonsiwa Godae Geuriseu
summary: A chaotic educational game set in ancient Greece!Become the fictional philosopher Epistemonos and defeat the scholars who stand in your way!Drag blocks to merge them and defeat the enemies.Immerse yourself in a topsy-turvy story set in ancient Greece, with a focus on the Acropolis.

name: Beginner'sGame
summary:
This game is retro 2D shooting mini game.But scenario mode do Implementation.
Now,first story is delivering. but will deliver on updates
May be Specification change from your review So please write review!
Now Beta release

name: Beware the Shadowcatcher
summary:
Maude's old diner was struggling to stay open.

But then one late night, three unexpected guests arrived.

The last hope of saving the diner lies with these guests, yet there's still one problem...

Something followed them.

name: Beyond the Forbidden Lands
summary: Beyond the Forbidden Lands is a non-profit fan-made PC remake of Shadow of the Colossus with the restoration of cut content as a major focus, including the Unused Colossi and removed areas from the game. The game will provide the option of playing as close to the original Shadow of the Colossus as possible, along with the inclusion of a 'Story Mode' which is set before SotC.

name: Best of Tests DS
summary:
THINK THEREFORE I PLAY! 
 
Logic, observation, memory, speed of perception and analysis: these are the qualities that defi ne the famous Intelligence Quotient and the ones that Best of Tests DS will enable you to test, according to renown scientifi c protocols. It will also allow you to improve them! 
 
Through the very many tests and using all the functionalities specifi c to the Nintendo DS which are found in the three gaming modes (Training – verbal, numbers and letters, drawings, playing cards, dominos, etc. - Memory and Tests) 
Best of Tests DS calculates your I.Q. and adapts itself to your level in order to offer you a personalized challenge that is always renewed and updated. 
All the classic challenges of I.Q. tests on your Nintendo DS. 
An excellent way to maintain and improve your intelligence, while you are having fun! 
Several hundred different questions 
The best way to prepare for professional I.Q. tests! 
A continually renewed interest thanks to the varied rules and different ways to answers the questions. 
An incremental diffi culty level with tests that are increasingly more diffi cult! 
Serious results, presented in a humorous manner.

name: Best of Sierra Nr. 7
summary:
This is the July/August 1998 issue (Volume 7) of the Best of Sierra series.

This issue contains these two games:

- 3-D Ultra Pinball
- Casino De Luxe

name: Beneath a Steel Sky: Remastered
summary: Beneath a Steel Sky is a cyberpunk, point and click, adventure game. You assume te role of Robert Foster and embark on a quest to make the world a better place, along with your robot companion Joey. This is the iOS version.

name: Beaming Stingray
summary: Experience Soraya's journey to return a captured deity in this approachable and fluid shoot 'em up. Shoot, dash, dodge, and rewind as you fight for the future by saving the past...

name: Beggar's Paradise
summary: Join the adventure in Beggar's Paradise, the ultimate idle clicker game. Upgrade your items and progress through the levels by tapping and earning money. Build your own economy and watch it grow as you become the richest beggar in the land. Simple, fun and addictive! Beggar's Paradise will keep you entertained for hours. Download now and see for yourself why it's the ultimate time-killer game!

name: BeaureCard
summary: Your deck is your health in BeaureCard, an easy to learn fast-paced roguelike deckbuilder. Strive to deplete your opponents' deck, cleverly using traps, powers, blessings, and curses. Embark on an epic adventure, with exciting events to explore, new cards to acquire, and dangerous demons.

name: Before the Last Hour
summary: Play a unique rogue like game, mixing item and card games in an original post-apocalyptic universe. Explore, upgrade your equipment, fight unique monsters and bosses. And unlock all the secrets of the Before The Last Hour universe.

name: Beautiful Blood
summary: Trapped by two beautiful vampires... Is this heaven or hell?

name: Beauties Unveiled 2: Joy Level Pack
summary: Being a groupie may have certain perks and you will get to meet your idols. Sometimes you may even get an autograph. In case of Joy, you may be able to get more than you bargained for…

name: Beetle Ju
summary:
Beetle Ju is a game inspired by maze-dig concept games such as Dig Dug, Mr. Do!, Digger and Boulder Dash. You're playing as a small beetle named Ju (shortening for "Junior") and your aim is to clear your home dungeon flooded with evil and treacherous monsters.

Make your way through the labyrinth by digging the path, either cleverly moving obstacles such as boulders or simply blowing them up. Various weapons are available such as grenades, rockets and time bombs. In addition, the use of projectiles is also worthwhile in the fight against the numerous villains.

A total of 101 levels are available.

name: Beach Boys: The Perfect Date
summary: Lying is not the best way to win a boy's heart. So behave well and be sincere as well as quick in giving your answers.

name: Beckett
summary: Beckett by The Secret Experiment is a surreal noir. A disturbing story of a missing-persons investigator, hired to find a young man suffering from a mental illness. It is a taste of the alternative - an experience that will make you question what it is to exist. It is a vivid musing on identity, memory and loss. It is unlike anything you will ever play. It wants to offend. Don't let it. Poor, poor Beckett.

name: Before the Great
summary: Before the Great is a turn based rpg for Windows that has you taking the role of a soldier in the army of the infamous former world ruler Garland a week before his final assault on the capital of the continent of Jira.

name: Beauties Academy: Spellcraft Tournament
summary: The centenary Spellcraft Tournament is about to start and Rosalee is getting ready to win it. Face enemies, meet friends, learn powerful skills and win a huge prize!

name: Behind the Red Dais
summary: Flowers of love and pain.

name: Beast Modon
summary: In this arcade style shoot em up that lets you earn more punishing difficulties, you are Sylvester, a hero pilot in his glory days turned space janitor on a space station. After an attack on said post, it is up to him to retrieve the fabled Fang Shards. Turn your Beast Mode on, you're going to need it.

name: Berzerk
summary: Maneuver your humanoid through the electrified mazes of robot filled rooms. You many kill off the first group of robots but initial success does not mean survival...future groups begin firing at your! Added danger lurks when Evil Otto enters. He can jump the maze walls and squash you if you linger too long!

name: Beasts of Burden
summary: A psychological horror game and ARG inspired by the late 90s era of handheld gaming

name: Beat! After the Summer
summary: Spread your wings, after the summer sky.

name: Beer Pong League
summary: Get drunk and have a blast in a whole new way! Play against your friends and climb the rankings to reach the top of the League! Come join the party in Beer Pong League!

name: Beach Relaxation VR
summary: Escape to your own private island in virtual reality where you can relax, paint and build sandcastles.

name: Beldamos Miner
summary: Beldamos Miner is a mining game, where you hunt for ore, buy upgrades, and explore. It starts out in a simple world that has an air of familiarity but as you progress in the game, you'll find a more complex and interesting world unfolds. Mine ore, learn spells, buy upgrades, and finish quests!

name: Being Loved
summary: It's valentine again, but I have company this year. This is a short casual simulation game, dive into the fantasy of a man, make money and give your promise to your beloved one.

name: Beluga: Kamikaze Aircraft Carrier
summary:
One month after the whole world was invaded by aliens, an investigation team searching a crashed spaceship in Tibet finds a strikingly primitive data record. A group of astonished young experts in the U.S. and Italy, realizing they've recovered an NTSC video signal, play back the events of that fateful battle between the invaders and Beluga, humanity's last line of defense

This arcade-style horizontal shooter by Tetsu Matsushima puts you in the cockpit of a flying bipedal mech, blasting extraterrestrial foes while navigating each level. Not only can you fire vertical missiles and mortars at ground level, but it's possible to move backwards against the left-to-right stage scroll, letting you control the pace of battle. Each level ends with you defeating a boss enemy and watching the titular vessel crash into the alien base for massive damage. Beluga later received a PS Vita remake in the style of classic Mega Drive and PC Engine arcade shooters, released as part of Yakuza 0's Vita app.

name: Bearable Nightmares
summary: Smash, dash, crash, and slash through spooky forests, creepy arcades, chilling schools, and more as you upgrade your teddy hero with amazing set of abilities to reclaim the freedom to dream!

name: Bellatrix e o Palácio do Tempo
summary: Bellatrix e o Palácio do Tempo is an educational adventure game that tells the story of the beginnings of the telephone in a fun and interactive way.

name: Better Call Saul
summary: Better Call Saul for the Nintendo DS is a small fan/joke game based on the popular TV-Series of the same name.

name: Bedtime Blues
summary: They say that child’s imagination is pure and innocent, but what if said imagination becomes a nightmare? Enter the pixelate world of a young, troubled mind, and survive the night!

name: Betrayed Alliance: Book 1
summary: A Sierra-style EGA parser adventure game. The first Book in a planned Trilogy of fantasy adventure games.

name: Beautiful Mystic Defenders
summary: Beautiful Mystic Defenders is a tactical tower defense, romantic visual novel game where you are the savior of the mystic realm's incredibly gorgeous ladies. Build towers wisely, level up heroines, obtain upgrades, defeat hordes of monsters and immerse in a stimulating harem love story!

name: Beloved Beatrice
summary: Beatrice has never liked the world she lived in, so she escapes into the realm of dreams in order to avoid it. What happens after she encounters a mysterious girl within her dream?

name: Be a Poker Champion! Texas Hold'em
summary: Texas Hold 'em has been a long-time favorite at casino tables all over the world. Now you can sharpen your poker skills in-game! Take on a variety of AI opponents with different play styles and skill levels. Fair and honest AI allows you to focus on upping your game! Hints, hand analysis, and other support features give you the advice you need, when you need it. Accessible to all players, no experience required! Prove your card smarts at ring games across six distinct locales. Clear three stages to claim victory at five different tournaments. Brush up on the rules and hone your skills in the poker lab. Analyze your playing style with game data records. Reinforce your fundamentals with the tutorial.

name: Beyond Minimalism
summary: This small experimental first person minimalistic style game gives one and only quest for you. Walking around rooms of strange labyrinth look for clues to reach nature.

name: Belongings
summary: Belongings is a Point & Click adventure game. Dispose of the belongings of Jennifers late spouse Marion. Jennifer must contend with her own memories, and have to face hard truths she might not want to know. Do you wish to step into the bitter future, or stay in the sweet past?

name: Bedtime Horror Stories
summary: Late night. A young man called Sam is home alone. He finds a mystical book that takes him into a world of horror stories that come alive. Start reading, but you must not break the most important rule. Once you have started the book, you must finish it!

name: Beat the House
summary: A Texas Hold'em Poker game released for the Xbox Live Arcade. Mostly famous for being free on the day of its release.

name: Bearable - Return to Candyland
summary: The Candyman and his tribe of merry elves have returned to the island of Bearadise, turning everyone - and everything into delicious treats! - Exclusive to the App Store

name: Beyond the Mind
summary: Beyond the Mind - is the short relaxing game, where you need to solve riddles, exploring depths of mind. Also you will get a personal Oracle to solve your questions.

name: Beat Saber: Rocket League x Monstercat Music Pack
summary:
Beat Games studio brings fresh beats from Rocket League to Beat Saber! Dive into the pulsing music of Rocket League and slash the beats in our brand new Rocket League x Monstercat Music Pack. See you on the leaderboards!

Rocket League x Monstercat Music Pack includes the tracks:

Tokyo Machine - 'PLAY'
Stephen Walking - 'Glide'
Slushii - 'LUV U NEED U'
Tokyo Machine - 'ROCK IT'
Dion Timmer - 'Shiawase'
Slushii & Dion Timmer - 'Test Me'

name: Bee Craft
summary: Real-time simulation game of bees Can you survive?

name: Best Day Ever
summary: Play 4 characters, live their unique stories and manage their daily lives to create their best day ever. In this narrative game, your decisions have consequences and change the outcome of the stories.

name: Beyond Critical
summary: Beyond Critical is a sci-fi versus game where players use unique abilities to battle for control over a super massive black hole.

name: Betrayal Beach
summary: Crashed on a strange island, survivors must forage, craft, and complete objectives to stay alive. But ferocious beasts, harsh weather, and secret saboteurs seek to make sure they never escape. Betray your friends or survive the island in Betrayal Beach, a 4-8 player social deduction survival game.

name: Beach Volley
summary: Beach Volley is a simplified computer game version of volleyball from the French developer team Ocean France for various 16-Bit and 8-Bit personal computers, released by Ocean Software Ltd in 1989.

name: Beat Me!
summary: Beat Me! is a physics-based multiplayer party game with comical fantasy characters and surprising environments. START A BATTLE WITH FRIENDS locally or via the internet!

name: Beach Spikers
summary: Beach Spikers delivers intense beach volleyball action for up to four players, and it showcases beautiful female athletes as they battle it out under the summer sun. You must cooperate and compete as you take control of bikini-clad athletes and go two-on-two at the net. Those craving a deeper experience can create their own athlete and teammate and enter the all-new World Tour mode. With each win, you'll compete to earn attributes and use a mixture of encouragements and insults to develop your teammate's AI.

name: Bewells
summary: Bewells is not exactly a classic three in a row game. You don't have to stack three identical stones in a row, but on the contrary, remove obstructing stones so that the stones that fall as a result form a horizontal or vertical row of identical stones.

name: Bellhop
summary: You deliver the luggage in a six-story hotel.

name: Beer and Skittls VR
summary: Beer and Skittls is a strategic VR game that will challenge your skill level of throwing.

name: Beastlord
summary: A side-scrolling action adventure. As the Beastlord you must free the valley from the Lord of Darkness.

name: Beneath the Graves
summary: Evade monsters and make it to the exit to proceed to the next level in hopes of escaping. Each level is randomly generated and untold horrors await you in this dark world beneath the graves.

name: Beatmania 2ndMix
summary:
Beatmania 2ndMIX is a rhythm game developed by Konami. It is the second game in the beatmania series and is part of the BEMANI franchise ( which it was named after: BEatMANIa ).

The game is played with a controller with one turn table and 5 keys, three white and two black. On the screen you will see bars moving from the top to bottom in columns representing each of the keys and the turntable. When the bars reach the judgement line it is time to scratch.

Beatmania 2ndMix is the first time the hidden modifier was included, which hides notes halfway down the screen. The Difficulty levels have been reworked to a scale between 1 and 6. All songs from the first game moves on, combined with some remixes and 13 totally new songs for a total of 25 tracks to play.

name: Bean Beasts
summary: Defeat monster hordes alongside your Bean Beasts in this cute, challenging Tower Defense Game! Evolve your companions, explore upgrade paths for traps and take on epic boss battles!

name: Beat Sketcher
summary: Beat Sketcher is a fun and intuitive musical drawing experience for the PlayStationMove motion controller.

name: BeatEVO YG
summary: YG Licensed Official Rhythm Mobile Game

name: Beach Rally
summary: It's a classic sprite scaling racing game. Auto accelerate means steering left & right to avoid the rival racer cars. Complete 10 sections of track to "win".

name: Beyond the Thaw
summary: You are a Max Gilbert, a former military doctor. While taking a trip to your usual place of stay, the next moment you find yourself alone in the middle of nowhere, fighting fierce cold and facing series of trials. What is it: reality or mind games, behind which lies your deep secret?

name: Beautiful Sakura: Volleyball Club
summary: A visual novel focused on mental health and personal identity.

name: Berserker: A Viking Board Game
summary: A strategic and tactical board game for two players that has a timeless appeal and can be played over and over again in different variations.

name: BeyBlade: Fighting Tournament
summary: BeyBlade: Fighting Tournament is a Japanese only Game Boy Color release in the BeyBlade franchise.

name: Beasts Battle
summary: Turn-based battles.

name: Bebop
summary: Bebop is a private investigator that gets himself mixed with... THE MOB. And he regrets his actions, then comes back home a hero, after having tried to kill an innocent man and having tried to end him in a hospital.

name: Better Save Souls
summary: Choose your character and go on an unforgettable adventure, start as a mere mortal and become a powerful demigod, master fearsome magic combinations and find your play style.

name: Beyond the Veil: A Kitty Cat Mystery Adventure
summary: Beyond the Veil: A Kitty Cat Mystery Adventure is a 2D puzzle platformer where you and your trusty assistant switch between charming detective and adorable kitty cat to solve the case of your missing coworker.

name: Beasley's Deathtrap
summary: Players are given a series of binary choices; wrong answers are punished by death.

name: Beach Resort Simulator
summary:
The South Seas are calling!
Summer, sun, beach, and palm trees. Who doesn't pine for a life in the southern clime? This dream is now coming true. Transform a pristine beach into a popular travel destination by using strategic skill and economical thinking. Give free rein to your creativity! You decide if you want a party beach or a tranquil refuge.

name: Beyond the Portal: Island's Salvation
summary: After an accident, we find ourselves stranded on a mysterious and perilous island. Dive into a captivating turn-based role-playing game featuring a diverse cast of monstergirls. Is it possible to escape from this enigmatic place?

name: Berrywitched!
summary: Berrywitched! is a lovely twisted game where you, our protagonist, are lost within a forest that is supposedly cursed. You pass out, only to be awoken by a cute girl claiming to be a Strawberry Witch.

name: Besotted
summary: Dive into the world of Besotted. A classic JRPG 2D-3D art style set in a fantasy world with 3 main protagonist. Each with their own deep back stories that's full of death, revenge, love, and destiny. Join the 3 as they team up together all with the same goal in mind.

name: Bedroom Battlegrounds
summary: Did you ever embark on epic battles with toy soldiers in your childhood? Bedroom Battlegrounds brings that nostalgic thrill to life, allowing you to strategize and conquer in the imaginative settings of a child's bedroom. Experience the joy of childhood warfare again – play the game now!

name: Beastly Muscles
summary: You are a talented bodybuilder, now you need to become a citizen of a famous bodybuilding capitol. Plan your schedule, watch your stats, take jobs as you like and climb the rankings to become a top bodybuilder.

name: Beloved
summary:
Beloved is a short game about love in all its forms. It’s about honesty, and making your way through a world full of obstacles. 
 
This game isn’t meant to change your mind about anything – simply to make you think about the world, and maybe feel a little better about it.

name: Beasts of Bermuda: Archelon Supporter Warpaint
summary: Show your support with the Archelon Supporter Warpaint! This DLC offers special eyes and a cosmetic overlay with three static color options, plus a customizable, glowing marking.

name: Behind the Horizon: The Desert
summary: Expands the game Behind the Horizon with a new exciting main story, many new areas, items, spells and a new climate zone! - A farm RPG in a nature simulation that keeps changing the world. Dive into a new adventure! BtH-The Desert awaits you...

name: Between Two Cities
summary: Between Two Cities is a partnership-driven tile-drafting game

name: Beastmancer
summary: Beastmancer is a monster tamer tactical RPG. Play as an adventurer in a fantasy world, capture monsters and make them fight in turn based battles.

name: Beast Slayer
summary: Embark on an adventure in an 8-bit open world where monsters roam free. Track down and defeat dangerous beasts. With different classes & genders, skills & spells, each time you play will be different. Feel the nostalgia as you listen to an 8-bit soundtrack while flying on the wings of a dragon.

name: Bear Surfin Mega Wave
summary:
A short difficult fast paced crazy weird arcade game with hectic graphics. You are 'Bear' surfing a Mega Wave.

Use the mouse to maneuver Bear around obstacles. Try to get crates and health packs. When the counter reaches zero you win.

name: Beboop to the Rescue!
summary: Beboop is a rescue robot built to help other robots in times of need! Help Beboop in this educational puzzle platformer game about Math, with the target audience of 4th Grade or above.

name: Bestiary
summary:
BESTIARY is a game about frantically meticulously cataloguing strange creatures discovered in a new world. 
 
The only information you have are the photographs sent to you by the scouts, but that's all you need, right professor?

name: Behind the Horizon
summary: Epic role-playing game with a mystical story and with crafting, magic and farming. Plays in a living, simulated world, where plants, animals and the land evolve. Huge hand-drawn underground areas invite you to explore and fight against your own demons.

name: Berserk High
summary: Berserk High is an action RPG in which you defeat numerous enemies with a combination of various skills. The footsteps of the enigmatic wanderer Bella lead to the Furnace of Chaos, where 12 great heroes are confined. She is supposed to endure the most severe trials across the entire universe.

name: Bejeweled Classic
summary: A port of Bejeweled 3 for mobile phones, featuring the Classic, Poker, Diamond Mine, Lightning, Ice Storm, Zen, and Butterflies game modes.

name: Beautiful Vikings
summary: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts. Enjoy ;-)

name: Beach Party Craze
summary: There's no party like a beach party and there's no game like Beach Party Craze!

name: Beach Buzzin Chopper
summary: You control a beach-sports chopper that is buzzin' private beaches for bikini babes and handsome hunks. Some of the babes and hunks are already taken but others are happy to climb on board! Avoid the angered beach bodies whose squeezes you've stolen as they pursue you in jet packs and beach buggies armed with rubber bullets trying to get their favourite honey or dude back. If you’re successful, you get to party with the most beautiful girls or hunky guys on the beach!

name: Beyond the Heavens
summary:
Beyond The Heavens is a arcade style shoot-em-up where you take control of a ship seeking to reach the destination that calls out to it.

The journey will take place across several worlds including Heaven and Hell!

name: Because We're Here: Mohnblume und Blauerose
summary: Stagger through the First Lassallian War and find love amongst doomed youth. 'Because We're Here' is a plot-driven otome visual novel in an unforgiving WW1-inspired setting. Don't worry - it'll all be over by Christmas.

name: Better Off Dead: Life as a Prison Guard
summary: Story driven first-person comedy-thriller where you are tasked with guarding a small prison for 7 days.

name: Beautiful elves
summary: A classic puzzle game that will cheer you up!

name: Before The Sun Rises
summary: Re-growing a dying land with kindred spirits of the forest.

name: Beatdown Dungeon
summary: Beatdown Dungeon is a hybrid between dungeon crawler RPGs and fast-paced 2D fighting games. Travel through randomly generated dungeons, find treasure and fight all kinds of weird monsters. The combat is inspired by games such as Guilty Gear or Under Night In-Birth. Controls are easy to grasp and combos allow for creativity, with a lenient cancel system and the ability to summon helper characters . Develop your own fighting style by equipping badges to modify your skills and creating your own Custom Demon fighter.

name: Beer Run
summary: Beer Run is an Indie game created to steal beers from supermarkets.

name: Bemuzed
summary: Bemuzed is a game about a young guy who is at the crossroads between childish naivety and the depressive reality, surrounding him. Everybody knows, that our world is quit a dangerous place. Every friend may appear a foe, and a quiet street can cause you troubles. Vigilance and a sober view will help you to avoid troubles and dangerous encounters. But don’t stress too much! Depression can kill you. Will you be able to find a balance and not to drown in the routine and meaninglessness of existence?

name: Behind the Door
summary:
It's a story about a skeptical detective John who's investigating the abandoned's house massacre where group of teenagers were killed.
On early night Detective John arriving to the abandoned house to find out what has happened there but suddenly he realized that he is not alone...

name: Bert's Family Feud: The Interactive DVD Game
Best Game EU
summary: Addictive old school first person shooting meets mystery horror as you blast your way through a mysterious alien forest!

name: Beaterator
summary: Beaterator is a portable music maker produced by Rockstar in conjunction with Timbaland.

name: Ben 10 Omni-Charged
summary: Ben 10: Omni-Charged is a 5-minute, 1-3 Player VR Cooperative Multiplayer game that puts players in a Powertrix suit armed with overpowered alien abilities. Suit up and save the city from Vilgax and his robotic army.

name: Beyond the Bow
summary: Minnie Thymes is a time-traveller who gets stuck on the Titanic, just hours before it sinks. Can Minnie stop the ship from sinking and save everyone on board?

name: Before I Wake
summary: Lil horror adventure

name: BeHop Ranger And The Spicy Wizards
summary: A remix of a remix of a remix in moonlight!

name: Beatmania III: Append Core Remix
summary:
Beatmania III: Append Core Remix is a rhythm game developed by Konami. It is the second game in the beatmania III series, a spin-off of the beatmania series. It is part of the BEMANI franchise.

The game is played with a controller with one turn table, one foot pedal and 5 keys, three white and two black. On the screen you will see bars moving from the top to bottom in columns representing each of the keys, foot pedal and the turntable. When the bars reach the judgement line it is time to scratch.

The foot pedal lane has been moved to the rightmost lane (previously it was the leftmost). The difficulty range has been expanded to 1 - 9.Goods do no longer break combo. The gameplay frame COUNTER has been added.

As the name entails, the game focuses on bringing over the songs from beatmania Core Remix, all 25 new songs from that version is added. Additionally 3 new songs from beatmania IIDX 3rd style was included, 10 songs from beatmania completeMIX 2 and 7 songs from beatmania ClubMIX. 13 songs got a new "remixed" ANOTHER chart. 111 old songs return from beatmania III. The total number of songs is 169.

name: Beautycopter
summary: A Beautycopter is an ultralight aircraft used in the hospitality industry. And YOU will get to fly it! Come spend a day at earth's coldest spa in this wintery flight adventure.

name: Beat Guru
summary: A one-button rhythm game for the soul.

name: Beach Volleyball Competition
summary: Beach volleyball fun game. x2 game modes, 3D or 2.5D isometric projection. Easy game play controls. Realistic ball physics and speed. Several levels, with several music. Story mode have progress for increasing team skills. Match mode vs AI of other real users. Also can be available for mobile

name: Beads of orange glass
summary: A wordless story game for two players.

name: Berry Fall
summary: pick & catch fruit! avoid bugs & score big! play this arcade classic at home on your VEMU 770!!!

name: Bead
summary: Physical puzzle. You need to deliver the ball to the exit. It's simple. Probably.

name: Beats Slider
summary: Wouldn’t it be great if you could take a simple slider puzzle and turn all the blocks into musical beats, notes and riffs? What if you could jumble them up to remix the music? Beats Slider is exactly that!

name: Beyond Enemy Lines 2 Online
summary: Beyond Enemy Lines 2 Online is a free-to-play military first-person-shooter focused around tactical gameplay and weapon modifications. Players can quickly modifiy their weapons on the fly and master their skill in a wide range of game maps, modes and weapons on Dedicatded Servers. Entirely for free!

name: Beat Boxing
summary: Beat Boxing is a Virtual Reality rhythm-based game that translates boxing punches into the beat of your music.

name: Beyond Power VR
summary: In Beyond Power VR, you are so powerfull that weapons are useless. Battle online and destroy everything in sight with your sheer power. Will you be able to dominate your foes and become the strongest?

name: Believe: Paranormal Psychic Adventure
summary: Believe: Psychic Paranormal Adventure is an RPG with real-time twin-stick shooting action battles! Unravel the mysteries of the universe as Todd Black, who gets abducted by aliens, given incredible psychic powers, and is the only one who can save our world from total dimensional meltdown!

name: Beatmania IIDX 22 Pendual
summary: The 22nd installment in the IIDX franchise

name: Berserker's Descent
summary:
Berserker's Descent is a visceral, hardcore Roguelite. 
Descend into The Source and engage in brutal melee combat, making the most of your diverse attacks. 
Tightly designed and balanced, combat is easy to pick up, and hard to master. Die, learn, and try again. 
Play online with your friends or strangers. 
 
Key Features: 
 
As you delve deeper into The Source, you'll find new special attacks to augment your moveset. Will your keep your Netherlauncher to quickly juggle foes? Or equip a Hyper Grenade Throw for the pure explosive carnage? 
 
You'll also equip unique items all with special effects. Buy the items that supplement your play-style, and combine them for devastating synergies. 
 
Play long enough, and you'll learn advanced techniques to swing the fight in your favor. Perfect-Cancel to speed up your attacks, Dash-Guard out of harm's way, and aim your attacks precisely to change attack properties and deal more damage. 
 
A variable difficulty meter makes sure you're playing to your limit at all times. If you can avoid getting hit, you'll multiply the souls earned for dispatching foes. Of course, enemies will also become more numerous, and aggressive. 
 
Between the arenas, you'll dash and double jump through quick platforming challenges. The faster you are, the better the rewards. 
 
Slay monsters together with simple lobby based online co-op. 
 
Unlock new classes with different stats.

name: BeatNClean
summary: Our goal is to move forward in the subway we are in before any of our Life or Cleaning bars comes to an end. Depending on the situation, you can collect the garbage in the subway so that your cleaning bar does not fall or you can beat the gang members who cross your path in the subway.

name: Beekyr Reloaded
summary: Experience shoot'em up like you have never before. 'Beekyr Reloaded' is a 2D Arcade Shmup that alternates vertical and horizontal gameplay through enjoyable 28 stages.

name: Before Resignation
summary: It is a game in which the main character, who suffered from stress after being unfairly treated at the company, takes revenge the day before leaving the company.

name: Beauty and the Beast
summary: Horrible Hank has grabbed Tiny Mabel and climbed the old Mutton Building. Only Bashful Buford can save her. Help him scale the building - but watch out for those rolling boulders! birds and bats swoop down on Buford, and he leaps over scurrying rats. If Buford catches a heart Tiny Mabel throws him, he becomes invincible! Keep track of how high Buford has climbed. You can see how many chances he has left to save Mabel - and how many buildings Buford has completed. Can you beat your own highest score? Keep climbing, dodging, leaping and lunging! Only you can help Bashful Buford save his little darlin'.

name: Bellular Hexatosis
summary: Save your sister

name: Bellumarot
summary: This is a puzzle game that looks like an old-school card game, but it's actually quite different and unique.

name: Beyond Skyrim: Bruma
summary: Travel beyond the borders of Skyrim, and visit Bruma, the northmost county in Cyrodiil, discovering what has become of the city's residents since the events of Oblivion in all-new adventures and storylines. Explore an expansive region which contains:

name: Beholgar: Collector's Edition
summary:
An evil sorcerer reads the ancient book and invites an evil god to earth. It is necessary to eliminate this evil threat. And the fate of the earth is in the hands of a barbarian.

Beholgar is a classically styled 2D Metroidvania adventure. Explore caverns, ancient woods, and deadly castles; battle creatures and solve ancient mysteries in the kingdom.

name: Beatrice Verdict: Ace Attorney - The Hidden Truth
summary: Beatrice Verdict Ace Attorney: The Hidden Truth, is a fangame set after the third game in the original Ace Attorney Trilogy, Phoenix Wright Ace Attorney: Trials and Tribulations.

name: Berry
summary: Berry is a short orthogonal 3D platformer about a tiny, blue spider. Gain new abilities, weave through projectiles, collect and purchase a variety of items, and combat various bosses in this tiny metroidvania adventure.

name: Beauty vs. Robot
summary: "Beautiful Girl vs Mecha" is a card RPG game with the theme of the future eschatology. Players will be transformed into army commanders, and they will fight through card battles by means of instant battles and four different occupations.

name: Beat the Machine: Rebooted - Invasion
summary: T.O.M is back and his Invasion of Sector IV has begun. With a new arsenal of enemies, T.O.M is ready to take over a different part of the Origin Sectors. In this pack experience 15 new levels, a new survival map, new enemy types and more.

name: Bela Kovacs and the Trail of Blood
Before Arriving at the Terminal
summary: A horror visual novel set in a suburban city.

name: Become A History Explorer
summary: My First Amazing History Explorer (aka Tidsmaskinen, Become a History Explorer) is a video game published in 1998 on Windows by DK Multimedia, Norstedts Rabén Multimedia. It's an educational game, set in a history and fantasy themes.

name: Best Friend
summary: A 3rd-person exploration game explore a series of dreams and reconnect with your childhood best friend: your French Bulldog. Take control of both a human and French Bulldog as you experience a violently emotional story. Beware of the collectibles. They determine the fate of your friendship.

name: Beyond the Oaks
summary: Trapped in Canada's boreal forest, in which futuristic technology and otherworldly horrors surround a 17th Century village, you must unravel the mystical open world's secrets in this third-person action-adventure game.

name: Beneath Folly
summary:
The folly stands a top Folly Hill in Oxfordshire and legend has it beneath the rock is caves where The Fiend lives. His master plan is to enslave all adventure players as he finds them all stupid. You are one player and must escape the caves and outwit The Fiend to find freedom.

Beneath Folly is a graphical text adventure where you can see a picture showing your surroundings as well as a text description describing them. You type in commands to solve the puzzles and find freedom.

name: Beast Fighter
summary: Beast Fighter is a kaiju-themed scrolling action game for handheld systems.

name: Below the Oak
summary: This game serves as a sequel to Bane of Oakenshade with some recurring themes but a much darker tone. There are no shops so resource management will be important. Prepare to enter the bleakest dungeon you can imagine. A huge map to explore. Build your character up and defeat the final boss. Plenty of lore to indulge in if desired. It's cold, dark, grim and unforgiving.

name: Best Sniper: Shooting Hunter
summary: The war started! Dinosaurs came back… and bloodthirsty zombies are even more dangerous! It's about time to find yourself in a new, post-apocalyptic action! The wasteland full of destroyed buildings and dino's nests - it's what the modern battlefield looks like. Be careful and aim the rifle, demanding opponents are waiting for you!

name: Bear With Me: Episode 3
summary: Bear With Me - Episode Three is part of a series in which Ted aids Amber in her quest to find her missing brother Flint.

name: Beyond the Board
summary: Explore this strange land, play board games, meet other explorers, and battle them around a game table! Beyond the Board allows you to play mini games, and two different board games, Apogee and Light Hunters.

name: Bewitched game
summary: Alex lived a normal life - work, study, no dates. But one day, she got into the hands of a very unusual computer game. And as soon as she launched it, she immediately got into the story of a fairy tale for adults. Now, to go back, she needs to defeat the main villain - the witch - the succubus Asmodea.

name: Became the Hunted
summary: Playing as a wolf, you have to navigate your way around a vast dried up sea bed. Build your base, scavenge for food, and follow simple missions whilst you explore around sun bleached rocks and long forgotten ship wrecks. However, you must avoid poachers, unfriendly wolves and many other dangers at all costs. Can you find your cub in time?

name: Bed Lying Simulator
summary: Simulator of lying on a bed. Or lying to a bed. Or maybe the bed is lying. Is your bed lying to you?

name: Beyond: The Fading Signal - Collector’s Edition
Beast Blaster
summary: Have you heard the story about the beauty and the blast? Oops... Did I say that wrong? I think not! Armed with blazing bombs, you are to destroy a furious horde of menacing beasts. Decide, plant and detonate! As simple as that. Save the Monsterlings from the threat and become the ultimate Beast Blaster!

name: Ben 10: Alien Force
summary: Ben Tennyson is now 15 and becoming a leader wearing his powerful Omnitrix again. Grandpa Max is missing and Ben needs the help of Gwen and Kevin to find him. Ben has 10 new aliens -- including Swampfire, Goop and Jetray -- to fight against Highbreed and stop him from making humans extinct and destroying Earth.

name: Ben 10: Galactic Racing
summary: It's a galactic race to the finish as Ben, Kevin and twelve of Ben's alien heroes join an interplanetary Galactic Grand Prix in Ben 10 Galactic Racing, an action-packed game now available on all platforms. This is the first Ben 10 game to be a racing game.

name: Beatmania IIDX 11 IIDX Red
summary: IIDX Red is one of the many titles in Konami's IIDX rhythm game series, featuring more than 80 tracks, primarily from the arcade version of the same title. As usual for the beatmania series, the player is given seven piano keys and a turntable, and must play along with the notes that scroll down the screen to play the music. All of the game modes from the previous title have returned: Arcade, Expert, Class, Beginner's, Free, Training, and Gallery. The game also includes support for Internet score ranking (now discontinued) and custom-made Arcade courses.

name: Best of Us
summary: It's the dawn of superpowers! Grab a cape and stand among the first heroes—or become the first villain!

name: Ben 10: Omniverse
summary: 3DS Port of "Ben 10 Omniverse".

name: Be Like Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures
summary:
Be Like Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures is a Flash game developed in 2014. The game is a very low-budget and rather poor quality version of Pac-Man. The game uses the traditional Pac-Man formula, but has a strange, non-linear maze design with many dead ends.

The game it was created for TeleToon+, the TV channel that broadcasted Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures in Poland

name: Ben 10: Galactic Racing

name: Beyond Horror: Episode One - A Father's Journey
summary: The game is the first episode of a survival horror first person adventure, featuring action, stealth, shooting and puzzle solving. Every chapter has a specific theme and will play differently according to the plot, with tons of references to the classics that made the horror genre what it is today.

name: Beach Bounce
summary: A slice of life visual novel game in three parts following Tomoyo during his summer visiting a long lost relative. A fun tongue in cheek story with multiple branches, several relationships and various alternate endings for you to enjoy.

name: BeatStream

name: Ben 10: Galactic Racing
summary: It's a galactic race to the finish as Ben, Kevin and twelve of Ben's alien heroes join an interplanetary Galactic Grand Prix in Ben 10 Galactic Racing, an action-packed game now available on all platforms. This is the first Ben 10 game to be a racing game.

Race through the best tracks and find the best racing line with the help of the best instant replay system.
Beat over 50 beautiful and handcrafted tracks. Record your best moves and challenge your best friends!

summary: A piece of interactive fiction written by J. Robinson Wheeler, featuring IF luminary Andrew Plotkin in a parody of the movie Being John Malkovich.

summary: A tower defense game where you equip them with magical abilities.

summary: The bees need you! Become a Bee Leader and help the bees fill their hives with honey.

summary: Beat The Moles is an arcade game where you have to hammer at the moles that hide and sometimes crawl out of their holes.

name: Ben 10: Vengeance of Vilgax
summary: Originally created as a mobile java game, Vengeance of Vilgax is a Beat'em up game settled in the Ben 10 Alien Force timeline

name: Before Nightfall: Summertime
summary: In this game you will walk through a beautiful summer forest in search for firewood

name: Beauty and the Beast
summary: Is a female character as the main body of self-moving magic shooting game. Monsters want to invade the girl's home, you need to use magic to repel them.

name: Become a Great Artist in Just 10 Seconds
summary: Have you ever dreamed of being an Artist? Although this was not possible before, now it is because we have made a computer program. Let your imagination soar in Sketch mode, or take a 10-second Exam in which your imagination is subjected to the brutal and arbitrary standards of an unfeeling public under unreasonable time pressures.

name: Beyblade: Metal Fusion Cyber Pegasus
summary: Metal Fight Beyblade: Bakutan Cyber Pegasus is a Role-Playing game, developed by Amble and published by Hudson, which was released in Japan in 2009.

name: Ben Jordan: Paranormal Investigator - Case 4: Horror at Number 50
summary:
For centuries, a strange entity has lurked inside Number 50 Berkeley Square in London. In the 19th Century, two sailors attempted to enter the house... one was killed and the other lived to tell the tale. 
 
In the modern day, the house is now a bookshop but strange things have been happening so you, as Ben Jordan, are hired to find out what is going on along with a team of four other paranormal investigators.

name: Being Stronger While Playing! SilverStar Go DX
summary:
Enjoy learning and becoming stronger even though you’ve never played Go!
●Let’s learn in Go class!
2,855 problems in total! The definitive software for learning Go including the rules and terms of Go!!

Explanation and exercise. Learn the basics and advance in two ways!
Beneficial for Go novices as well as for beginner and intermediate players looking to increase their skills!

name: Beach anime day
summary: Beach anime day– a game that is a puzzle. The task of the game is to add up and get a whole picture, from the pieces into which it is cut.

name: Best Garden
summary:
A small, fast-paced, arcade-style gardening game. 
 
You have 60 seconds to build a garden suitable for the Best Garden award as fast as you can.

name: Behind Closed Doors
summary:
A totally light-hearted romp, featuring the mighty BALROG, who is trapped in the
'smallest' room. Together you must find a way of escape and perhaps wreak
revenge upon those responsible for this dastardly act. All you and the BALROG
have at your disposal are a copy of the 'Goblin Gazzette', the stub of a pencil
and your wits .... will it be enough or will the poor BALROG be destined to
spend the rest of his days with nothing but cold porcelain for comfort? It might
not be easy but it will sure be fun!!

name: Beatmania GB Gotcha Mix 2
summary: Beatmania GB Gotcha Mix 2 is a videogame launched for Game Boy Color. It has 25 songs and it's the last portable videogame for beatmania franchise, and it's the only one from the trilogy to have "Duet" charts, which two players are needed to play this level via Game Boy link cable, two GBC's, and two copies of the same game.

name: Bear Haven Nights
summary: Bear Haven Nights is a great indie horror game where you have to survive scary nights.

name: Before the Echo
summary: Before the Echo combines elements of both rhythm and role-playing games to create an entirely unique experience.

name: Best Friends
summary: The little creatures of Minutia lived in peace and harmony until the meteor smashed into Mount Boom, bringing with it a strange force that transformed the Slugs who lived there into an army of greedy, greenery-gobbling pests. They are taking over the world, munching a path through Minutia and sliming up everything they touch! Embark on an epic quest to solve the mystery of Mount Boom.

name: Bega's Battle
summary:
Data East used footage from the film Harmagedon to create a laserdisc video game titled Bega's Battle. It was released in June 1983. In the game, the player to take on the role of the robot Bega (Vega) whose goal was to stop the invasion forces of the alien Varga (Genma), while also rescuing his three friends who had been kidnapped by them. Even among laserdisc games Bega's Battle has become somewhat rare because many of the machines were converted into Cobra Command machines as part of a discount deal offered by Data East in exchange for the internals of the Bega's Battle arcade cabinet.

Similar to Astron Belt, the game used the footage mainly for backgrounds, while the actual gameplay was a shooting game with sprites laid over the video. Bega's Battle also used brief full-motion video cut scenes to develop a story between the game's shooting stages. Years later, this would become the standard approach to video game storytelling. Bega's Battle also featured a branching storyline. The Twin Galaxies world record for Bega's Battle was set by Steve Harris (later the founder of Electronic Gaming Monthly) on July 18, 1983.

name: Beneath the Waves
summary:
I loved you once, split-toed dirt-swimmer. These idols are the bones of wonders. Why should the sun claim the land any more than the sea?

A story-based exploration platformer that takes you to dizzying mountaintops and deep beneath the waves.

name: Beat Craft
summary: Beat Craft is a rhythm game for Android which allows the player to play songs/videos from YouTube search and MP3 downloads.

name: Benny the Blob
summary: This is a tricky puzzle game with cute little blobs, sparkly gems, 50 levels, and the ability to load and create custom levels. Benny The Blob features some difficult and headache-inducing levels that will challenge even the most experienced puzzle fans.

name: Beach Volleyball Girl Shizuku 3 - Sekai Taikai-hen
summary:
Sub-characters can also change clothes!? Let's enjoy the even more evolved "Shizuku World"!!
