summary: Explore the ever-shifting world of Beastbound where with every new run comes new Beasts to build your team with and new enemies to face.

name: Best Buds
summary: Best Buds vs Bad Guys is a 2D run ’n’ gun from a game developer Dad and his 11 year old son, with a special message behind it. Travel to 11 different worlds, all presented in classic 16-bit style, with a catchy chip-tune soundtrack and lots of over-the-top weapons!

name: Beat, Heart, Beat
summary: Beat, Heart, Beat is an autoscrolling rhythm-platformer centered around slashing through enemies to the music to maintain your momentum and traverse your way towards your own heart. There are three directions to slash - up, down and right in front of you. Slash in the correct direction to aim your attacks at enemies and dash into them. Performing a series of slashes to the correct rhythmic pattern is the key to reaching the end of the stage and advancing onwards to your heart.

name: Beach Bums
summary: Beach Bums is a cheeky 2D hidden object memory game in which the player must reunite beachgoers with their swimsuits after a tidal wave washes them away.

name: Beach Island Deluxe
summary: Beach Island is a micro open-world platforming game set on the mysterious Beach Island. Scour the island for stars to open up the ancient gateway portal! There's plenty to explore and uncover on Beach Island, can you find all 12 stars?

name: Below Kryll
summary:
Be a true explorer!
Explore hundreds of hours of hand crafted content while getting constantly stronger and learning new abilities on the way.
Features one truly immense world that is constantly expanded by players and developers alike.
What gem of a creation you will uncover just around the corner?

name: Beatmania
summary: Beatmania is the first version of the music video game beatmania IIDX to be released in the United States. It was released by Konami on March 28, 2006, for the PlayStation 2 video game console.

name: Bejeweled 2 Arcade
summary: Bejeweled 2 Arcade is an arcade port of the game Bejeweled 2. The port lacks many features from the main game and only includes the arcade gamemode.

name: Bejeweled
summary: An unreleased Game Boy Advance port of the game Bejeweled was in development and set to be published by Majesco in 2002, however was cancelled before release.

name: Bejeweled
summary: A plug and play port of Bejeweled.

name: Beyond Belief
summary: 1997 E1-style single-player episode for Quake, that features 8 small to medium-sized levels as well as a new start map - all of which also support co-op mode and deathmatch - a few new textures, and a modified Chthon boss.

name: Beach Community Build Project
summary: Those alien scum have once again ruined Duke's vacation, and it's up to him to fight his way across the beach-covered bay towards the dam to deactivate the portal that they're using to transport to Earth. The map is more original than the plot.

name: Beeswing
summary: Beeswing is a game set in a small village in rural Scotland, the village I grew up in. Visit the places and people who shaped a life and discover their stories. Represented in hand painted, water colour graphics with a unique, acoustic soundtrack.

name: Beyond the Harbor
summary: Ollie's life is turned upside-down when he begins receiving strange visions following a tragedy. A now-cancelled visual novel, which has been rebooted as BEYOND the HARBOR: r.

name: Bellfortis
summary: Control the people and armies, gain territory by force or cunning. Be a clever ruler or a ruthless conqueror in this Middle Ages game that combines turn-based strategy with intense real-time battles.

name: Beastly Desires
summary: Your humdrum days are interrupted when you and your sister wake up with strange tattoos. Three handsome beastmen appear and reveal that you hold the secret power needed to coronate a king in the Dark World. But before you can react, a villainous demon kidnaps your sister, vowing to come back for you next!

name: Beast Park
summary: This is a bullet screen shooting role-playing game, where players can freely match their decks and have a thrilling battle!

name: Bear Jojo
summary: Embark on a whimsical adventure with Bear JoJo in this all-ages arcade game. Enjoy challenging gameplay and discover enchanting surprises along the way!

name: Beneath the Waves
summary: A cruise ship makes an early return to Florida, but there is not a single passenger on board. FBI Shelly Clark is tasked with investigating the disappearances. Will she uncover the truth, or become lost like the others?

name: Beyond the Frontier
summary: Rumored To Be An Open Universe RPG

name: Beam of Magic
summary: Multiplayer Rogue-like RPG where you can explore dungeons with other players

name: Benthic Love
summary:
The original, critically acclaimed Anglerfish Dating Simulator! Explore the bottom of the sea in search of a mate. But be careful, because male anglerfish need to find a mate in order to live, but by doing so they also cease to exist as anything other than a pair of testes. 
 
Features: 
- 5 endings! 
- Learn interesting facts about the ocean depths! 
- The ONLY LGBT-friendly fish dating sim!

name: Beamrider
summary: A web of iridescent blue beams engulfs Earth-Space. You stand watching. Mesmerized at first, you now realize the beams support weapons, frightening creations in different forms. Will you just watch or will you take action? Action??!! Then roll up your sleeves, mount these beams and... ride! Animated graphics create a 3D perspective that virtually pulls you into the screen. Pulsating sound effects intensify the action as a dizzying array of objects zips from beam to beam.

name: Be a King 2
summary:
Try to rule your land as the prince. Save the Kingdom of your father, rebuild villages and towns and restore peace and prosperity. Defend your minions against hordes of monsters and bandits. Be a just and determined ruler, and realize the dream of becoming a brave king who leads his people to a better future! 
 
"Be a King 2" is a fantasy strategy game. It offers fast and entertaining game play. You - as a ruler of a medieval kingdom - must build towns and cities, defend them against raiders and perform various objectives. Enjoy the medieval atmosphere in lovely fantasy graphics!

name: Be the Richest
summary: is a tycoon management game that inherits the classic gameplay of Richest #1. It introduces an exciting new stealing mechanism where you can get rich quick by stealing funds from tycoons to strengthen your own power.

name: Beat Them Up: Street Fight Band Simulator
summary: A game in the classic and familiar Beat Them Up genre, in tribute to history, everything in the game is done according to the old traditions of beat em up games, but with nicer graphics and more convenient controls.

name: Belzerion
summary: The game takes place in a futuristic sci-fi setting, where the player pilots a giant robot. His main objective is research, through a lot of dialogue and exploration of scenarios, although there are also combat segments between mecha that allow the player to fight with weapons or melee.

name: Benefitship
summary: Experience the rapidly increasing sexual tension in the blossoming "friendship" between a futanari and her new roommate. A short and fun friends-with-benefits visual novel.

name: Beyond The Walls
summary: Immerse yourself in a 3D tower defense game set in a medieval realm. Build towers with unique effects and strategically manage your town to amass resources. Master the elements and devise cunning strategies to triumph in this captivating fusion of defense and city management.

name: Beerjeweled
summary:
Beerjeweled is a homebrew GBA Game that mimics the gameplay of the hugely popular Bejewled game.

While replicating the original concept of the Bejeweled, the developers made the decision to replace the typical jewel graphics with alcoholic beverages.

The game was developed by, Nuance, Genesis Project & Digital Demolition Krew. They showed the game off at Evoke 2013.

name: Befriended Curse
summary: Witches, curses, and fairy tales meet horror in this classic walking sim with an eerie atmosphere and well-paced jumpscares.

name: BeatLine
summary:
Improvisation, using the rhythm Complete the stage!
If you touch right to move the character to the right.
Touch left side of the character is moved to the left.
Releasing the line returns to the character.
Avoid the obstacles!!!

name: Beauty Solitaire
summary: "Beauty Solitaire" is a delicate card game featuring beautiful girls. On top of the classic solitaire casual gameplay, you can also choose the rank mode to compete with global players in terms of the speed of completing the game, enjoying a unique gaming experience.

name: Beetle Ninja
summary: Built for repeated playthroughs and varied strategies via an expansive roster of recruitable ninjas, a large selection of unique endings and secrets, and a mission-and-day-based structure, Beetle Ninja is a game that takes multiple separate playthroughs to truly appreciate!

name: Beyond Reason
summary: Beyond reason is a knowledge-based time-loop game about surviving a tiny open world. Master fluid first person combat, while uncovering the island's secrets. When you die, you take nothing but your knowledge of the world into the next loop.

name: Between the Lines
summary: A Zatacka/Achtung Die Kurve alternative for PlayDate!

name: Beyond Tenmei
summary: Roll dice, then cheat the dice with magic! Foil foes and trigger powerful talent synergies in this simple-but-deep twist on the turn-based RPG.

name: Bedfellows Frenzy
summary: Bedfellows Frenzy is a hard as hell, arcade style, smash and loot. Where you rage through various themed levels, demolish buildings, tear though the National Guard, and battle multiple bosses. Crushing and stomping your way up the leader boards, and to ultimate victory! Play as Monster Form Sheen or Fatigue as you unlock new power-ups and stack them to insane levels! Build unique style characters for each run with character bonuses, achievements, and multiple end game cut scenes.

name: Bee Hero: Bug Blaster
summary: Bee Hero: Bug Blaster is an Action RPG Looter Shooter with a focus on build theorycrafting. Exterminate bug hordes, collect gold and items, level up, acquire new skills, upgrade your weapon and fight bosses.

name: Bewitched Hearts
summary: After accidentally hexing your childhood friend on Halloween, embark on a journey with your cute Editor to save her.

name: Beneath Apple Manor
summary: Very early dungeon-crawler, it is the first known roguelike pre-dating Rogue itself though no link between the two games exists.

name: Beach Buggy Racing 2
summary:
Join the Beach Buggy Racing League and compete against drivers and cars from around the world. Race through Egyptian pyramids, dragon-infested castles, pirate ship wrecks, and experimental alien bio-labs. Collect and upgrade an arsenal of fun and wacky Powerups. Recruit new drivers, assemble a garage full of cars and race your way to the top of the League. 
 
The first Beach Buggy Racing introduced over 90 million international mobile players to console-style kart-racing with a playful offroad twist. With BBR2, we've upped the ante with a ton of new content, upgradeable Powerups, new game modes...and for the first time you can compete against other players in online competitions and tournaments!

name: Beyond Magic
summary: What happens when someone has no magic in a world where everyone has it? Play this quirky, colorful 16-bit style RPG and find out!

name: Beam Breakers
summary: With towering skyscrapers and anti-gravity cars changing the metropolis atmosphere, racing has become a more dangerous sport. Death-defying drivers from rival gangs risk everything in wild, illegal races in the middle of rush hour--always on the run from the MetroPolice. Now, a new challenge has come, and you must take control of one of 30 cars and race against five different gangs. Each track takes you through realistic and densely populated living environments.

name: Be: Twin
summary: Be:Twin is a top-down shooter set in an aplocalyptic version of Seoul. What will happen once the twins find what they have lost?

name: Bear in Super Action Adventure
summary:
Bear in Super Action Adventure is a side-scrolling shoot 'em up game in which you play as a bear that needs to save his planet from the evil Green rabbit and his minions.

Each mission you have to navigate bear through the attacking hordes of Green rabbit and destroy enemies while shooting automatically. Enemies include bees, bats and bosses. Along the way money can be collected. With this money you can buy upgrades like more bullets, increased bullet damage, more health, faster movement, power shots and a shield. The game offers 20 stages and a number of achievements that can be earned.

name: Behemoth
summary: Dodge ‘n flap your wings in this new arcade extravaganza from The Behemoth! Become one with the chicken, secure your flock in the nest, and collect as much candy corn as possible!

name: Berserk Soccer
summary: A soccer game with a brutal playing style.

name: Best of Arcade Games
summary: A collection of 4 off-brand clones of classic arcade games, like Brick Breaker, Tetraminos, Air Hockey and Bubble Buster.

name: Beverly Hills Models
summary: From the publishers of hit interactive CD-Rom titles "Exposed" and "Tabloid Beauties", MacDaddy Entertainment proudly presents "Beverly Hills Models." Photographed in some of Beverly Hill's finest hotels, "Beverly Hills Models" offers 250 revealing photographs of MacDaddy's most beautiful girls. Browsing through the coveted MacDaddy Photo Album, search for the perfect pose of Cindy. Glance at the enchanting Ashley, Cuddle with the loveable Jessica. Peek at the sultry Lana. Or become intimate with the unforgettable Gina. The choice is up to you.

name: Bean's Quest
summary: A wizard has turned Emilio into a jumpinh bean and kidnapped his girlfriend. Embark on a platforming adventure through fifty levels to save her.

name: Ben 10 Alien Force: The Rise of Hex
summary: Ben 10 Alien Force: Rise Of Hex, is a action puzzle game. It is the 4th game in the series. Players will control Ben and 10 of his aliens. Aliens like Swampfire, Brainstorm, Big Chill, Humongousaur, Echo Echo, Chromastone, Jetray, Spider Monkey, Goop and Lodestar to defeat the evil Hex.

name: Be My Match
summary: You're a successful businesswoman, confident in many areas of your life. But when it comes to dating, love is a battlefield... Or so you thought. What happens when you instantly match on a mysterious new dating app with three insatiable CEO bachelors? Swipe right to find out in Be My Match!

name: Beauty Showdown: Awakening
summary: Beauty Showdown: Awakening! Pretty girl idle card game!

name: BeatJunkies
summary: MUSIC RHYTHM MULTIPLAYER BATTLE! A multiplayer game in which you can show how fast you are to catch the notes and squeeze your opponent off the stage.

name: BeefeaterXO
summary:
Have you ever thought what's inside the mind of Dabiz Muñoz?  
 
Would you like to experience dreamlike from your seat?  
 
Immerse yourself into the Odyssey of Dabiz Muñoz with virtual reality.

name: Beacon of Havoc
summary: Post-apocalyptic city builder, where you Build, Defend, and Thrive in a desolate landscape overrun by enemy attacks. Manage resources, production and manufacturing to expand your settlement.

name: BeZombie Anime Invasion
summary: Dare to survive in BeZombie Anime Invasion! Navigate a monstrous city as a transformed heroine, recover lost memories, and unravel your past. Thrilling battles and a compelling story await, all in vibrant anime style. Do you have the courage to face your past and challenge fate? Start journey now!

name: Beach Buggy Racing 2: Island Adventure - Oddball Car Pack
summary: Add four wacky new rides to your vehicle collection with the Oddball Car Pack for Beach Buggy Racing 2: Island Adventure! Dominate the leaderboards in a massive metal tank, soar over obstacles in a UFO or plunge into an all-toilet race with your friends.

name: Belle-de-Nuit
summary: Win duels and hearts as a swordswoman at Paris's finest luxury brothel! Fight for the honor of ladies of the night in this game of swords and seductions.

name: Be a King
summary:
Try to rule your land as the prince. Build and maintain villages, towns and even big cities! Defend your minions against hordes of monsters and bandits. Be a just and determined ruler, and realize the dream of becoming a brave king who leads his people to a better future!

"Be a King" is a fantasy strategy game. It offers fast and entertaining game play for all players. You - as a ruler of a medieval kingdom - must build towns and cities, defend them against raiders and perform various objectives. Enjoy the medieval atmosphere in lovely fantasy graphics!

name: Beatmania Append 4thMix: The Beat Goes On
summary:
Beatmania Append 4thMix: The Beat Goes On was released by KCEJ on September 9th, 1999. This is is the countpart version of the arcade game beatmania 4thMIX.

It has a total of 30 songs, 23 from beatmania 4thMIX and 7 from 3rdMIX and completeMIX.

Since this is an Append release, it needs another beatmania title to act as a key disc to boot the game.

First beatmania APPEND game that uses its own independent memory card slot for save data. Previous beatmania APPEND games, as well as all BONUS EDIT games, use the same memory card slot as beatmania CS / beatmania APPEND YebisuMIX; only one of the aforementioned games can share that slot.

name: Ben 10: Alien Force
summary: Ben Tennyson is now 15 and becoming a leader wearing his powerful Omnitrix again. Grandpa Max is missing and Ben needs the help of Gwen and Kevin to find him. Ben has 10 new aliens -- including Swampfire, Goop and Jetray -- to fight against Highbreed and stop him from making humans extinct and destroying Earth.

name: Bertha Butt's Boogie
summary: Made for the June 2013 Monthly AGS competition. Bertha wants to win a dance contest, and needs her family's help to win.

name: Best Mayor
summary: As the new mayor of the island, you need to manage the island's regional planning reasonably to help the island get rid of difficulties and repay the huge bank loan. A variety of rich cards, terrains, and blessings will give you different challenges in every game!

name: BeeBeeQ
summary: BeeBeeQ is an asymmetric local multiplayer game where one VR player controls a Chef while up to four xbox controller players control Bees. Armed with a spatula and a fly swat the VR chef player has to try cook while the bees steal food, sting and generally harass him.

name: Best Keiba Derby Stallion
summary:
Best Keiba Derby Stallion ("Best Race Derby Stallion") is a simulation game where the player has a stable and starting money and must raise champion racehorses. As well as training horses, they can breed them and, eventually, sell them once they grow too old to race. The player can also hire jockeys to ride their horses for races, and can gamble on races to earn a little extra funds.

Best Keiba Derby Stallion began a long-running Derby Stallion franchise that persists to the present. It was only released in Japan.

name: Bedtime
summary: A Personal Short Experience game

name: Beam'em Up
summary: Beam'em Up is a downloadable action/puzzle game for PSP in which the player is cast in the role of a space scientist, piloting a spaceship with the goal of acquiring and collecting alien specimens from various planets and environments. Thanks to lush environments styled in 1950s sci-fi visuals, an accurate 2D physics system, addictive puzzle gameplay, and collection mechanics, Beat'em Up is homage to the classic era of videogames, revisited with contemporary look and feel.

name: Beena Town he Youkoso
summary: Copies were shipped with earlier models of the Advanced Pico Beena system, and is not thought to have been sold separately.

name: Bean
summary: Welcome to Bean, the clicker game more addictive than cat videos! Click your way to bean glory, gathering beans faster than you can say "bean counter." Unlock mysterious inventory drops with golden beans, magic beans, or baked beans. Dive in and may the beans be ever in your flavor!

name: Beyond Senses
summary: Beyond Senses is an innovative Multiplayer and Singleplayer Horror Game. Thanks to a variety of different features, Beyond Senses guarantees a varied and adrenaline-charged gameplay - both alone and with friends!

name: Beat Boxers
summary: Beat Boxers is the world's first Rhythm-Fighting Game. In order to win, players have to attack to the beat of the music. The closer you hit to the beat, the stronger your attacks. Keep up the rhythm and outplay your opponent!

name: Bending the Light
summary: Submerge yourself in a dreamy, atmospheric world filled with brilliant beams of light. Use magnetic orbs and bronze mirrors to bend the light and charge the energy cells.

name: Beat Saber: Nicki Minaj - "Anaconda"
summary: Get the track ‘Anaconda' by Nicki Minaj on Beat Saber now. This track is part of Hip Hop Mixtape.

name: Beatmania IIDX 5th style
summary: The 5th release in the beatmania IIDX series. Marks the first of many appearances from Namco mainstays sampling masters.

name: Bet on Soldier: Blood Sport
summary: Delve into a world where war has become a media frenzy! Survive your battles and bet on your victories!

name: Beyond Fantasy
summary: Beyond Fantasy is a top-down shooter mixed with survivor-like elements. In-game mini-games give you the opportunity to acquire pets and colleague.

name: Bertie the Brain
summary: Currently considered the first videogame in history. A tic-tac-toe clone.

name: Beyond the Tesseract
summary: Beyond the Tesseract is a text based adventure game developed in 1983 by Canadian author David Lo for the TRS-80. The game was notable for its unique take on the genre and approach to mathematical entities and abstract concepts.

name: Bemis Wamilton Racing
summary: Drive with Bemis Wamilton race in this race game with electronic racing cars against other competitors

name: Beer Drinkin' Terrorist Hunter
summary: Beer Drinkin' Terrorist Hunter is challenging, fast-paced, 2d shooter. Inspired by games like Wolfenstein 3d, Doom, and Duke Nukem. Fight your way to downtown by collecting and unleashing a full arsenal of 2d weapons. Visit places like the mall, downtown, and a factory. Fight on highways, in warehouses, and on rooftops. Shoot a variety of enemies including bosses.

name: Beerman
summary:
Take charge of the caped deliverer and help Boston's
finest foil The Society Of The Ninth over land, sea and
air!

name: Beak Squadron
summary: Beak Squadron is a challenging, indie, 3rd-person flight game set in a galaxy where ducks and guinea pigs have been at war for eons. Not for players who are looking for an easy experience. Designed for controller play.

name: Bean Story
summary: A horror strategy survivor with action and fast Movement Required game. You have a sword which you use to kill enemies and proceed with the story. The goal of the game is to find a way out, survive and find information about your disappearance The game is mostly a wave suvivor game with a story.

name: Beowulf: The Game
summary: Beowulf: The Game is a hack and slash game for TOD and consoles, based on Robert Zemeckis' version of the poem Beowulf. The game was announced by Ubisoft on 22 May 2007 during its Ubidays event in Paris.[5] It was released on November 13, 2007 in the United States. The characters are voiced by the original actors who starred in the film.

name: Beep Bap The Beep Boop
summary: Beep Bap The Beep Boop is a 3D platformer inspired by Spyro, Banjo and Zelda! Explore colorful worlds and talk to a variety of charming NPCs! Use your surroundings to aid in combat & use shields to block and parry enemy attacks!

name: Beat Saber: Monstercat Music Pack Vol. 1
summary:
Beat Games studio brings fresh beats from Monstercat to Beat Saber! Dive into the pulsing music of Monstercat and slash the beats in our brand new Monstercat Music Pack. See you on the leaderboards!

Monstercat Music Pack includes the tracks:

- 'Boundless' - Aero Chord
- 'Emoji VIP' - Pegboard Nerds
- 'Epic' - Tokyo Machine
- 'Feeling Stronger (feat. Charlotte Colley) [High Maintenance Remix]' - Muzzy
- 'Overkill' - RIOT
- 'Rattlesnake' - Rogue
- 'Stronger (feat. Emel)' - Stonebank
- 'This Time' - Kayzo
- 'Till It's Over' - Tristam
- 'We Won't Be Alone (feat. Laura Brehm)' - Feint

name: Bear With Me: Episode 2
summary: Bear With Me - Episode Two is part of a series in which Ted aids Amber in her quest to find her missing brother Flint.

name: Berks 3: They're Angry!
summary: The final game in the Berks saga

name: Beethoven's 2nd: The Quest for Pups
summary:
Beethoven's 2nd: The Quest for Pups is an unreleased action game for the Sega Mega Drive based on the film, Beethoven's 2nd. An entirely different Beethoven's 2nd game was released around the same period for the Super NES. It was featured at Winter CES 1993.

A prototype of the Mega Drive version was released by Hidden Palace on January 1, 2022.

name: Beyblade: G-Revolution
summary: The G-Revolution is sweeping over the entire Beyblade world, and your job is to challenge the greatest Beybladers and collect valuable parts. Like previous entries in the Beyblade series, G-Revolution lets you pit your spinning top against others in different arenas. In your quest to become world champion, you can build a varied collection of blades, which you can customize with the Beyblade editor. Compete against more than 16 characters in a storyline taken straight from the Beyblade G-Revolution animated series.

name: Beyblade: Burst Rivals
summary:
Choose your favorite character, become a Master Blader, and enter BEYBLADE BURST tournaments! Use rare and powerful Beys with the help of your loyal Avatars and LET IT RIP in epic battles!
Collect an arsenal of Beys and upgrade them, unlocking special Bey techniques that provide a decisive edge for the ultimate battle. Which ones will you master?
Use strategy to defeat your opponents and strive for Ring Out Finishes, Survivor Finishes, and epic Burst Finishes!
Do you have what it takes to become the best Blader in the world? Grab your Bey and LET IT RIP!

name: Bepuzzled Puppy Dog Jigsaw Puzzle
summary: 102 Cute puppy dog puzzles to complete! Funny poses, cute poses, sincere poses, Birthday and Christmas puzzles. Interesting dogs and environments. Friendly User Interface for easy selection and 'magnetic' pieces for convenience. Calming music, which can be muted. What else could you need for a relaxing yet puzzling time?

name: Bella Sara 2: The Magic of Drasilmare
summary: Return to the universe of Bella Sara and set off to the Drasilmare Tree’s rescue! The great Magic Tree of Drasilmare has been cursed! Only you can remove the deadly curse and save the world of Bella Sara.

name: Beat Hazard: Shadow Operations Unit
summary: Welcome To The Shadow Operations Unit. CONSTRUCTION: Create new ships for the Shadow Fleet. ACQUISITION: Download new ships created by other operatives. EXECUTE: Complete Shadow Missions to gain promotions. DOMINATION: Each ship in the fleet has its own set of leader boards.

name: Best in the West
summary: Compete for #1. Best in the West is a Wild West shoot out experience! Grab a gun and blast your opponents with revolvers, double barreled shotguns, and other western weapons. Explore the woods and find loot to survive to be the last one standing.

name: Beyond Shattered Isles
summary: Beyond Shattered Isles is a fast paced first person parkour game. Grapple, dash and jump through this beautiful broken world.

name: Become Prey 2: Of Everlasting Sin
summary: Haunted Hunt

name: Beggar Prince
summary: The snobby, selfish prince of Shatt Kingdom unknowingly aids a great threat to his world after he switches places with a beggar who looks just like him. Wanting only to escape the daily drudgery of his palace life, he has no idea what evil lies in wait around every corner. This careless brat of a boy is now the last chance for his kingdom to remain in peace, rather than be enveloped in chaos. Guide him on his way to learning the path of a true prince, and save his world from sinking into darkness.

name: Beat Monsters
summary: Beat Monsters is a virtual reality rogue-lite rhythm game that allows you to hack and slash your way through monster-infested dungeons, all reacting, moving and attacking to the sound of your favorite tunes.

name: Beatmons 2
summary: Do not die ! Do not die ! Do not die ! Do not die ! Do not die ! Do not die ! Do not die ! Do not die ! Do not die ! Do not die ! Do not die ! Do not die ! Do not die ! Do not die ! Do not die ! Do not die ! Do not die ! Do not die ! I don't want to die

name: Beat the Fed
summary: Run the Federal Reserve in this macroeconomics time-traveling simulation game. Apply monetary and fiscal policies and monitor and assess the impact on unemployment, inflation, and other key economic metrics. Can you Beat the Fed?

name: Beck: The Game
summary: Beck: The Game is an adventure game based on the Beck anime, which focuses heavily on hard rock music.

name: Beatrect
summary: Introducing Beatrectthe Rhythm Action Game for music lovers and note-slashers both old and new!Slash the notes without complicated rules. Experience a whole new lay-tracing based graphic.

name: BeatShooter
summary: Shoot to the beat in this fast-paced rhythm rail shooter. Blast your way through a psychedelic musical universe, racking up combos and climbing the leaderboards. Easy to learn, challenging to master, with an ever-expanding track list that ensures the beat never stops.

name: Beyond Horizon: The Astral Expedition
summary: Awaken in a surreal realm of giant insects and blurred reality. Guided by a companion, master movement, customize your outfit, and uncover your past. Complete missions to rebuild the city and pursue a mystical orb to return to reality. Will you escape or remain captivated by the astral world?

name: Beyblade: Metal Fusion
summary: BeyBlade: Metal Fusion is a Wii and DS entry of the BeyBlade spinning battle top series, released only in the United States.

name: Beneath the Frost
summary: Beneath the Frost is a short, single-player, psychological horror game set on a frozen, desolate planet. You take on the role of the sole survivor of a spacecraft crash, using a robot companion to gather parts for an SOS device while uncovering an eerie mystery that suggests they may not be alone.

name: Become The Devil
summary: Two college students travel to a remote area to interview the owner of a resort. Along the way, locals warn them to stay away from the people at the resort. Since the new owner moved in, strange incidents have frequently occurred. The locals suspect something terrifying must be lurking in the resort

name: Bewitching Sinners
summary: Bewitching Sinners is a dark comedy dating sim where your choices will either leave you with a your own witch-hunting man or ruin a whole world and potentially killing millions of people within it, no pressure! Explore a fantasy world full of witches, hot priests, and maybe some run-ins with death.

name: Best. Game. Ever.
summary: Flash game featuring a customizable character you play as in the world of Total Drama, as you do errands for the cast of the show, basically a followup to "Total Drama Island: Totally Interactive!"

name: Benchmark
summary: This game is a stress-relief title designed specifically for relaxation.

name: Benjamin of Blackstone Edge
summary:
Benjamin of Blackstone Edge is a classical "coming-of-age" tale. You start as Benjamin, a farm boy, and if all goes well, after many adventures and hard choices, you end up as the new king. You start alone, but soon will have companions that'll help you with your tasks.

Explore, fight and interact with NPCs and your party. Difficult decisions and dangerous foes await you in dungeons and other environments. If you played Moonstone Deep and put money in your bank account in Panzani Bank, you can retrieve some of your gold when you leave Netherim for good.

name: Beach Ping Pong Babes VR
summary: This is a summer -filled VR table tennis game, allowing players to feel the charm of beach table tennis on the hot summer day. The background of the game is set on a beautiful and golden beach. The waves patted the shore gently, giving a quiet and comfortable feeling.

name: Below
summary: Below is a story-driven, dungeon-delving RPG card game you can play in your browser. It combines the old-school delights of exploration, looting treasure and subterranean peril with rich storytelling. In Below your life in the world above is as important as your adventures beneath it. Only a fool risks their life for a fistful of gold - but would you do it to protect your family? To drive the invaders from your home? For revenge?

name: Behind Every Great One
summary:
Gabriel is a really driven successful artist. Victorine doesn't have any personal passions but supports Gabriel as a housewife. They love each other.

Cook, clean, smoke, read and have dinner with your husband.

name: Bentley Bear’s Crystal Quest
summary:
Crystal Quest is a homebrew game and an unofficial sequel to Crystal Castles, with very different gameplay. You play as Bentley Bear in a side-scrolling platform game. Your task is to retrieve the five crystals of life that were stolen by your enemy Berthilda. There are various enemies along the way to avoid and various power-ups that will help in your quest.

The title was bundled with the Atari 7800+.

name: Beary the Hatchet
summary:
It's Halloween 199X, and you killed someone during your morning shift.

Honestly it's inconvenient. This job was imperfect, sure, but you got to wear a mask with no questions asked and the pay was livable. But now you'll have to keep the body in the backrooms till your shift is done. Bummer.

name: Best of Arcade Games: Bubble Buster
summary: Rediscover a timeless puzzle game with Bubble Buster!

name: Belong
summary:
With luck, you secured yourself a part-time job. With time, you might get more than you bargained for.

Customisable main character name, gender and personality options!
3 romanceable paths ( 2 Males & 1 Female ) !
No stats build up!
Over 80,500 words of content!

name: Beak Blades
summary: A fast-paced, crazy and chaotic battler full of different weapons, maps, game modes, and hats! Fight with swords, battleaxes, and knives! Blast each other with shotguns, rocket launchers, and flame throwers! This is BEAK BLADES!

name: Beat Saber: Pop Smoke - "The Woo (feat. 50 Cent, Roddy Ricch)"
summary: Get the track ‘The Woo (feat. 50 Cent, Roddy Ricch)' by Pop Smoke on Beat Saber now. This track is part of Hip Hop Mixtape.

name: Beat Saber: Dr Dre - "Nuthin’ But A “G” Thang"
summary: Get the track ‘Nuthin' But A “G” Thang' by Dr Dre on Beat Saber now. This track is part of Hip Hop Mixtape.

name: Beat Saber: Outkast - "Hey Ya!"
summary: Get the track ‘Hey Ya!' by Outkast on Beat Saber now. This track is part of Hip Hop Mixtape.

name: Beat Saber: Snoop Dogg - "Gin and Juice"
summary: Get the track ‘Gin and Juice' by Snoop Dogg on Beat Saber now. This track is part of Hip Hop Mixtape.

name: Beach Volleyball Girl Shizuku
summary: This two-on-two beach volleyball game has players competing to be the best team possible.The core game is action-based, with a relatively fast pace and special over-the-top super moves for each character. Players can either play in a story mode, where they follow protagonist Shizuku's beach volleyball career, or practice matches against the CPU in a versus mode. A collection mode also lets players dress up the characters in the various swimsuits they've collected.

name: Beetle Hunter
summary: BEETLE HUNTER is a simple first-person shooter. Beat various ferocious enemies, collect powerful weapons, explore the randomly generated complex steampunk stage, aim for the top floor and hunt the mighty beetle!

name: Being Left the F*** Alone Simulator
summary: Take a step back and relax with this point & click style mindfulness experience. Lovingly crafted in the style of a 90's adventure game, BLTFA Sim lets you explore a world that's all about taking care of yourself.

name: Beep! Beep! Deliveries
summary:
Every summer Pook visits Uncle Bub who runs Beep! Beep! Deliveries company on Dawn Island. Meet Muffintops, Sleepy Wizard, 8-bit, Vibes, Jiggy & many more customers – all needing fresh deliveries fast. Drop off letters, gifts, essential supplies & help upgrade their stores or unlock quests. Everyone needs something & your deliveries change the town itself.
Your customers dream of better things, if only the Greedy King makes life hard. Expect crashes & smashes as he unleashes his pesky guards, boom-boys & Ghostly Bob.

name: Ben 10
summary: Ben 10 is an unlicensed Russian Sega Mega Drive port of a beat-em-up for Java phones Ben 10: The Power Of Omnitrix, based on the TV series of the same name. No developer credits exist in the game, but several elements point it to having been made by BMB.

name: Berenstain Bears in Big Paw's Cave
summary: A stealth-maze game featuring characters from the children's book series

name: Betrayer: Curse of the Spine
summary: Betrayer: Curse of the Spine is an Action-Adventure Metroidvania. The game features decision making, crafting, fast-paced combat, multiple endings, intricate storytelling, an open world to explore, and more!

name: Being One: Episode 1
summary: A Scary SciFi Point & Click Adventure Series.

name: Bedrotting
summary: This game is about bed rotting. You lie in the bed for 20 days trying to survive.

name: Beetlejuice
summary: In the game you control Beetlejuice through various side-scrolling and overhead view levels in an effort to scare the yuppie Deetz family and friends that have taken over the house. You stomp on cockroaches in order to gain points that you used to buy various scare tactics that you use to defeat various enemies and bosses. Although the initial levels of the game are based upon the film, with Beetlejuice venturing through the Maitland House to find and scare away Otho, the later levels are original and involve Beetlejuice fighting mythical creatures in such locations as a sewer system and the afterlife.

name: Behind The Backrooms: Lost Levels
summary: Behind The Backrooms: Lost Levels is Co-op 1-6 survival horror game where you explore eerie, hidden levels filled with terrifying entities, cryptic puzzles, and relentless dangers. survive deadly encounters, and find your way out—before you become another lost soul trapped forever.

name: Before You Depart
summary: Before You Depart is a slice-of-death visual novel made for the May Wolf Visual Novel Game Jam. Canines are often companions for life. Some can even be companions in death...

name: Bennys Backrooms
summary: Work together with your friends (or betray them) to find multiple exits in the Backrooms. Expect to see the "You Died" screen a lot.

name: Between Me and the Night
summary: ‘Between Me and The Night' is a surrealist action adventure game that walks the thin path between sanity and madness. Take on the role of a young boy and explore and interact with the mysterious house in which he lives.

name: Best Elf
summary: Best Elf is an erotic 2D visual novel spinoff of Faulty Apprentice, following Eleanna and Zariinna. When an innocent competition between the two elves turns into a rescue mission, it's up to you and your friends to save the day! With two sexy elves at your side, what could go wrong?

name: Bedtime Stories 1
summary: BEDTIME STORIES 1This VISUAL NOVEL continues the life of the girls in the Cindy universe, even at different ages. This way you can explore all kind of kinks and pleasures and topics. This complex story includes also the life of Stephanie, Michelle, Monica, etc.

name: Ben 10 Bundle
summary:
Enjoy both games from the series Ben 10!

Included in this bundle are:

Ben 10
It’s Hero Time!
As Ben Tennyson, it’s up to you to save the world. Take on some of Ben’s most infamous enemies, including Zombozo, Queen Bee, and the Weatherheads. Unlock and transform into all ten of Ben’s incredible alien forms. Discover an exciting new story and use each alien’s unique combat moves to defeat enemies, solve fun puzzles and save the day.

Ben 10: Power Trip
Evil Hex has cursed Europe – and only Ben 10 can stop him! Explore a 3D world filled with combat, puzzles and secrets as you save the day!

name: Bean's Quest 2: Bean Dreams
summary: You’re a Bean and constantly jumping you just need to navigate left and right to collect fruit and navigate through fiery dangers. This sounds easy but don’t be deceived, you cannot collect everything on the first play through. Multiple play through’s are required and give this title major replay value. The sound/music is excellent and the graphics are so colorful and fun

name: Bender 2: Bend Harder
summary:
Step into the circuits of a robot with an unusual job: bending bars to precise angles.

Your hydraulic hands are itching to twist metal as you stand at the first workstation. A single button controls the bending, and thicker bars bend slower than thinner bars. Let go of the controls when the bar reaches the target angle. Success/retry/fail?

name: Beatmania IIDX
summary: is a music video game developed by Konami's music video game division, Bemani, released in Japan on February 26, 1999. The objective is to perform songs using a controller with seven keys and a turntable. Its cabinet contains a widescreen monitor, massive speakers, and eight spotlights. Bemani later developed several updated versions of IIDX to increased success. The game retrospectively received a positive reception from video game publications for its gameplay and increased difficulty.

name: BeDo
summary: Traverse galactic phases and find the Dough scattered throughout space in an addictive adventure of precision and relaxing floating

name: Beach Buggy Racing
summary:
Drive into an action-packed, surprise-filled world of off-road kart racing mayhem. Race against a field of rival drivers, each with unique personalities and special abilities. Build a collection of crazy powerups, like Dodgeball Frenzy, Fireball, and Oil Slick. Unlock and upgrade a variety of cars, from dune buggies to monster trucks. Test your skills in 6 different game modes on 15 imaginative 3D race tracks, against a pack of tropical-loving rivals with a serious case of road rage!

This is the official sequel Beach Buggy Blitz, the free driving game with over 30 Million players worldwide. Fast, furious, fun and FREE, Beach Buggy Racing is a kart-racing island adventure for all ages.

name: Behind Closed Doors: A Developer's Tale
summary: In Behind Closed Doors, you plays as Ethan, who works for a small indie company, trying to support his pregnant wife. He gets an unexpected phone call during the middle of the night, and is teleports to another dimension, where he has to face a series of challenges to get back to the real world.

name: Bedlam
summary: Bedlam is a 1996 run and gun video game developed by Mirage and published by GT Interactive for DOS, Windows, Mac OS, and PlayStation, in which players use a squad of three huge remote assault tanks (RATs) against mutated monsters called Biomex.

name: Beat Da Beat
summary:
Hurrican-like Bullet Hell. Avoid the rain of bullets to the rhythms of "dubstep".
Help the hero to defeat the aliens and to take revenge on the interstellar aggressor!

name: Beast Whalers
summary: Beast Whalers is a naval roguelike about maneuvering against the wind and managing magical cannons. Explore wild archipelagos and fight against bizarre creatures like mortarfish and flying sharks to find the source of the sudden influx of Corruption.

name: Best of Best
summary: This would be a typical early Street Fighter clone if it wasn't for the good old SunA wackyness. Eight combatants come to this turney to find out who is the best of the best in the world. Like in many Korean fighting games at the time, there is no boss, nor any hidden characters. Each character has its own stage, but the same musical tunes are played in each of them. Get ready to fight to the rythm of Lambada and celebrate your victory with the Ode to Joy.

name: Before Time Runs Out
summary: In this modern twist on 2D platformers, make your way through numerous traps and obstacles such as spikes, saws, laser beams, and explosives to reach the goal at the end of each level. Each level has a limited amount of time to complete. So speed is key, or else it's game over.

name: Bestri
summary: A collection of 3 games: 'Die Break', 'Heuk Sua Baek Sa' and 'Penta'.

name: Bentley's Hackpack
summary:
Bentley's Hackpack is a standalone minigame compilation developed by Sanzaru Games and published by Sony Computer Entertainment. Released on February 5, 2013, for PlayStation 3 and PlayStation Vita, it coincided with the launch of Sly Cooper: Thieves in Time.

In Bentley's Hackpack, players assume the role of Bentley, the tech-savvy turtle from the Sly Cooper series, accessing three arcade machines—System Cracker, Alter Ego, and Spark Runner—each offering 20 levels with five challenges per level, totaling 300 challenges. Completing these challenges awards tokens, which can be used to unlock 65 prizes in Dimitri's Prize Gallery, reminiscent of the treasure collection feature in Thieves in Time.

name: Beholder
summary: A totalitarian State controls every aspect of private and social life. Laws are oppressive. Surveillance is total. Privacy is dead. You are a State-installed manager of an apartment house. The State requires you to spy on your tenants, and report any illegal or subversive activity. However, you can also choose to keep the information to yourself, or use it to blackmail the residents, resulting in a multitude of choices and endings.

name: Becoming Your Beautiful Cousin
summary: Becoming Your Beautiful Cousin is a novel game in which the protagonist has a gender switch condition from his grandfather's invention, and gets involved in various troubles while trying to find a way back to his original body.

name: Beat Hazard 3
summary: Are you ready to explore your music collection mapped as a stunning galaxy of wonders? Experience your music collection as never before with this intense music driven twin stick shooter. Each of your songs will have its own unique ebb and flow based on the music.
